02115914de.title: fish salad
02115914de.ingredients: 1 lb. firm fish fillets 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. mayonnaise 1/2 c. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tbsp. vinegar 2 tbsp. juice 1 small onion, chopped
02115914de.recipe: cut fish into serving size pieces. combine ingredients and pour over fish. toss until well coated. chill.

00afbdbb79.title: teriyaki sauce
00afbdbb79.ingredients: 2 tablespoons sugar 2 tablespoons honey 3 tablespoons soy_sauce 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 tablespoon vinegar 1 teaspoon ginger 3 tablespoons oil 1 garlic clove 1 clove 2 tablespoons butter
00afbdbb79.recipe: in a saucepan over low flame, mix sugar, honey, soy sauce, salt, vinegar, ginger, oil, garlic, clove and butter. stir until all ingredients are thoroughly blended. serve with sliced pork.

004628ff8d.title: honey praline
004628ff8d.ingredients: 3/4 cup sugar 3 tablespoons honey 1 tablespoon oil 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/3 cup juice
004628ff8d.recipe: heat all ingredients in medium sauce pan to 250f. stir constantly until dissolved and thick. turn off heat and add 3 teaspoons vanilla. stir with rubber spatula until creamy and shiny. dip praline with a skewer into chocolate and coat. spread praline on a sheet of tin foil to dry and harden. break into pieces.

003045288d.title: soft and chewy chocolate cheesecake
003045288d.ingredients: 150 grams sugar 150 grams philadelphia cream cheese 200 ml milk 200 ml heavy cream 90 grams butter 1 tbsp cocoa powder 2 tsp rum extract 1 egg
003045288d.recipe: mix all of the ingredients together. place in a heat resistant container and microwave at 600w for 5 minutes. if there are little bubbles when you shake the container. this is important for the cheesecake to become creamy. remove from the microwave, stir with a rubber spatula, then return it to the microwave for another 2 minutes. when the mixture turns completely white, pour into a cake pan lined with parchment paper and chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. i used a plastic container to keep the cheesecake from getting lumpy in the ice cream when it has cooled a little, you can top with fruit if you like this is a classic chocolate cake. it tastes just like a cheesecake.

0246fc544f.title: stuffed pepper steak
0246fc544f.ingredients: 8 each pepper steaks 1/4 cup cheese 1/4 onion 1 small potato 2 tablespoons butter 1 salt 1 garlic 1 clove 1 parsley dried 2 tablespoons oil 100 ml milk 1 mushroom 1 dash cream 1 broth
0246fc544f.recipe: chop the onion, potatoes, mushrooms, and garlic finely. in a pan over low heat, add butter and add chopped mushrooms. add chopped garlic, parsley, salt, pepper, and clove. once the onions are slightly brown, add the pepper steaks. when the steaks are done, remove them to a plate and allow them to cool. make a hole in the center of each steak. in the meantime, put the milk, soup and milk mixture into a saucepan. put on high heat and boil it for about 4 minutes. stir from the bottom and continue boiling it until reduced in volume. drain the oil from the mushrooms and add them in. let the mixture simmer for 5 minutes. let the mushroom sauce to cool down a little. add the cream and stir. add the cheese in small pieces and mix well. put the sauce in the hot sauce in the piping bag and pipe it in the center of the steaks. i used 6 asparagus spears. i used 3 tablespoons.

0270cd52cb.title: tuesday morning bread
0270cd52cb.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 cup mashed potato 1 pinch salt 1 cup oil 4 tablespoons butter 1 pinch clove 6 cups flour
0270cd52cb.recipe: preheat oven to 300 degrees. combine all the ingredients in a large bowl and knead the dough well. divide the dough into three equal parts. place on a lightly floured surface and roll the pieces to about 1 cm thick. cut out 2 inch rounds with a cutter. place the rounds on a lightly greased baking pan. brush the tops with water and sprinkle with sugar. bake for one hour.

0171e3b99b.title: cheese filled crepes
0171e3b99b.ingredients: 3 1/2 ounces pepper crepes mix 3 ounces cheese, grated 3 tablespoons butter 1/2 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons milk 3 1/2 ounces mushroom 2 1/2 ounces cream 1/2 clove 1 onion, chopped 1 egg oil for frying chopped parsley
0171e3b99b.recipe: prepare crepes according to package instructions, using two 1/3 cup portions. in a bowl, combine cheese, butter, salt and milk. stir until smooth. set aside. using the same bowl, make the fillings. cook the mushrooms in boiling salted water until tender. drain and set aside. add cream to the mushrooms and cook on low heat for 5 mins. in a skillet, fry the onion, garlic and parsley in the oil until browned, stirring frequently. in a bowl, mix the mushrooms, cream, onion mixture, and cheese mixture. grease a round cake tin and arrange 1/3 cup of mixture in the bottom. brush with egg. pour the remainder of the filling mixture on top. roll up the tin and press together firmly. cut crosswise into 1/2 slices. place in a steamer and steam for about 10 mins. serve hot.

0223fd0361.title: simple cheese dip
0223fd0361.ingredients: 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 c. grated sharp cheese 1/2 tsp. butter 1/2 tsp. salt 3/4 c. milk
0223fd0361.recipe: blend cheese with butter. add milk. add salt and pepper. mix well.

00c96ba499.title: sugar cookies
00c96ba499.ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 3 c. flour 1 1/2 tsp. salt 3/4 c. butter or margarine 1 1/2 tsp. baking_soda 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. nutmeg
00c96ba499.recipe: combine sugar and egg together until creamy. add dry ingredients and mix thoroughly. add extracts and mix well. shape into balls using a tablespoonful of dough. place balls about 3 inches apart on lightly greased cookie sheet. bake 8 to 10 minutes in 350 oven. yields 6 dozen.

02556bcd56.title: sweet potato puree with cheese
02556bcd56.ingredients: 400 grams sweet potatoes 3 tbsp sugar 25 grams cheese 2 tbsp heavy cream 1 tbsp milk 1 tbsp butter
02556bcd56.recipe: peel the sweet potatoes, and cut into 1 cm cubes. add the sugar to a small sauce pan, and heat over low heat. it will turn to a sugar slurry when the ingredients start to bubble. when it becomes sticky, turn the heat off, add the cheese, and mix the cheese together with a rubber spatula. add the heavy cream, milk, and butter, and mix everything together. add the sweet potatoes, and mix well. transfer to a tray, and cool in the refrigerator. after cooling, wrap in plastic wrap and enjoy in the meantime. you can also use these sugar coated sweet potatoes for the caramel version. for those who don t have chocolate cheese, add 1 tablespoon of cocoa powder to the cheese to make it thicker, and mix in 2 tablespoons of chocolate powder.

0169b972b4.title: quesadilla
0169b972b4.recipe: in a large skillet, melt 1/2 cup of cheese over medium heat until melted. spread a spoonful of chili on the center of the tortilla. then add a spoonful of cheese. fold in half. cook on one side until golden brown. use spatula to turn and cook on other side until golden brown. repeat with remaining ingredients. serve hot with salsa and sour cream.

015dabf338.title: fruit cake
015dabf338.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 1/4 c. butter 1 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. milk
015dabf338.recipe: melt butter and mix sugar, flour, cinnamon and salt. add egg, milk and butter and mix well. bake 30 minutes at 350.

021b2d9c0e.title: baked clam roe with a bit of cheese roe
021b2d9c0e.ingredients: 1/2 kilo clams small 1 krazy pepper 3 slice sliced cheese 4 tbsp oil 1/2 tsp salt 1 clove 1/2 onion, chopped 1 tbsp soy sauce 1 egg 1 tbsp lemon juice 1 parsley for garnish
021b2d9c0e.recipe: cook the onion in olive oil for a few minutes. add the shichimi spice, and then add the crayfish roe. cook for a few minutes. add the grated cheese and cook for a minute more. set aside to cool. chop the parsley and boil. mix all the ingredients together well. put the mixture in the jar of a blender. add the extra virgin olive oil and kool aid if needed. blend until smooth. put it in a bowl and garnish with parsley. these are the clams in the sauce

020d66e26e.title: taylor s fruit cobbler
020d66e26e.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1/3 c. butter 2 tbsp. flour 1/8 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 2 c. milk or water
020d66e26e.recipe: mix all ingredients in order given. top with 1 pint fruit. bake at 375 for 35 minutes, or until brown.

005c236d80.title: mushroom stew
005c236d80.ingredients: 1 lb. mushroom caplets or stems 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 large onion 2 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1 whole clove 2 tbsp. butter 1/2 c. broth 1 large carrot, chopped 2 tbsp. flour 1 tsp. thyme 1 tsp. parsley, chopped
005c236d80.recipe: chop or grind mushrooms. saute onion in oil until soft add mushrooms and cook for 10 minutes or until onion is golden. combine mushrooms with broth, salt, clove, carrot and thyme. bring to boil cover and simmer for 10 minutes. blend flour in water and add to mushroom mixture. cook for 2 minutes. add parsley and serve.

0039c547a7.title: pork mince
0039c547a7.ingredients: 500 grams minced pork 1 pepper, green 1 onion 3 tbsp oil 3 tsp salt 2 clove 2 tbsp soy_sauce 2 carrot, peeled and cut into matchsticks 2 cloves garlic 1 cup broth, chicken or vegetable 2 tbsp grated ginger 1 tbsp flour 1/2 tsp turmeric
0039c547a7.recipe: add oil, salt, black pepper and cloves. saute minced pork, onion, and garlic until the onion is golden. add soy sauce, ginger, broth, flour, and turmeric. mix well. add meat and fry until browned. cook 10 12 minutes. stir occasionally. serves 2 i hope you enjoy

004ce368d7.title: indonesian gyoza
004ce368d7.ingredients: squid pepper 1 large onion, sliced 2 tbsp. oil 2 tsp. salt pinch of clove soy_sauce carrot 2 cloves garlic, chopped 1/4 c. broth 1/8 tsp. ginger 1 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. turmeric
004ce368d7.recipe: clean and clean squid. cut in 1/2 inch pieces. cut onion in 1/2 inch slices. pour oil into a pot. add ginger, garlic, salt, turmeric and onions. stir until onion is translucent. remove onions from pot. add squid, carrot, soy sauce and sliced pepper to onions. stir and cover for about 2 minutes. stir and cover. let it cook for about 7 minutes. when squid is tender, stir in broth and let it thicken on low heat. do not let boil. mix ginger and flour and add to squid. cover and let it cook 5 minutes.

00d6ef85cc.title: veal drippings
00d6ef85cc.ingredients: 1 tbsp. pepper 1 large onion, chopped 1 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1 clove 3 tbsp. butter 2 c. broth from bone in veal 1 small carrot 3 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. thyme 1/2 c. parsley 3/4 c. stock 1/2 lb. sliced mushroom
00d6ef85cc.recipe: add butter and oil to a 6 quart pot. melt over medium heat. add flour, parsley, salt and pepper. stir until flour is well mixed with butter and oil. add 1/2 cup broth stir. add chicken broth and simmer for 20 minutes. add onions and mushrooms. simmer for 20 minutes or until veal is tender. add stock, carrot and parsley simmer another 10 minutes. serve over rice.

017e1170c4.title: fish a la julie
017e1170c4.ingredients: 4 pieces of sea scallops 1 pepper sm. 1 medium onion 2 tbsp. oil 2 tsp. salt 1 clove 2 tbsp. butter 1 c. broth 1 small carrot 2 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. thyme 1 tsp. parsley 1 c. stock mushroom, sliced or sliced
017e1170c4.recipe: in heavy skillet, saute onion and scallops in oil until lightly browned. add 1 cup broth, salt and clove, then cover pan and simmer about 1/2 hour. dice carrot and carrots in large cubes and cook in another pan. blend 1 cup broth and flour. add to skillet and cook over low heat, stirring constantly. add remaining broth and vegetables. cover and cook about 15 minutes. serve over fish and sprinkle with parsley.

019887186a.title: ghoul ghoul
019887186a.ingredients: 2 cups water 16 ounces ghouls bourbon 4 ounces lime juice ice 1 ounce vodka orange lemon
019887186a.recipe: mix bourbon with water. add bourbon. stir well. add lime juice. pour over ice. garnish with citrus slices.

02046a92a9.title: eileen s corned beef casserole recipe
02046a92a9.ingredients: 1 c. cooked chicken, diced 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1 c. cheese, diced 1 med. onion, diced 1 med. potato, grated 2 tbsp. butter 1 teaspoon salt 1 c. lowfat milk 1 clove, minced 1/2 c. cream 1 tbsp. broth 1 can sm. mushroom or possibly other kind optional 1 can stewed beef, cut fine
02046a92a9.recipe: cook onion in butter till tender add in broth, mushrooms and beef. simmer 5 min. stir in lowfat milk, salt, pepper and clove. stir in diced potatoes. place in buttered casserole and bake at 350 degrees for 30 min. sprinkle with cheese and bake 5 min longer. this can also be made in a casserole.

022d55ec4a.title: apple crumble pie
022d55ec4a.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 3/4 cup flour 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 cup butter 1/4 tsp baking_soda 1/4 tsp baking_powder 1/2 tsp apple extract 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 1/4 tsp cinnamon
022d55ec4a.recipe: preheat oven to 350 add all ingredient to large bowl and mix well pour into prepared pie crust bake for 45 minutes

025aa13ae3.title: snickerdoodles
025aa13ae3.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 3/4 c. flour 1/2 c. butter or margarine 1/8 tsp. salt 1 tbsp. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon or nutmeg
025aa13ae3.recipe: mix ingredients. drop by teaspoon onto cookie sheet. press down with fork. sprinkle with nutmeg or cinnamon. bake at 400 for 8 minutes.

010263ca24.title: nanny s chip cookies
010263ca24.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 cup flour 3/4 cup butter 1/4 tsp salt 1 cup chips 1/2 tsp baking_soda 1 tsp extract 1/2 tsp vanilla 1/2 tsp baking powder 1/2 tsp cinnamon
010263ca24.recipe: cream butter and sugar add in egg add in rest of ingredients stir well put cookie dough onto parchment paper and flatten place in oven for 10 12 mins at 350, then take out of oven and let cool for 5 mins. take out of oven and let them cool completely.

00d7dd0892.title: pan fried chicken and dumplings
00d7dd0892.ingredients: 1 teaspoon pepper 3 1/2 4 lbs chicken, cut into pieces 2 tablespoons salt 1/8 teaspoon clove 1 medium onion, cut into chunks 1/4 cup oil 1/4 cup butter 2 teaspoons paprika 1/8 teaspoon thyme 2 cups flour
00d7dd0892.recipe: place chicken pieces in a large pot. add 6 cups water, seasoned salt, cloves and pepper. bring to boil. reduce heat. cover and simmer 1 hour. in a medium saucepan, fry onion in the oil until golden. drain off excess oil. add the butter. in a medium bowl, mix paprika, thyme and flour. add to frying onions. add water to frying pan to make a thick sauce. add 1 tbsp to boiling mixture. return to boil. spoon 2 tbsp into bowl with paprika mixture. drop by spoonfuls on top of simmering chicken. cover. simmer for 15 20 minutes.

001243534a.title: ancho meat sauce recipe
001243534a.ingredients: 1 x poblano pepper 1 x onion 1 x tomato 1 x clove 1 tbsp. oil 1 tsp salt 1 c. broth or possibly bouillon 1 tsp cumin 1/2 tsp thyme 1/2 tsp parsley 1/2 tsp oregano 1/4 tsp garlic pwdr
001243534a.recipe: chop pepper and onion. dice tomato. saute/fry in oil till tender. add in pepper and onion, salt, cumin, thyme, parsley, oregano, garlic pwdr and broth or possibly bouillon. simmer till tender.

01611a82ea.title: caramel candy
01611a82ea.ingredients: 4 c. sugar 1 c. milk 1 c. cream 1/4 lb. butter 1 tsp. extract
01611a82ea.recipe: combine all ingredients in heavy saucepan. cook until firm ball forms in cold water. remove from heat. cool 10 minutes. beat with spoon until glossy, smooth and shiny. spread into buttered pan. chill before cutting.

0196c92329.title: stuffed red bell pepper
0196c92329.ingredients: 1 red bell pepper 1 small onion 4 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. clove 2 cloves garlic, peeled 1 c. broth chicken or beef 1 small carrot 1 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. thyme leaves 1 1/2 tbsp. flour
0196c92329.recipe: remove stem from pepper. bake at 400 for 15 minutes. set aside. chop onion. brown in oil. add carrot, salt, thyme, cloves, garlic and roasted pepper. continue cooking and stirring until tender. add flour to thicken. add broth to make one cup. cover and continue cooking for 10 minutes. remove peppers. fill with filling. place 4 halves on foil and top with a cup of sauce. place on oven rack. bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes.

00b89cc1f4.title: crumb topping
00b89cc1f4.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg, slightly beaten 1/4 c. butter or oleo 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. flour 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
00b89cc1f4.recipe: sift the dry ingredients, then add the egg and sugar which have been mixed together. add the butter, mix well and pour into a 9 inch pie plate, which has been lightly greased and floured. bake at 350 for 35 minutes. cool and cut into wedges.

00db93f537.title: ham cheese roll ups
00db93f537.ingredients: 3 slice processed cheese 1 mayonnaise 1 egg 1 salt and pepper 1 panko 2 slice sliced bread 1 onion 1 slice ham 1 tbsp heavy cream 1 oil
00db93f537.recipe: mix the mayonnaise, egg, salt, pepper and a generous amount of water in a bowl and mix well to make the mixture smooth. cut the bread into slices as shown in the photo. mix the ham and onions in a bowl, and then let it sit for 5 minutes so that the flavors soak in. put the cheese mix on the slices of bread, spread it out and then roll it up. i used a wooden stick to press the ham in to the bread. heat some oil in a frying pan, and fry the ham rolls. when both sides are golden brown, it s done. the ham roll rolls are delicious when you break them apart into smaller pieces.

0258deade2.title: stuffed peppers
0258deade2.ingredients: 5 pepper 1 slice cheese 1 tomato 2 tbsp. oil 1 onion 4 to 5 tbsp. mayonnaise salt and pepper juice of 1/2 lemon
0258deade2.recipe: cut peppers in half and put with a pinch of salt in boiling water for about 3 minutes. drain, remove stem, and set aside. slice onion, tomato, cheese and oil. season with salt, pepper and lemon juice. stuff peppers with cheese mixture. arrange in baking pan and bake for 10 to 20 minutes at 350.

00a58e0180.title: elk steak
00a58e0180.ingredients: 1 lb lean steak pepper 1 onion oil salt clove garlic juice parsley, chopped
00a58e0180.recipe: cut the steak into pieces. marinate in salt, pepper, onion, garlic, clove, lemon juice and parsley. pour over steak to coat all pieces. fry in oil until brown on each side.

024eb62bc7.title: cream of potato soup
024eb62bc7.ingredients: 1/2 cup peeled cubed potato 1/8 teaspoon pepper 1/2 cup diced onion 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 cup chopped carrot 1/4 cup butter or 1/4 cup margarine 4 cups broth 1 cup chopped celery 1/4 cup flour 1/8 teaspoon clove 1 teaspoon parsley 1 teaspoon thyme 2 cloves garlic, minced
024eb62bc7.recipe: boil the potatoes with onion, salt and carrots for about 30 minutes, drain. mix flour with butter and add broth, garlic, and all the spices. cook for a few minutes, then put back in pot. blend and bring to a boil.

01bbfa015c.title: garlic steak with garlic mayo sauce
01bbfa015c.ingredients: 8 slice sliced steak 1 dash pepper 3 tbsp mayonnaise 1 dash salt 1 dash juice 1 tbsp oil 1 tbsp butter 1 clove 1 parsley
01bbfa015c.recipe: slice the steak into strips, and coat the meat in the mixture of the ingredients. heat oil in a frying pan, and add the slices of steak. saute quickly over high heat. when both sides are nicely browned, add the garlic. when it becomes fragrant, add the juice, and simmer while taking care not to burn it. when the sauce has been reduced by half, season with salt, and sprinkle with minced parsley. top with minced chives before serving. this is also delicious with chicken, turkey and rice.

021a74b4b8.title: yum yums
021a74b4b8.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. butter 1 tsp. extract 3 c. quick oats cinnamon and sugar mixture, to roll cookies in
021a74b4b8.recipe: heat together sugar, milk, butter and extract. boil for 2 minutes, stirring frequently. remove from heat. add oats. drop from a spoon onto wax paper, sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar mixture.

01db1dec63.title: spiced pound cake
01db1dec63.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 2 1/2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 4 tbsp. butter 2 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 2 1/2 tsp. baking_soda 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 c. oil 1 1/4 c. milk 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla
01db1dec63.recipe: beat egg and sugar until fluffy. add oil, butter and flavoring. add flour alternately with milk and baking powder. sprinkle with cinnamon. bake in bundt pan in moderate oven at 350 for 45 to 50 minutes.

00cc328770.title: no bake cheesecake
00cc328770.ingredients: 340 grams sugar cake mix 300 grams cottage cheese 250 ml cool_whip 1 tbsp heavy cream 1 tbsp evaporated milk 1 egg 1 tbsp butter
00cc328770.recipe: preheat oven to 180c. mix cake mix and butter until smooth. spread the batter evenly on a cupcake tin with liners. bake for 30 minutes. after 15 minutes, sprinkle sugar evenly on the top. allow the cake to cool completely. beat cottage cheese until well blended. add egg, heavy cream and evaporated milk and mix together. the mixture will be quite runny. beat well, and pour mixture into a pound cake mold. bake for a further 25 30 minutes. remove from oven and leave to cool. when cool, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate. if using a pound cake mold, cut it up into a nice rectangular shape. use a toothpick to poke holes on the cake while it is still in the mold. the holes are important because the cheesecake is baked firmly. it will be soft, and will not take on any colour. once cooled, pour the cheesecake mixture onto the top of the cake. chill in the refrigerator. enjoy.

0093c3ec41.title: italian pepper sauce
0093c3ec41.ingredients: 1 medium pepper 1 small onion 1 tomato, diced 1 clove salt and pepper 3 tbsp. oil 3 tbsp. chopped parsley 1 tsp. oregano 1 or 2 cloves garlic
0093c3ec41.recipe: put pepper and tomato into a saucepan with clove, salt, pepper, oregano, parsley, onion and garlic. add enough water to cover meat. boil at medium heat until done approximately 1/2 hour. serve over pasta.

010fbf4e3f.title: hot wings w/ lemon butter sauce
010fbf4e3f.ingredients: pepper, ground 4 lbs chicken wings, halved 2 tablespoons oil 1 1/2 teaspoons salt 1/2 teaspoon clove 2 tablespoons butter 1/2 cup juice 1 small onion, minced 1 garlic clove, minced
010fbf4e3f.recipe: preheat oven to 350. in a large bowl, combine oil, garlic, salt, and pepper. add wing tips and toss to coat. spread chicken on a baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes or until light brown. in a small bowl, combine butter, juice, and onion. spoon about 1/3 of butter sauce over wing tips and cook for 15 20 minutes more until chicken is light brown and cooked through. sprinkle with additional salt and pepper to taste.

0169650e73.title: mom s chicken
0169650e73.ingredients: 14 teaspoon pepper 14 lb chicken 1 tablespoon oil 12 teaspoon salt 1 pinch clove 4 tablespoons butter 14 cup juice 14 cup onion, chopped 14 teaspoon garlic powder
0169650e73.recipe: brown chicken in oil. cover and cook 25 minutes. turn. cook 30 minutes. combine drippings, salt, butter, juice, onion and garlic powder and pour over chicken. cover and cook 15 minutes longer.

00594aae85.title: cheese soup
00594aae85.ingredients: 1/2 pepper 1 c. cheese, grated 1 tbsp. butter salt to taste 1/2 c. milk 1 small onion, finely chopped 1 c. cream 1 c. broth 1 whole clove 2 tbsp. flour 1 4 oz. can mushroom pieces parsley
00594aae85.recipe: add cheese to butter. melt over low heat. mix in flour and blend. add broth and milk. heat, stirring constantly. add chicken, salt, pepper and mushroom pieces. bring to a boil. serve at once. add parsley when serving.

0050eb2f27.title: cheese tomato stuffed poblano pepper
0050eb2f27.ingredients: 3 pepper 6 slice cheese 1 tomato 1 oil 1 tbsp minced onion 1 egg 1 salt and pepper 1 clove
0050eb2f27.recipe: cut the peppers in half. and take out the seeds and membranes, and slice into bite sized pieces. spread minced onion on the pepper. spread the cheese on top. place a tomato slice on top of that, and season with salt and pepper. dip the pepper pieces in the mixture, then dip them into the egg, and press the edges together to seal. heat oil in a frying pan, fry the peppers to seal, then serve.

00285184ba.title: sand cookies
00285184ba.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1 stick butter 1 tsp. baking_soda 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 1/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. extract 1/4 tsp. vanilla 1/8 tsp. nutmeg
00285184ba.recipe: cream sugar, egg and butter. sift dry ingredients together. add to creamed mixture. add vanilla, nutmeg and extract. roll small portions in fine granulated sugar. bake for 8 to 10 minutes in 350 oven. yields 2 dozen.

01ce9e3193.title: no bake cookies
01ce9e3193.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 cup chocolate chips, semi sweet 1 stick butter 1 tbsp cinnamon 1 tsp extract 2/3 cup milk pinch of salt 1 tsp vanilla 3 cups oats
01ce9e3193.recipe: bring milk to a boil. add butter, oats, cinnamon, vanilla, salt, vanilla, and chips. once sugar has melted, stir well. let it cool a little. drop by teaspoonful onto wax paper. let it cool.

02109fb196.title: cinnamon choc chip cookies
02109fb196.ingredients: 3 c. sugar 1 small pkg. chocolate chips 1/2 c. butter 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1/2 c. milk 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. vanilla 3 c. oats
02109fb196.recipe: heat sugar, butter, milk, cinnamon, salt and vanilla in saucepan. bring to a rolling boil for 1 minute. remove from heat and add oats. drop by teaspoon onto wax paper.

006602ed69.title: onion stuffed grilled cheese sandwich
006602ed69.ingredients: 1 each green and red pepper 1 cheese 1 mayonnaise 1 onion 1 slice bread 1 oil
006602ed69.recipe: clean up the green pepper and cut into small pieces. put the pepper, cheese, and mayonnaise in a bowl. add a tiny bit of a little water if a little thin. dice up your onion and put in a bowl. cut off the crust off your bread and butter it. add the onion and pepper mixture to the bread. put both sides together. grill on a grill for about a minute on each side.

017b027a71.title: fried cheese burgers
017b027a71.ingredients: 1 8 ounce package bob evans hot spicy pepper and onion cheese 1 12 lbs cheese, grated 1 egg 1 teaspoon salt 1 medium onion 12 cup breadcrumbs oil for frying flour for dusting garlic powder for frying
017b027a71.recipe: mix cheese and flour with a fork. add egg, salt and garlic powder. mix thoroughly. cut onion and mix into mixture. mix well. let stand for 15 minutes. heat oil in skillet and drop mixture by tablespoonfuls into hot oil. cook on medium heat until golden brown. turn over when golden brown on both sides. serve hot with sour cream.

006553e58b.title: roquefort and onion patties
006553e58b.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded 4 ounces roquefort cheese 1 egg salt and pepper 34 cup onion, chopped 34 cup breadcrumbs 2 tablespoons oil 14 cup flour 12 teaspoon garlic powder
006553e58b.recipe: peel and dice jalapeno pepper. add roquefort and blend with egg, salt and pepper and onion until smooth. add enough breadcrumbs to make a ball. shape into six patties, then roll in flour. fry in oil, turning once until golden brown. when done, remove from skillet and place on a paper towel lined plate to drain. serve with steak or chicken.

025bb3d465.title: baked kielbasa
025bb3d465.ingredients: 4 knuckle boneless kielbasa pepper cheese cheddar, etc. oil salt 1 clove 1 medium onion, cut into small pieces 3 tbsp. butter 1/2 c. broth or 1 bouillon cube 1 sprig thyme parsley 1 small can mushroom, drained 2 tbsp. flour
025bb3d465.recipe: trim fat from kielbasa and sprinkle with salt and pepper. brown in fat in skillet. add flour and stir. add mushrooms and broth or bouillon cube, then seasoning. cook slowly until tender. add garlic and cook 5 minutes longer. place meat into casserole dish. grate cheese and place over meat. cover with sauce. bake at 350 for about 40 minutes.

0270863cdb.title: swedish steak
0270863cdb.ingredients: 1 lb round steak, cut 1/4 inch thick 1 sliced pepper 1 sliced onion 1 tablespoon oil salt 1/4 teaspoon clove 1 sprig parsley 1 tablespoon juice 1 garlic clove, chopped fine 1/4 cup vinegar
0270863cdb.recipe: brown steak in oil. place onion and peppers on top and cook 15 minutes longer. add remaining ingredients and cook slowly 10 minutes longer.

0062ecba72.title: chocolate cookies
0062ecba72.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 2 sticks butter, softened 1 tsp. baking_soda 1 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. cinnamon
0062ecba72.recipe: cream sugar and butter. add egg. beat well. stir in flour, baking powder, salt, extracts and cinnamon. chill for 20 minutes. roll to 1/4 inch thickness on a lightly floured board. cut with 2 inch round cutter. bake on a greased pan at 375 for 10 minutes or until light brown.

02731ae87a.title: iced tea with citrus zests
02731ae87a.ingredients: 10 cups water, divided 1 ounce fresh orange juice ice 12 lime, juice of 12 lemon, juice of 2 tablespoons fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
02731ae87a.recipe: in a large bowl, combine 10 cups water, orange juice, mint leaves and lime juice. refrigerate 1 2 hours. in a large pitcher, combine remaining water, lemon juice and ice. serve over ice.

00514430c3.title: baked ziti
00514430c3.ingredients: 8 pepper rings 1/2 to 1 cup grated asiago cheese 4 to 5 slices tomato 1 tbsp. oil 1 small onion 1 bag ziti pasta 1 clove 1 egg, beaten salt and pepper to taste 1 tbsp. oregano parsley basil
00514430c3.recipe: preheat oven to 350 degrees. cut 1/2 to 1 of tomato into quarters. saute onion and garlic in oil until golden brown. combine cooked pasta, onion, garlic, salt and pepper, oregano, parsley and basil toss together. pour into a buttered baking dish and sprinkle with asiago cheese. arrange tomato and egg slices on top. bake for 1/2 hour, or until cheese bubbles. cut remaining tomato into slices and place on top. return to the oven and bake about 15 minutes longer or until tomatoes are heated through.

0222895cb5.title: spinach salad salad
0222895cb5.ingredients: 2 tbsp. pepper 4 tbsp. mayonnaise 2 tbsp. finely chopped onion 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese salt to taste 2 pkg. frozen chopped spinach, drained 6 strips bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled 3 tbsp. vinegar 3 tbsp. juice 2 tbsp. finely chopped parsley 1 tbsp. oil
0222895cb5.recipe: prepare the spinach, onion and crumbled bacon. mix all ingredients except the bacon together in a bowl. add the bacon crumbles to the salad and blend thoroughly.

022d4937e2.title: pancakes
022d4937e2.ingredients: 2 tbsp. sugar 1 egg 1 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 1 tbsp. oil 1 tbsp. butter
022d4937e2.recipe: mix all ingredients together except butter. when well mixed, add butter. heat skillet and pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake. when bubbles pop, flip and cook until done.

0161b6a28d.title: old fashion apple pie
0161b6a28d.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3 tbsp. butter 1 tbsp. flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 2 pie crusts
0161b6a28d.recipe: mix together butter, egg and sugar. mix dry ingredients together. add flour mixture to creamed mixture alternately with milk. pour into pie crusts and bake at 400 for 10 minutes. reduce heat to 350 and bake until set.

02395eefb0.title: hot and spicy mayonnaise
02395eefb0.ingredients: 1 3 fresh hot pepper 1 mayonnaise sundae spread 2 tbsp oil 1 salt 1 kikkoman jar juice 1 garlic 1 clove 1 onion 1 parsley optional 1/2 tsp vinegar optional
02395eefb0.recipe: mix all the ingredients. for the spicy mayonnaise mix the ingredients. if you are using a jar, mix well. pour the mayonnaise into a jar and whack the lid of the jar. once the mayonnaise has cooled down, it s ready to use.

0118ce719d.title: chinese salad dressing
0118ce719d.ingredients: 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 c. mayonnaise 1/2 c. oil 2 tsp. salt 1/4 c. vinegar 2 tbsp. juice 1 small onion, chopped
0118ce719d.recipe: mix together all the ingredients, except onion. add onion last. store in an airtight container in the refrigerator. shake well before serving.

022195ecfe.title: potato cakes
022195ecfe.ingredients: 1 dash pepper 1 large potato 2 tsp. salt 1 tbsp. butter 1 tbsp. oil 2 tbsp. flour 1 clove 1 medium onion 1 egg
022195ecfe.recipe: mix all ingredients together well. place on a lightly oiled griddle. cook until brown on both sides and serve hot.

01359c5c38.title: swiss steak with fried onions
01359c5c38.ingredients: 1 1/2 lbs round steaks, cut in 8 pieces pepper 1/2 cup cheese, grated 1 egg, beaten 1 teaspoon salt flour, for dusting 1 onion, thinly sliced 1 cup milk oil, for frying breadcrumbs
01359c5c38.recipe: cook the steak in a heavy skillet or skillet until lightly browned on all sides. remove from pan and set aside. to the pan add the butter, and lightly saute the onions until tender. sprinkle with salt and pepper. mix the flour into the cheese, onion, egg, and milk. in the same skillet put in a little oil, and the steak. if necessary add a little more flour to make a firm batter. dip the steak pieces in the batter. roll them in the breadcrumbs. fry the steak pieces in hot oil about 3 minutes on each side. remove from pan and drain.

00c6be2b40.title: london broil with lima beans
00c6be2b40.ingredients: 1 1/4 lbs london broil steak about 1 inch thick 14 teaspoon pepper 1 tablespoon onion, chopped 2 teaspoons oil 1 teaspoon salt 1 whole clove 1 garlic clove, crushed 12 teaspoon paprika 1 cup lima juice or 1 cup white wine 1 teaspoon parsley, chopped
00c6be2b40.recipe: with a sharp knife, slice both sides of the meat in a very thin diagonal cut, 1/4 inch thick. put into a bowl or ziploc bag, add the remaining ingredients and toss well or close bag with nylon tie or string and tuck in. marinate, covered, in refrigerator several hours or overnight. remove the meat and place it on a rack over a broiler pan. broil about 4 inches from heat about 10 minutes, turning once. this makes good leftovers.

0142afebf3.title: samosas
0142afebf3.ingredients: 2 c. grated sharp cheese 1/2 c. onion, grated 1 large tortilla 1 small tomato, chopped 1 clove, crushed 2 c. cooked ham or beef oil cream or sour cream salt and pepper
0142afebf3.recipe: fry onion with garlic and ham. make cream with cream and add salt and pepper. in flour, wrap tortillas with meat and cheese mixture. bake for 15 minutes at 400. this is a good recipe for the kids to help with.

0101e24b4e.title: osso buco
0101e24b4e.ingredients: pepper 1 onion 1 tbsp. oil salt 1 clove 1/4 stick butter 1 pkg. mrs. luz broth 2 slices of carrot
0101e24b4e.recipe: heat butter and oil in pan. add a layer of mrs. luz, then add onions that are chopped. when onions are almost cooked, add seasonings and meat, then cover with broth. simmer at least 1 hour. serve over cooked noodles.

009d0c5350.title: asparagus casserole
009d0c5350.ingredients: 2 10 oz. pkg. frozen asparagus spears 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. cheese 1 c. milk 2 tbsp. butter 3 tbsp. flour 1 tsp. salt 1 c. cream 1 tbsp. chopped onion 1 egg, well beaten
009d0c5350.recipe: slice asparagus and cook in boiling water for 5 minutes. drain and place in buttered casserole. combine the cheese, butter, flour and seasoning. stir in milk. cook until thick and smooth. add cream and cook until smooth. stir over asparagus. combine onion and egg. spread over top of casserole. bake at 350 for 25 to 30 minutes.

00234a6bd1.title: no bake cinnamon oatmeal cookies
00234a6bd1.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/4 c. milk 1/4 c. butter 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 2 c. quick oats nutmeg
00234a6bd1.recipe: cook sugar, milk, butter, salt and cinnamon until it boils. add oats and stir. drop by teaspoons onto foil to cool. if you like, sprinkle with nutmeg.

0173816f72.title: apple sauce
0173816f72.ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. juice 1 apple, cored and chopped 1 tsp. cinnamon
0173816f72.recipe: combine sugar, juice, apple and cinnamon in saucepan. bring to a boil. reduce heat simmer 10 minutes. serve warm over gingerbread.

023d31a613.title: baked pie
023d31a613.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 2 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 2 c. milk
023d31a613.recipe: mix all ingredients together, except milk and butter. add butter. pour into pie crust and bake at 350 for 1 hour or until brown.

00fc3fbe32.title: strawberry honey
00fc3fbe32.ingredients: 7 c. sugar 1 qt. strawberries 3 c. juice 1/4 tsp. cinnamon
00fc3fbe32.recipe: place sugar in a bowl add 1 cup water, 1 pint strawberries and 3 cups juice. place in saucepan and bring to a boil. boil until jelly begins to thicken, then remove from heat. add 1 cup juice and cinnamon. put in jars and seal.

002152a50f.title: naan indian style vegetarian thai
002152a50f.ingredients: 1 naan 12 poblano pepper, minced 12 onion, diced 2 tablespoons oil 1 pinch salt 12 clove 1 garlic clove, crushed 12 carrot, peeled and diced 1 tomato, chopped 2 tablespoons broth 1 teaspoon ginger 2 tablespoons flour 12 teaspoon turmeric 1 chili, seeded and chopped 1 teaspoon cumin
002152a50f.recipe: in a dry pan, fry the peppers and onions until golden brown, about 8 minutes. add salt, clove, garlic, carrots, tomato and 2 tbsp of broth. bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. while the mixture is simmering, mix the flour, turmeric, chili and cumin together and add to the carrots and onions. stir well, then add the remaining broth. bring to a boil and let boil for 5 minutes. serve with rice. i think garlic bread was also nice with this dish. you can make the vegetable curry by simply adding chicken or turkey and marinating it, or substituting beef broth for the water in step 2.

01a819822e.title: meatloaf recipe
01a819822e.ingredients: 1/2 c. finely minced pepper, 1/2 c. salt 1/4 c. finely minced onion 1 pound minced beef 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 c. breadcrumbs, dry 1 tbsp. worcestershire_sauce 1 egg 1 teaspoon paprika 1/4 teaspoon chili 1/2 teaspoon celery seed 1/4 teaspoon garlic pwdr
01a819822e.recipe: use 3/4 c. minced pepper and 1/2 c. minced onion. mix rest of ingredients and put in loaf pan. bake at 350 degrees for 50 min. serves 5 6.

006f57f687.title: cinnamon cookies
006f57f687.ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 stick butter 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1 pkg. yeast 1 tsp. cinnamon
006f57f687.recipe: cut butter in small pieces. set aside. in mixer, mix sugar, butter, egg and salt. dissolve yeast in 1/4 cup warm water. mix into sugar and eggs. chill and roll into walnut size balls. roll in 1/2 cup sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon. place on greased cookie sheet. brush with melted butter. bake at 350 for 15 to 20 minutes.

00d84a5b0a.title: asparagus, cheese and oyster mushroom sauce
00d84a5b0a.ingredients: 100 grams asparagus 1 pepper 1 the rest of the cheese 2 tbsp oil 1 butter 2 clove 100 ml heavy cream 1 salt and pepper 1/2 each mushroom 500 ml milk
00d84a5b0a.recipe: boil the asparagus in lightly salted water with the pepper until it is cooked to your liking. slice the mushrooms into bite size pieces. fry the mushroom slices in butter, oil and olive oil. when the mushrooms are wilted, add the heavy cream, then simmer. season with salt and pepper. arrange on a plate. cut the cheese into cubes and sprinkle on top. enjoy.

024487bad9.title: mushroom chowder
024487bad9.ingredients: 1 pound pepper steak, diced 6 ounces, weight gruyere cheese, diced 2 tablespoons oil 1 tablespoon butter 1/2 clove 1/2 cups cream 1/2 teaspoons salt 1 1/2 pound mushroom, sliced 1 cup milk
024487bad9.recipe: in a medium saucepan, stir fry meat in 1 tablespoon of oil and 1 tablespoon of butter until almost done. transfer meat to a strainer set over a bowl. pour in the milk, add salt and pepper, bring to boil. pour over the hot water. stir in the gruyere cheese. cook until cheese is completely melted. do not boil remove from heat and add the remaining 1 tablespoon oil, garlic clove, cream, and mushrooms. serve hot. i like this with croutons to go along with the creamy mushroom broth.

01d277be34.title: cheese and onion pancakes
01d277be34.ingredients: 1 1/2 c. pepper corns 3 c. grated cheddar or monterey jack cheese 1 1/2 sticks butter 1 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1/2 c. flour 3 tbsp. minced onion 1 egg 2 tbsp. oil 1 c. cream
01d277be34.recipe: heat oil. mix flour, egg, milk and pepper corns. spread mixture in greased frying pan. saute onions until soft in the butter. add 1 stick of butter, grated cheese, salt, onion, cream and flour mix well. pour over hot pancake mixture. cook on low for 12 to 15 minutes.

01f4d6a260.title: crock pot black pepper grilled chicken
01f4d6a260.ingredients: 1 cup pepper black, red, or black i used a mixture. 1 whole chicken or chicken parts 1 tablespoon sea salt 1 tablespoon clove 1 tablespoon oil 1/2 cup butter 2 teaspoons rum extract 1 1/2 cups juice i used a crock pot tomato juice. it was much tastier 1 onion, chopped 3 garlic cloves
01f4d6a260.recipe: preheat crock pot or crock pot to low. rub whole chicken with sea salt, pepper, and clove. add oil, butter, and rum extract to crock pot, and season with sea salt and pepper. place chicken pieces in crock pot, and pour in garlic and onion. cook on high for 3 to 4 hours, or low for 6 to 8 hours. place chicken on a platter, and serve with a side of rice. enjoy

01bae51010.title: doughnuts
01bae51010.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1/3 c. butter 3 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. extract 1/2 c. milk 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
01bae51010.recipe: cream sugar and butter until fluffy. add egg. add the dry ingredients, flavoring and milk alternately. roll out on floured board. cut in circles. drop into hot oil.

020b66936d.title: chile con salsa
020b66936d.ingredients: 2 tbsp. minced jalapeno pepper 2 tbsp. minced onion 3 tbsp. oil 2 1/2 c. diced tomato 1 clove 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tbsp. vinegar 1/2 c. juice 1/2 tsp. basil 1/2 tsp. cilantro 1/2 tsp. parsley 1/2 tsp. cumin
020b66936d.recipe: saute onion in oil until soft. add pepper and continue to saute. add remaining ingredients and cook over medium heat until mixture thickens. makes about 1 1/2 cups. this recipe can be doubled.

002e6cc0eb.title: chicken parisienne
002e6cc0eb.ingredients: 2/8 tsp. pepper 1 2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken 1 tbsp. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 clove 1 medium onion 1 garlic clove 1/2 c. juice parsley
002e6cc0eb.recipe: wash and cut chicken in serving pieces and sprinkle with salt and pepper. in a small saucepan, heat oil, then brown chicken pieces on both sides, turning until golden brown. place in shallow casserole. cut onion in thin julienne and mince garlic. add to chicken. add juice. cover and bake in 325 oven for 1 1/2 hours or until tender. sprinkle with parsley. serve with rice or noodles.

00ee340c74.title: easy sugar chicken
00ee340c74.ingredients: 1 tablespoon sugar 1 broiler fryer chicken, cut into serving pieces salt and pepper 1 tablespoon oil 1 teaspoon garlic powder 1/8 teaspoon clove 1 small onion, thinly sliced 2 tablespoons butter or margarine paprika
00ee340c74.recipe: rub chicken pieces with sugar rub chicken pieces with salt and pepper. in large skillet over medium high heat, heat oil add garlic powder, clove, and onions. cook and stir for 2 minutes. add chicken pieces and cook, turning frequently, until chicken is tender and juices run clear. in small bowl, combine butter and paprika. serve with chicken.

00202f23e5.title: tofu in a tofu cream sauce
00202f23e5.ingredients: 1 block tofu 1 pepper 2 slice cheese 1 oil 1 butter 1 clove minced garlic 50 ml heavy cream 1 krazy salt 1 panko 1 bouillon cube 200 ml meat stock / stock
00202f23e5.recipe: put a small amount of oil in a frying pan. fry the minced garlic and ginger. add the sliced cheese, pepper and salt and stir fry until the cheese has melted. add the step 2 meat stock and the water, and let simmer. once the sauce has thickened, add the cream and stir to mix. add salt and panko and mix to taste.

0226067af9.title: cheese wrapped beef steak
0226067af9.ingredients: 2 lbs beef steaks london broil pepper 1/2 lb cheese 1 egg 1/4 cup onion, chopped 1 1/2 lbs beef, steak salt and pepper 1/2 cup breadcrumbs 2 cups oil, for frying
0226067af9.recipe: cut steaks into 3 pieces. put into plastic bag with cheese and onion. shake to coat meat in egg and bread crumbs. put each piece in a pan and pan fry. do this till done. i usually cook in a large skillet or frying pan.

01ae28d68c.title: chicken with a kick
01ae28d68c.ingredients: 1 3 lb chicken, cut up in pieces or 4 chicken thighs pepper, to taste 1 onion, peeled, sliced 1 teaspoon salt 1 carrot, peeled, sliced oil 1 garlic clove, crushed 1 whole clove 3 tablespoons butter 1 cup broth 1 cup celery, sliced 2 tablespoons flour 1/8 teaspoon thyme
01ae28d68c.recipe: sprinkle chicken with pepper and brown in small amount of oil. remove chicken from pan. add remaining oil to skillet with garlic and clove cook until garlic begins to brown. add broth, celery, salt and pepper. bring to boil. add chicken, cover, simmer for 1 hour or until tender. remove chicken from sauce keep warm. pour sauce from skillet in pot and cook until very thick. blend in flour, cook over low heat until smooth. add chicken and simmer 15 minutes. serve topped with sour cream or whipped cream.

01dd64d147.title: bratwurst recipe
01dd64d147.ingredients: 4 bratwurst 1/4 tsp pepper 1/2 sm onion, minced 2 tbsp. oil 1 tsp salt 1 x clove 1 x garlic clove 1/2 c. juice 1/4 c. fat for frying, lard or possibly dripping for deep frying
01dd64d147.recipe: wash, dry and cut sausages into 3/4 inch slices. cut peppers into half inch strips. combine all ingredients in small saucepan. add in 1/2 c. water. cover and simmer over low heat for 2 hrs.

007720029f.title: greens salad with blue cheese
007720029f.ingredients: 4 5 romaine lettuce leaves 1 pepper 1 teaspoon crumbled blue cheese 2 tablespoons oil 12 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon vinegar 1 teaspoon juice 1 pinch grated onion 1 pinch parsley 1 clove
007720029f.recipe: wash and cut the lettuce into bite sized pieces. put them into a bowl and add the smashed cloves and pepper and set aside. put the other ingredients in a sauce pan and heat and pour the hot sauce over the salad.

00938c8b63.title: mom s boiled sweet potatoes
00938c8b63.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 3 c. cooked, mashed sweet potato 3 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/4 c. scalded milk 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. nutmeg
00938c8b63.recipe: combine all ingredients, mixing well. turn into greased 2 quart baking dish. bake in a 350 oven until golden brown, about 30 minutes. makes 6 servings.

009d4f782e.title: fig cobbler
009d4f782e.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 egg 1 cup flour 2 tbsp butter 1 pinch salt 1/2 cup milk 3 tsp baking_powder 3 figs cinnamon, brown sugar, lime juice, cream, strawberries
009d4f782e.recipe: mix above in a large bowl. pour 1/2 into 9x13 baking dish bake at 350 degrees for 30 min

00288dc007.title: ritz cracker crumbs
00288dc007.ingredients: 8 oz. ritz crackers 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. small curd cottage cheese 4 tbsp. butter or margarine 1/4 tsp. salt 1/4 c. milk 1 tsp. cinnamon
00288dc007.recipe: preheat oven to 375. grease a pie dish. crush crackers to small size. put on bottom of dish. mix the next 5 ingredients together. mix well, then pour over crackers. bake for 30 minutes.

0173bb1f2d.title: meat balls recipe
0173bb1f2d.ingredients: 300 gm meat balls 1/8 tsp pepper 1 onion 1 tsp salt 1 carrot 4 tbsp. oil 1 1/2 tbsp. soy_sauce 1/8 tsp clove 1/2 tsp garlic pwdr 1 tbsp. vinegar 1/2 tsp ginger 1 tbsp. flour 1/4 tsp paprika
0173bb1f2d.recipe: mix ingredients for the sauce with electric mixer. coat the meat and spices. heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the meatballs. keep turning to brown all sides. cook for about 7 min on low flame and serve immediately. add in the sauce mix and coat meatballs well.

003991406d.title: lamb stew
003991406d.ingredients: 1 lb. round steak 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 small onion, sliced 2 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1 whole clove 1 tbsp. butter 1 c. broth 1/8 tsp. thyme parsley
003991406d.recipe: pound steak slightly. sprinkle meat with salt and pepper. brown meat in oil. remove meat. to skillet, add 1 tablespoon butter and onion brown well. return meat to skillet. add thyme, broth, parsley, salt and clove. cover and cook slowly for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. serve with cooked rice or noodles.

004ac39841.title: pig s feet
004ac39841.ingredients: 1 pig s feet 1/8 teaspoon pepper 1 onion, sliced and separated 2 tablespoons oil salt 1/8 teaspoon clove 1 tablespoon butter 1 cup broth 1 pinch thyme parsley to taste
004ac39841.recipe: cut the pig s feet in four equal parts. slash the pig s feet several times with a sharp knife. sprinkle with salt, pepper and the thyme. cook the onion in hot oil for about five minutes. add the pig s feet and salt and cook for five minutes, turning them over. add the chicken broth and cook for about 20 minutes. add the cloves. cook about 10 more minutes. sprinkle with chopped parsley. serve with egg noodles or mash potatoes.

008452f58e.title: potato soup
008452f58e.ingredients: pepper 1 large potato, pared and chopped 1 medium onion, chopped 1 tbsp. butter or margarine 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tbsp. flour 1 clove 1 1/2 c. milk 1 1/2 c. broth chicken or vegetable 1 c. chopped celery 2 tsp. parsley 1 carrot, peeled and grated
008452f58e.recipe: brown pepper and chopped onion in butter in medium saucepan. stir in flour, salt, pepper and clove. mix well. gradually stir in milk and broth. bring to boiling, stirring constantly. add vegetable and simmer until vegetables are tender. yields 6 to 8 servings.

0256a9c07d.title: spiced chicken
0256a9c07d.ingredients: 1 teaspoon pepper chicken pieces 1/4 cup oil 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon clove 1 teaspoon garlic paste 2 tablespoons juice 1 tablespoon soy_sauce 2 tablespoons vinegar
0256a9c07d.recipe: mix together, let stand 1 hour in refrigerator. pour over chicken and bake 400 degrees for 30 minutes, then 1 hour longer.

0257fa7c9c.title: baked stuffed peppers with tomatoes in a cream sauce
0257fa7c9c.ingredients: 1 whole pepper 1 ounces, weight mozzarella/parmesan cheese 1 whole egg 1 whole tomato 3 tablespoons oil 1 whole small onion 1 1/2 tablespoon whole milk 1 clove 3 tablespoons cream basil leaves salt and pepper, to taste
0257fa7c9c.recipe: preheat the oven to 400 f. wash the pepper, remove stems and seeds and lightly season with salt. stuff them with half the mozzarella/parmesan cheese, half the egg, and a tomato slice. heat oil in a pan. add onion and saute for 2 3 minutes. add pepper and saute for another 2 3 minutes. add the milk, clove and cream and stir. put the pan in the oven for 20 minutes. when done, take the pan out and let the peppers cool. once cooled, transfer to a food processor or blender and puree. season with salt and pepper. serve the tomato sauce with the peppers on top. this recipe is for a 2 large pepper. serve the peppers as the main main course or as a side dish

0136612497.title: mama s cinnamon tea cakes
0136612497.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 3/4 c. butter dash of salt 2 tsp. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1/2 tsp. vanilla
0136612497.recipe: mix sugar and butter. add egg, beating well. add milk and dry ingredients alternately, beginning and ending with dry ingredients. drop by teaspoonfuls on greased and floured baking sheets. bake 10 to 12 minutes at 400. makes about 3 dozen.

0162ef73d6.title: glazed apple wedges
0162ef73d6.ingredients: 1/4 c. sugar 3 tbsp. honey 1 1/2 tbsp. butter 1/4 tsp. cinnamon dash of salt 2 1/2 c. apple, peeled and sliced
0162ef73d6.recipe: heat sugar, honey, butter, cinnamon and salt in a skillet over medium high heat until sugar is melted and mixture is bubbly. stir in apples until well coated and cook 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. spoon apples in individual serving bowls. sprinkle with cinnamon and serve warm. makes 8 servings.

01f02355e7.title: ginger chicken
01f02355e7.ingredients: 1/4 tsp pepper 1 chicken 2 tsp oil 1/2 tsp salt 1/4 clove 1 tbsp soy_sauce 1 1/2 tbsp grated ginger 1/2 tbsp grated garlic 2 tbsp vinegar
01f02355e7.recipe: boil 1 cup of water. boil chicken for 4 5 minutes strain water and add oil, soy sauce, garlic, ginger and salt, bring to boil and cook for 1 minute. put chicken in the pan with vinegar and cook for 2 3 minutes on low heat until all is done. chicken will be done in the next step

00d5837dfe.title: chorizo and spinach balls
00d5837dfe.ingredients: 500 g ground chorizo 1 tsp pepper 1 cup cheese, shredded 1 egg, beaten 1 tsp salt 1 small onion, finely chopped 1/2 cup breadcrumbs 2 tbsp oil 1 tsp garlic 1/2 tsp clove 2 tbsp flour 1 tsp paprika
00d5837dfe.recipe: heat 1 tbsp of the oil in a frypan and fry the onion till soft and lightly browned. set aside. put the chorizo into a bowl. stir in the bread crumbs and season with a little salt, pepper and paprika. mix well. shape into balls the size of a walnut. coat with flour and add to the frypan. cook for 4 minutes on each side. add 2 tbsp oil and garlic to the frypan and fry the mushrooms for 2 3 minutes. drain on a kitchen towel. heat the remaining oil in the frypan and fry the chorizo balls for 4 5 minutes. serve.

0012733d1d.title: breakfast waffles
0012733d1d.ingredients: 1 teaspoon sugar 1 whole egg 3/4 cups flour 1/2 teaspoons salt 3/4 cups milk 2 teaspoons baking_powder 1 teaspoon oil 1 teaspoon butter
0012733d1d.recipe: mix together first 4 ingredients. add milk and mix until moistened. add baking powder and oil. mix together. pour approximately 1/2 cup of batter onto preheated waffle iron. cook until golden brown. while waffle iron is cooking, melt butter and drizzle over waffles. if you d like to add sugar, just skip the sugar and add cinnamon.

0205d6584e.title: pound cake
0205d6584e.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1 egg 1/2 c. butter 1/4 c. cream 1 tsp. extract 1/4 c. milk
0205d6584e.recipe: cream sugar and butter. add egg and beat well. add cream and milk. beat well. add extract. put in cake pan and bake for about 25 minutes at 350.

00d60adfbe.title: onion rings
00d60adfbe.ingredients: 1 pinch pepper 10 slices cheese thick slices 1 egg, beaten 12 teaspoon salt 1 cup breadcrumbs oil 1 large onion, sliced 1 cup milk
00d60adfbe.recipe: place pepper slices in small bowl. put cheese slices on top. roll the slices in beaten egg and then in the crumbs. deep fry in hot oil until browned. place onion slices on a plate. when fried, put the sauce of cheese on top of the onion rings, sprinke with some salt and pepper. serve.

00963fd9b3.title: steak gizzard, scallops
00963fd9b3.ingredients: 1 large gizzard, cut into 1/2 inch slices pepper to taste 1 tsp. chopped onion 1 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. clove 1 clove crushed garlic 1 tsp. juice 2 tbsp. butter
00963fd9b3.recipe: place gizzard in frying pan and saute with chopped onion and pepper for 4 minutes on medium heat. add salt, clove and crushed garlic. add 1 teaspoon of lemon juice and butter. simmer for 20 minutes. remove gizzards. add 1 teaspoon lemon juice and 1 teaspoon crushed garlic. cook for 5 to 8 minutes on medium heat. add 2 teaspoons lemon juice and 1 teaspoon crushed garlic. cook for 1 minute, stirring. keep warm.

01a810c5b0.title: stuffed peppers in cream cheese sauce
01a810c5b0.ingredients: 1 pepper 1/4 to 1/3 slice cheese or ham 1 oil 1 egg 1 salt 1 clove or scallion 1 parsley
01a810c5b0.recipe: remove the stems from the pepper. stuff the pepper with ham, cheese and egg. sprinkle with salt, pepper, garlic, and parsley. close with toothpicks, and fry.

013ac761c1.title: fried chicken with cloves
013ac761c1.ingredients: 2 tablespoons sugar 1 large cut up chicken salt 3 tablespoons oil 3 tablespoons butter 1 clove, crushed flour
013ac761c1.recipe: sprinkle chicken on all sides with salt and rub together with sugar. heat oil and butter in a heavy skillet until hot. add clove and brown it lightly on all sides. sprinkle each chicken piece with flour and fry it about 3 minutes on each side, or until it is nicely browned. remove the chicken and keep it warm. place the fat left in the skillet over medium heat and cook the chicken about 3 minutes. then, spoon off all but about 2 t of it. add 2 t of water and cook, covered, until tender.

00ff81ddbe.title: egg bread
00ff81ddbe.ingredients: 2 tbsp. sugar 1 egg, beaten 4 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 2 pkg. dry yeast, dissolved in 1/2 c. hot water 2 tbsp. oil 1 1/2 c. milk, scalded 1 tsp. baking powder
00ff81ddbe.recipe: combine sugar, oil, egg and yeast dissolved in water. cool to lukewarm. stir in flour, salt and baking powder. put dough in a greased bowl. cover with a damp cloth let rise in a warm place, free from drafts, for 1 hour. punch down let rise again for 30 minutes. divide into 3 parts. shape each part into a round loaf. place each loaf on greased baking sheet. let rise for 1 hour or until almost double. bake at 425 for 15 minutes or until golden.

021fd4ee97.title: granny s christmas cookies
021fd4ee97.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 egg 2 cup flour 1/8 tsp salt 1/2 cup butter 2 tsp baking_powder 1 tsp cinnamon
021fd4ee97.recipe: mix ingredients. bake at 350 for 12 15 minutes. mix remaining ingredients and roll out in 1/8 inch thick circle. cut into 1/8 thick slices. spread 1 2 tbs of filling between slices. bake for 10 minutes. cool.

00cf67af34.title: braised cabbage recipe
00cf67af34.ingredients: 1 lrg head cabbage 1 x jalapeno pepper 1 med onion 2 tbsp. oil 1/2 tsp salt 1 x clove 1 x garlic clove 1 c. broth
00cf67af34.recipe: trim and tear cabbage into small pcs. chop jalapeno and onion. combine with spices and fat. pour broth into pan and bring to boil. reduce heat and simmer for 1 1/2 hrs.

00b66af2e3.title: spinach dip
00b66af2e3.ingredients: 1 package chopped spinach fresh 1/2 cup pepper i use dried 1 cup mayonnaise 1/2 cup chopped onion 3 ounces crumbled blue cheese 1 tablespoon salt 1/4 cup vinegar 1/4 cup oil 1/4 cup chopped parsley 2 tablespoons juice of 1/2 lemon 2 tablespoons minced garlic 2 cups diced celery
00b66af2e3.recipe: mix all ingredients together and chill overnight. to make this a little thinner, i keep stirring often. serve with vegetables or crackers.

003868aa58.title: beef roulade
003868aa58.ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. tenderized sirloin steak 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 small onion, minced 2 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1 whole clove 2 tbsp. butter 3 tbsp. broth 1 carrot, finely chopped 1 tbsp. parsley, chopped 1/4 c. stock or water 1/4 tsp. thyme 1 tsp. flour
003868aa58.recipe: roll steak in flour, salt and pepper. brown in oil, then remove and place in casserole. saute onion and carrot in butter. add 1 tablespoon broth or water, 1 tablespoon broth or water and remaining ingredients. cover and simmer 1 hour. pour off excess fat. stir in flour. slice thin and place on meat. bake at 350 for 15 minutes. turn and baste. bake 15 to 20 minutes longer or until tender.

00f381a442.title: oriental sweet and sour pork
00f381a442.ingredients: 2 tsp. sugar 3 tbsp. sake 2 tsp. soy_sauce oil for deep frying 3/4 lb. pork, cut in 1/4 inch strips ginger 1 egg, beaten 2 tsp. cornstarch clove garlic
00f381a442.recipe: cut pork in 1/8 inch strips. put beaten egg in a mixing bowl. mix in soy sauce, cornstarch, garlic and ginger. add in pork pieces. mix well and marinate 30 minutes. drop meat into hot oil, cooking one piece at a time, turning to brown both sides. drain on a paper towel. heat oil in wok until hot. add cloves, garlic and pork and stir fry for 5 minutes. add sake and soy sauce mixture and cook until thickened. serves 4 to 6.

006499997c.title: chicken patties
006499997c.ingredients: 1 hot pepper 2 tbsp. cheese 1 egg 1 tbsp. oil 1 medium onion 1 1/2 c. cooked chicken 1/4 c. breadcrumbs salt and pepper 1 clove
006499997c.recipe: mix egg, salt and pepper with bread crumbs. add onion, chicken and chicken to eggs. form patties. saute onion and pepper until browned in oil. fry in pan until crisp and golden. remove from heat and roll in cheese. place in baking dish and bake until heated through.

007af0d070.title: apple raisin crunchy bars
007af0d070.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1/2 cup honey 1/2 cup butter, softened 1 tablespoon cinnamon 3 cups quick cooking oats 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 cup chopped apple 1 cup raisins 3/4 cup flour
007af0d070.recipe: preheat oven to 350 degrees f. in a medium bowl combine sugar, honey, butter and cinnamon. stir in oats and salt. add apples, raisins and flour. stir until well combined. press mixture into a greased 8 x 8 pan. bake for 45 minutes.

00d0ef89aa.title: baked pasta
00d0ef89aa.ingredients: cheese tortilla chopped onion pasta chopped tomato salsa basil oil cream
00d0ef89aa.recipe: boil noodles with oil until soft, drain, add a little salsa, pasta and onions. put tortilla on pan, top with tomato and basil. add some cheese, add another layer of pasta, cheese and tomato and last a second layer of cheese. put cream on top. cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes, remove foil, bake for another 10 minutes, cut into squares and serve.

01fce3243b.title: beef steak and gravy
01fce3243b.ingredients: 2 lbs round steaks 1 jalapeno pepper, diced 1 onion, diced 1 tablespoon oil salt and pepper 1 tablespoon clove 2 garlic cloves, crushed 4 cups juice
01fce3243b.recipe: slice round steak. pound beef with a meat mallet. salt and pepper meat. add oil to a pan. brown steak on both sides. add diced onion and jalapeno pepper. add garlic. then add the chilies. add salt and pepper. add 4 cups of juice. cover with lid and cook till beef is tender.

01723a7bc7.title: pot stickers, eel, etc
01723a7bc7.ingredients: 1 large hunk green pepper 1 large onion 1 cup oil 1 cup soy_sauce 2 tbsp grated ginger 1/2 tbsp minced garlic 1 tbsp clove 1 salt and pepper to taste 1 1/2 tbsp cornstarch 1 medium carrot, cut into pieces or sliced
01723a7bc7.recipe: chop off the top of pepper for steaming. cut it into bite size pieces. shred the carrot. remove the skin from the onion. chop the onion into large chunks and then add to the pot. heat oil and then add the pepper and onion. stir fry for about 10 minutes. add all other ingredients and cook over medium heat. in a c., mix 1/2 cup water with 1/2 tbsp cornstarch. add to pot. stir and cook for about 2 minutes or until thickened.

00100336d5.title: new mexico bean soup
00100336d5.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper 1 large onion, diced 1 medium tomato, diced 1 clove, cracked up with your fingers or garlic press 12 lb beef, ground 1 teaspoon salt 12 cup carrot, diced 2 garlic cloves, crushed 3 cups broth vegetable 1 cup celery, diced 2 cups beans, canned cooked 1 tablespoon cumin 12 chili 1 teaspoon thyme 14 cup parsley, chopped
00100336d5.recipe: saute first 7 ingredients. add all other ingredients and bring to a boil. simmer for 30 minutes.

0027f74f8c.title: beef chow mein
0027f74f8c.ingredients: 3 lb flank steak 1/4 tsp pepper 1 onion, sliced 2 tbsp oil 1/2 cup soy_sauce 1 clove, smashed 1 dash salt and pepper 1/2 cup broth 1 carrot, chopped 3 tbsp butter 1/2 tsp ginger, grated 1 garlic clove, minced 4 tsp cornstarch
0027f74f8c.recipe: cut steak into 1 1/2 squares. in pan melt butter and sautee carrots, ginger and garlic. add steak and vegetables. pour in broth and soy. cover and simmer 25 minutes. combine cornstarch with 1/2 cup water and add to meat. stir well and simmer until thickened.

013a602350.title: cheeseburger pie
013a602350.ingredients: 1 c. cheese 1 egg, well beaten 1 small onion, diced 1 small jar heinz roast beef salt and pepper to taste 1 c. milk
013a602350.recipe: combine cheese, egg and onion. add roast beef, seasonings and milk. mix well. spread in a 9 inch pie pan. bake in 350 oven for 50 minutes. the pie is baked when a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.

01f2446be2.title: sweet and sour meatballs
01f2446be2.ingredients: 1/3 c. sugar 1 egg salt and pepper to taste 1 onion, minced 1 lb. beef, ground 2 tbsp. oil 1 clove minced garlic paprika to taste worcestershire_sauce flour
01f2446be2.recipe: mix first 6 ingredients together and make into bite size meatballs. fry in oil. when brown, combine 1/4 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt and dash of pepper. stir into pan. pour in the worcestershire sauce. stir until mixed. cook on low heat for 15 minutes. serve with rice or noodles.

02051ee355.title: cream of potato soup
02051ee355.ingredients: 1/2 tsp. pepper 3/4 lb. potato, cubed 2 tbsp. butter 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. chopped onion 2 c. milk 1 c. broth 1 clove 2 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. thyme 1 c. cream 1 diced carrot parsley
02051ee355.recipe: melt butter add flour and stir until smooth. gradually add milk and broth. add rest of ingredients. cook until vegetables are tender.

0072adb793.title: hungarian goulash recipe
0072adb793.ingredients: 1 lg. pepper, minced 1 lg. onion, minced 2 tbsp. salt 1 sm. carrot, minced 2 tbsp. oil 2 garlic cloves, chopped 1 whole clove 1 tbsp. flour 1 teaspoon paprika 1 tbsp. vinegar 1/2 teaspoon celery seed 3 lbs. beef 1/2 teaspoon thyme
0072adb793.recipe: cut beef into 1 1/2 inch pcs. boil in large kettle till tender. add in chopped onion and carrot, garlic and cloves. cook 10 min and add in flour, salt and paprika. stir till flour is smooth. add in beef, vinegar, onion, celery seed, thyme and water. cover and cook till thick, about 25 min. serves 4.

018eccab7e.title: tomato pasta for kids
018eccab7e.ingredients: 2 slice cheese 1 slice onion 3 slice pasta 3 tomato 1 basil, parsley, oregano, salt, pepper, and parsley 1 tsp oil 1 tsp cream 1 clove 1 egg
018eccab7e.recipe: fry onion in oil until translucent. add pasta. break egg in pot. add cream, clove, salt, pepper, and 1 teaspoon of parsley. mix it with a whisk. add tomatoes to frying pan, stir, then cover it with a lid. simmer for five minutes. cook pasta in a separate pot. when pasta is almost done, drain off the excess water. add cooked pasta to frying pan. add chopped basil, cheese, and salt and pepper to taste. mix it in it should melt easily. serve with a green salad, and you have a tasty meal

01dcf100f8.title: ice cream sweet or cold
01dcf100f8.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 2 c. milk 1 can cream or milnot 1 tbsp. coffee
01dcf100f8.recipe: heat all ingredients together. pour into ice cream freezer. stir several times. freeze. remove at least 1/2 hour before serving.

00dcba8857.title: caramel custard
00dcba8857.ingredients: 1 tbsp. sugar 1 c. milk 1 c. cream
00dcba8857.recipe: place all ingredients in a food processor or blender. mix at medium speed until thick and smooth. pour into a small pan and cook slowly at low temperature until mixture starts to bubble. turn heat off and allow to cool. serve with a nutmeg crack. serves 1.

01ce84652c.title: mrs. mae delmon s hot chocolate with syrup
01ce84652c.ingredients: 1/4 cup sugar 3 cups milk 1 4 ounce package instant hot chocolate mix 1 cup cream
01ce84652c.recipe: mix sugar, milk and chocolate mix until dissolved. heat milk on stove. slowly add hot milk mixture to hot milk mix. mix well and add ice cream to mix in ice cream maker.

0012806b36.title: whipped berry ice cream
0012806b36.ingredients: 1/4 cup sugar or other soft drink powdered drink mix 1 cup milk 2 cups half and half cream
0012806b36.recipe: mix all ingredients until well blended. pour mixture into ice cream maker, and freeze according to manufacturer s directions. enjoy.

008abf2f5d.title: baked wings with olive sauce
008abf2f5d.ingredients: 1 tablespoon cracked black pepper 1 whole chicken 2 tablespoons oil salt 1 whole clove 2 cloves garlic, peeled 1/2 cups juice 5 whole sprigs fresh rosemary 1/2 cups slivered almonds 1 tablespoon butter
008abf2f5d.recipe: preheat oven to 375 f. place the chicken wings and pepper slivers into a small plastic bag, and rub them all over with the oil. in a small mixing bowl, add salt, clove and garlic. in a large saucepan over medium high heat, boil the water for the marinade. add the marinade, the rosemary and butter. bring the marinade back to a simmer, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes. place the chicken wings onto a baking sheet and bake for 45 minutes. remove chicken from the oven and let it sit for 10 minutes. discard the rosemary and garlic. place the chicken wings back on the baking sheet and bake them for 15 minutes more. then check to see if the wings are done. remove them from the oven and let them cool enough to handle. i like to arrange them on a plate with a spoonful of the basil sauce. serve warm.

001fc91fde.title: mexican breakfast sandwich
001fc91fde.ingredients: 2 slices cheese, swiss, american, or cheddar 1 slice onion 1 slice tortilla 1 tsp. chili 1 tbsp. chopped cooked beef or pork 1/8 tsp. salt 1 egg 1 tomato
001fc91fde.recipe: on tortilla, spoon chili and meat over it. top with cheese, onion, egg, tomato and salt. fold over and heat in microwave.

0121dfda05.title: braised halibut with carrot and onion
0121dfda05.ingredients: 4 halibut fillets pepper onion oil salt clove 1 minced garlic clove broth carrot 2 tbsp. butter
0121dfda05.recipe: fry halibut on both sides in oil. add salt, pepper and garlic. brown and add enough broth to make two cups of liquid. simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. take out of liquid and place in baking pan. add butter and carrots. pour sliced garlic evenly over the mixture. roast in 350 oven for approximately 45 minutes.

01ae8114bb.title: sand tarts
01ae8114bb.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 4 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 3/4 c. melted butter 2 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 2 1/2 tsp. baking_soda 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
01ae8114bb.recipe: stir egg into sugar. add flour mixture. sift together baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and vanilla. add dry ingredients to creamed mixture. drop by teaspoonfuls onto a cookie sheet. bake at 375 for 10 to 12 minutes.

016eb91c64.title: bean stew
016eb91c64.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper 1 onion, chopped 1 tomato, chopped 1 clove 3 tbsp. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tsp. cumin 1 chipotle chili in adobo sauce 1 c. broth 1 carrot, cut up 1 lb. dry beans 1 c. cooked and drained 1 tsp. oregano 1 tsp. minced garlic
016eb91c64.recipe: cook the onion and garlic in the oil for a few minutes. add the rest of the ingredients and simmer for 10 minutes, adding liquid as needed. serves 6.

014cdfee23.title: fish cake
014cdfee23.ingredients: 1 lb firm tofu 14 teaspoon pepper 13 cup mayonnaise 1 small onion, chopped 1 egg, slightly beaten 14 teaspoon salt 12 cup breadcrumbs, divided oil for frying parsley, chopped optional
014cdfee23.recipe: drain tofu press between paper towels to remove excess liquid. coarsely chop. combine tofu, pepper, mayonnaise, onion, egg, and salt, mixing well. stir in 1 cup bread crumbs. shape mixture into six patties. cover and chill 15 minutes. heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. brown patties on both sides remove to a plate. pour off drippings from skillet return patties to skillet. top with remaining 1/4 cup bread crumbs. cook over medium heat about 10 minutes or until patties are golden brown, turning once. garnish with parsley if desired. serve with ketchup and sauce.

004dec22f2.title: homemade tortilla sauce
004dec22f2.ingredients: 2 tbsp. chopped pepper 2 tbsp. chopped onion 3 tbsp. oil 1 large tomato, chopped 1 clove 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. oregano 1/2 tsp. basil 1/2 tsp. cumin 1/4 c. juice 1/2 tsp. garlic 1/2 tsp. chili
004dec22f2.recipe: saute onion and pepper in hot oil until soft. add remaining ingredients simmer about 30 minutes. puree in blender or food processor until smooth. makes 2 1/2 cups.

0272fd4179.title: swiss steak with peach sauce
0272fd4179.ingredients: 2 lbs boneless round steaks pepper, to taste 1 small onion, sliced 1/4 cup oil 1 teaspoon salt 1 clove 1/4 teaspoon garlic, crushed 2 cups peach juice 1/2 cup butter 1/2 teaspoon thyme 1/4 cup flour
0272fd4179.recipe: cut the steak into bite size pieces. cook onions and pepper in the oil. add remaining ingredients except flour and juice. cook on medium low for 1 2 hours. remove onions and garlic. remove all liquid from pan, add flour and blend. bring to a boil. add all juice and heat through. pour sauce over sliced steak and serve.

0238df8567.title: adobo sauce
0238df8567.ingredients: adobo 1/2 teaspoon pepper chicken oil salt clove 1/4 onion garlic juice sprig of parsley
0238df8567.recipe: place in large pan with water and the adobo sauce. let simmer until tender. remove the bones and meat. mash the meat. mix in the adobo sauce.

01ab4b3cbd.title: roquefort or roquefort dip with asparagus
01ab4b3cbd.ingredients: 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/4 lb. cheese roquefort or roquefort, grated 1/3 c. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 1 clove, chopped 1/2 c. chopped parsley 2 tbsp. juice 1 tbsp. finely chopped onion
01ab4b3cbd.recipe: if using roquefort or roquefort cheese, melt in oil in heavy skillet over low heat. add next 3 ingredients and mix thoroughly. serve with asparagus. garnish with sliced onion.

0148520445.title: omelet with fried green peppers
0148520445.ingredients: 12 ounces pepper, cooked green and onion sliced 1 egg salt to taste oil for frying 3 ounces garlic minced 12 teaspoon clove 8 ounces breadcrumbs
0148520445.recipe: wash greens and put in bowl. mash in eggs, salt, pepper, garlic, and cloves. drop in half of breadcrumbs and mix well. heat oil to a medium heat. dip the greens in this mixture and brown them on both sides. add oil as needed.

021b340d28.title: barbecue sauce for beef or pork
021b340d28.ingredients: 3 tablespoons sugar 1 tablespoon grated onion 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 cup oil 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 dash clove 3/4 cup ketchup 1 teaspoon paprika
021b340d28.recipe: blend ingredients together in a blender. bake in covered pot with boiling water on top of stove over medium heat for 1 hour. baste with the sauce periodically. can be stored in freezer or refrigerated until needed.

000731b459.title: swiss cheese pie
000731b459.ingredients: 3/4 c. cheese 1 c. milk 1 egg 1 tbsp. flour 1 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. salt 1 tbsp. cream 2 tbsp. chopped onion
000731b459.recipe: blend cheese, flour, butter, milk, cream and onion. pour into pastry lined pie pan. bake at 350 for 40 minutes. yields 6 servings.

021849bc96.title: chrusciki
021849bc96.ingredients: 1 tbsp. sugar 2 c. cheese 2 tbsp. melted butter 1/2 tsp. salt 1 egg 1 tbsp. oil flour
021849bc96.recipe: mix first 5 ingredients. add enough flour to make stiff dough. roll out on floured surface and cut into desired lengths. cook in hot oil and drain on paper towels. serve hot or cold with syrup.

015961eaf8.title: custard cinnamon tart
015961eaf8.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 1/2 cup butter 1 1/2 cups milk 1/2 teaspoon extract 2 pie crusts or other shells whipped cream optional cinnamon optional
015961eaf8.recipe: mix sugar, egg, butter, milk, and extract. pour into pie shells. bake at 450 f for 10 minutes. reduce heat to 350 f and bake an additional 30 35 minutes. allow to cool at least 3 hours. serve topped with whipped cream and cinnamon. enjoy

013cdc210f.title: cinnamon pudding
013cdc210f.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 2 tbsp. butter or margarine 2 tbsp. flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1/2 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla
013cdc210f.recipe: beat together sugar, egg and butter. mix in flour, cinnamon and salt. add milk. cook over boiling water, stirring constantly, until smooth. cool. add extracts. chill. top with whipped cream.

00abc72790.title: grandma s mcdonalds sugar cookies
00abc72790.ingredients: 2 cup sugar 3 large egg 2 1/2 cup flour 1 tsp salt 1 cup softened butter 1 tsp baking powder 1 tsp baking_soda 1 tsp vanilla extract 1 tsp cinnamon
00abc72790.recipe: preheat oven to 375f mix everything together roll out into balls place on greased cookie sheet. bake 10 12 mins. or til done remove immediately and enjoy

0129b9e5a3.title: salsa adobo
0129b9e5a3.ingredients: 1 whole jalapeno pepper 1 whole onion 3 tablespoons oil 1/4 teaspoons salt 1 tablespoon vinegar 1/4 teaspoons clove 1 whole tomato 2 teaspoons juice 1 clove garlic, sliced or to taste 1 tablespoon cilantro
0129b9e5a3.recipe: heat oil in large pan, and saute the jalapeno and onion until browned. then add salt, vinegar, clove, tomato, garlic, and cilantro. bring to a boil, then add lime juice. simmer for 10 minutes, and serve hot. the salsa is great with your favorite meats. if you cannot find jalapeno peppers, just use fresh.

00d4132175.title: scallops stuffed with black pepper and cheese
00d4132175.ingredients: 1 scallop 1 pepper 1 tbsp black toasted cheese 1 tbsp oil 1 dash salt and pepper 3 tbsp juice 1 dash dried parsley
00d4132175.recipe: combine the salt, pepper, and parsley in a small dish. wash the scallops. pound the edges lightly with a rolling pin. if using shrimp, lightly pat dry. cut each scallop in half lengthwise. cut a slit on the side of each scallop with a knife. mix the black pepper with oil. use to stuff each scallop with black pepper sauce. top with the toasted cheese. place in a oven safe dish and bake for a few minutes in a 375f 170c oven.

00b1995e31.title: sauce
00b1995e31.ingredients: 1/4 tsp. pepper 3/4 c. chopped onion 3 tbsp. oil 1 c. chopped tomato 1/2 clove 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. oregano 1/4 tsp. basil 1/2 c. broth 1/4 tsp. cumin 1/8 tsp. thyme 1/4 c. chopped parsley
00b1995e31.recipe: saute onions, pepper and garlic in oil. combine all ingredients and bring to a boil. cook about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

016c7e235c.title: cheese and mushrooms
016c7e235c.ingredients: 1 pepper 1 small cheese e.g. swiss or american 1 tbsp. oil pinch of salt 1 clove 1 tbsp. butter 1 c. broth 1/4 tsp. thyme 1 small onion parsley
016c7e235c.recipe: wash and dry mushrooms. dry and chop. saute in oil. add garlic and cook until brown. pour into bowl. in remaining oil, saute onions until slightly brown. add chicken broth and simmer about 15 minutes.

0204ccbc88.title: apple pie
0204ccbc88.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 stick butter 1/4 tsp. extract 2 1/2 c. milk 1/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla
0204ccbc88.recipe: mix together in large bowl. pour into 2 deep dish pie shells or graham cracker crust. beat 3 eggs and 1 tablespoon sugar. add to milk. add cinnamon and salt. add butter. mix well and pour into 1 pie shell. bake at 350 for 35 minutes. add nuts and cherries when pie is cool.

00421bfcd3.title: coffee cake
00421bfcd3.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 3/4 c. butter, melted 1 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. extract 1 c. milk 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking_soda
00421bfcd3.recipe: preheat oven to 325. mix well together the sugar and egg. in a separate bowl, mix dry ingredients except for the cinnamon and baking powder. in a large bowl, mix butter and dry ingredients alternating with milk. mix together and pour into a greased 9 x 13 inch cake pan. sprinkle with cinnamon.

01907cf78d.title: the perfect chicken
01907cf78d.ingredients: 14 teaspoon pepper 1 whole chicken 1 teaspoon salt 12 teaspoon clove 2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons margarine 1 3 ounce package lemon jell o gelatin 1 cup juice 1 cup frozen mixed vegetables
01907cf78d.recipe: sprinkle pepper over chicken sprinkle with salt, and cloves. brown the chicken over medium heat on both sides in melted butter. drain off excess fat. add lemon jello and vegetables. cover, reduce heat, simmer 20 minutes. serve over rice.

00a21e20e6.title: vanilla pudding
00a21e20e6.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 2 tbsp. butter 1 c. milk 1 tsp. extract cream or ice cream
00a21e20e6.recipe: cook together the sugar and milk. while this is cooking, put in the beaten egg. continue cooking until it thickens. add the butter and extract. add milk and egg mixture to the prepared pudding. serve with a piece of toasted bread to dip into the pudding.

025961f5ff.title: pound cake
025961f5ff.ingredients: 2 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg, well beaten 1/2 lb. butter 3 c. flour 1 tsp. extract 1 c. milk 1/2 tsp. salt cream
025961f5ff.recipe: mix sugar, egg and salt. add remaining ingredients. bake in tube pan at 350 for 1 hour.

009469e37d.title: caribbean sparkle punch
009469e37d.ingredients: 2 quarts water 32 ounces limeade concentrate or 28 ounces citrus limeade concentrate 46 ounces tangerine juice 7 ounces ice, crushed 1 lime, sliced 1 lemon, sliced 1 teaspoon mint, freshly chopped 1 orange, sliced
