009469e37d.recipe: mix water, limeade concentrate, ice and crushed ice in a large bowl. when serving, use a lime slicer to cut lime, lemon and orange slices and mint. arrange slices of orange, lemon and mint leaves on top.

0204a25e57.title: honey apple oat crisp
0204a25e57.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1/2 cup honey 1/2 cup butter 2 teaspoons cinnamon 2 cups quick oats 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 cup apples, peeled and sliced thin 3/4 cup raisins 3/4 cup flour
0204a25e57.recipe: preheat oven to 350 degrees. lightly grease a square baking pan and set aside. in a large saucepan bring sugar, honey and butter to a boil, stirring constantly until butter has melted. remove from heat and stir in cinnamon, oats and salt until well combined. remove 1/2 cup mixture and set aside for topping. add apples and raisins to oat mixture and combine. stir in flour until dough holds together. pour into prepared pan. dot with reserved oat mixture and gently press together. bake for approximately 25 30 minutes or until apples are tender.

0025ca4eef.title: arroz con queso y habichuelas
0025ca4eef.ingredients: 1 habanero pepper seeded and chopped 1 small onion chopped 2 tablespoons oil salt 1 clove 1 tomato chopped 12 lime juice 1 garlic clove chopped 1 teaspoon cumin
0025ca4eef.recipe: cook and stir to cook onions and garlic in oil. add spices and tomato. simmer uncovered 10 15 minutes. add habanero pepper and lime juice. simmer about 15 minutes longer, remove clove, serve.

00b93c4474.title: apple pie bars
00b93c4474.ingredients: 14 cup sugar 14 cup honey 14 cup butter, melted 1 teaspoon cinnamon 12 teaspoon salt 1 cup flour 1 cup oats 1 cup raisins 1 cup diced apple
00b93c4474.recipe: preheat oven to 350. in a large bowl mix together sugar, honey, butter, cinnamon, salt, flour, oats, raisins, and apple. press firmly into a greased 9x13 pan. bake for 20 minutes. cut into bars while still warm.

01474059e8.title: k n k n s braised short ribs
01474059e8.ingredients: 2 lbs short ribs 1/8 teaspoon pepper 1 large onion, chopped oil salt 1 clove, crushed 1 minced garlic clove 1/4 cup juice 3 tablespoons soy_sauce 1/8 teaspoon ginger 2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons margarine
01474059e8.recipe: brown the ribs. add 1/8 tsp pepper and the onions. brown the meat. combine the juices, salt, cloves, garlic, ginger, soy sauce and butter. pour over ribs. cover and simmer slowly for 2 hours, adding water if needed. reduce the sauce if it is getting too thick. remove the meat from the pan and keep warm. skim off and discard the fat from the sauce. season with salt to taste and the black pepper. to thicken sauce, add water by the tablespoon. reduce to half before adding the ribs, mixing well so that the sauce will not curdle. serve with rice.

0175852d06.title: mushroom pasta
0175852d06.ingredients: 12 pepper rings 4 ounces cheese 1 ounce tomato paste 14 teaspoon oil 1 tablespoon onion, chopped 12 ounces pasta 1 clove 12 teaspoon parsley 14 teaspoon salt 18 teaspoon basil 18 teaspoon oregano 14 cup cream 1 cup mushroom, sliced
0175852d06.recipe: saute onion and garlic in oil over medium heat until tender. stir in tomatoes and their juice, salt, parsley, and seasonings. let simmer 3 minutes. cook pasta, drain and put into a bowl. mix with cream and mushrooms. sprinkle some of the cheese over top of pasta and top with the mushroom mixture. serve with other toppings.

025b51cd14.title: yeast rolls
025b51cd14.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 4 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 2 pkg. dry yeast 1/4 c. oil 1 c. milk baking powder
025b51cd14.recipe: add yeast to 1 cup milk, stirring to dissolve. add beaten egg. mix in 2 cups flour, salt and sugar. mix until smooth and knead. cover and let stand in refrigerator several hours or overnight.

01f6707cf5.title: jalapeno pepper rillettes
01f6707cf5.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper 1 1/2 tablespoon mayonnaise salt oil for deep frying
01f6707cf5.recipe: chop jalapeno. mix in mayonnaise. use the salt to season the mixture if desired. using your fingers, scoop a small amount of the mix onto your hands. it makes about 30 small balls. put in the refrigerator for about an hour to let the flavors blend. heat a pot of oil to 335f. place the balls into the oil and cook for about 2 minutes or until browned. drain on paper towels. if you have time, let the peppers sit for a while. do not let the oil get hot at any point. serve with a sauce of your choice. they are very easy.

0242694490.title: stuffed bell peppers
0242694490.ingredients: 8 pepper 1 cheese 1 onion 1 seasoning 1 sliced beef 1 tomato 1 dash salt and pepper 1 egg 1 oil to fry 1 tsp garlic powder 1 clove
0242694490.recipe: use the same amount of ingredients as for beef, tomato, onion, salt and pepper, garlic powder, and cloves. cut the peppers in half lengthways, and stuff with the mixture. take a glass, and put the meat mixture in the middle. close them up with some toothpicks, and let sit for an hour. heat oil in a skillet. when hot, put the peppers on a paper towel and drain excess oil.

01e1297878.title: red lobster salad
01e1297878.ingredients: 4 6 oz. cleaned and deveined red lobster tails 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 tsp. chopped onion 1 tsp. oil 1/2 tsp. salt dash of clove 1 crushed garlic clove 1/2 c. juice 1 tsp. chopped parsley 1 tsp. vinegar
01e1297878.recipe: soak lobster tails for 10 minutes drain and remove from shells. mix all ingredients in a bowl. let stand for 1 hour or longer before serving. drain well. makes about 2 1/2 cups.

011467d82a.title: roasted squab on spinach with prosciutto and cheese
011467d82a.ingredients: 300 grams squab in the skin 1 pancetta 1 pepper 200 grams cheese 1 oil 1 butter 1 clove 1 onion 50 ml milk 50 grams mushrooms 1 dash parsley 1 tbsp bpd of the bpd. broth 2 tsp salt 1 dash thyme 200 ml heavy cream 2 thinly sliced prosciutto
011467d82a.recipe: preheat oven to 180c. wash the squab in water and remove the excess skin and the tough membrane. slice into thin rounds. sprinkle with salt and pepper and grill in the oven for about 5 minutes. remove from oven and allow to cool. slice the onions and slice the garlic into rings. finely slice the mushrooms. meanwhile, place the oven rack to the middle position. put the mushrooms, minced onions, bbq sauce, and butter in a frying pan, and fry them over low medium heat. add a little salt and pepper to the mushrooms, and mix well. put the squid slices in an oven proof dish, and pour over the mushroom mixture. top with the cheese slices. put the dish into the oven. bake for 8 to 10 minutes and then remove from oven, and transfer to a platter. add the milk and bbq sauce in a saucepan, and boil the liquid down by half. add the parsley and the squid, thyme, and the milk. stir gently, and adjust the seasoning. add heavy cream and blend thoroughly. stir through the prosciutto. pour over the squid. you can use mushrooms, such as creminis, chanterelles, and shiitakes.

017ee02e52.title: mexican style chili soup recipe
017ee02e52.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, minced 1 medium onion, minced 1 med. tomato, minced 1 clove 1 teaspoon salt 6 c. broth 1 carrot, minced 4 beef bouillon cubes 1 celery rib, minced 2 cloves garlic, chopped 1/2 teaspoon thyme, dry 1/2 tbsp. dry parsley 1/8 teaspoon cumin
017ee02e52.recipe: put in crock pot, in order, vegetables and seasonings. cook 8 10 hrs high or possibly 6 8 hrs low. if a stronger flavor is desired, add in 2 tbsp. flour to 1 c. chicken broth. before adding liquid. if necessary add in small amount of water. thicken with cornstarch.

0263123779.title: braised corn with butter, peppers and onions
0263123779.ingredients: 1 whole pepper 1 onion 1 oil salt whole clove 1 butter thyme garlic
0263123779.recipe: cook corn about 20 minutes before done. after about 20 minutes, add salt and pepper, cover pot and cook about another 20 minutes. add onion and thyme, garlic, chopped fine. add oil to pan and simmer 10 minutes. add 1 stick of butter to drippings in skillet. melt until well incorporated. serve with boiled potatoes.

01c71b8a4b.title: katjav afsouka greek cheese soup
01c71b8a4b.ingredients: 1/2 lb cheese 1 onion 1 lb potato, cut in small cubes 1 cup milk 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 tablespoon butter 1 clove 1 tablespoon cream broth, if necessary
01c71b8a4b.recipe: put all ingredients in a heavy saucepan. cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 30 to 45 minutes. strain. for this recipe, use the vegetable broth instead of the milk.

0236202e5e.title: cheesy mushrooms
0236202e5e.ingredients: pepper 1 c. grated sharp cheese 3 tbsp. butter 3/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. minced onion 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. broth 1 clove 1/2 c. cream 1 lb. mushrooms 1/4 c. flour 1/4 tsp. thyme 1 tbsp. minced parsley celery
0236202e5e.recipe: pepper 1 cup cheese and 2 tablespoons butter. saute onion until tender. add 3/4 cup broth and flour. cook 5 minutes, stirring constantly. stir in milk, broth, cream, thyme, parsley, celery and garlic. cook until thickened. add 1/2 cup cheese and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. put in baking dish. top with remaining cheese and bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes.

0191122f33.title: veal cutlets with herb butter
0191122f33.ingredients: 4 large sirloin steaks 18 teaspoon pepper 12 teaspoon instant minced onion salt 14 cup oil 1 garlic clove, crushed 12 teaspoon clove, crushed 3 tablespoons butter, softened 14 teaspoon thyme 2 teaspoons parsley, minced 14 teaspoon paprika
0191122f33.recipe: sprinkle salt and pepper on both sides of steaks. sprinkle onion and garlic on both sides of steaks. brown both sides of steaks in oil, drain. in a separate skillet, brown clove and garlic in butter. add thyme, parsley, paprika and pepper. cook about 2 3 minutes until onions are soft. arrange steaks on plate and pour herb butter over steaks.

01f1abad82.title: turkish dressing for cheese salad
01f1abad82.ingredients: 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 c. cheese, crumbled 3 tbsp. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tbsp. vinegar 1 tbsp. juice 1/2 tsp. grated onion 1 tomato, chopped 1 clove 1/2 tsp. parsley
01f1abad82.recipe: sprinkle cheese over salad. mix all other ingredients and pour over cheese. let sit 20 minutes before serving.

00ba1aea7c.title: the delmonico s cottage cheese ice cream
00ba1aea7c.ingredients: 1 packages powdered sugar 1 large package neufchatel cheese 2 cup whole milk 1 packages cream 1/2 quart cool_whip 1 stick butter
00ba1aea7c.recipe: first let s get out all your ingredients and you will need to melt your butter. in a large mixing bowl, add your ingredients in your order of choice. mix until all ingredients are well blended. pour into a container or ice cream machine. let it mix. in your food processor, chop up your butter and pour it into your ice cream container. this is how i did mine put your ice cream/butter mix in it. put it in the freezer for at least 5 6 hours. that way your ice cream will get ice cream texture. if you dont plan to use a freezer place in a freezer safe container and put in the freezer for 5 hours. enjoy

013e7345b5.title: guatemalan style refried beans recipe
013e7345b5.ingredients: 1/4 sm. pepper, minced 1 sm. onion, finely minced 1 med. tomato, minced 1 med. clove, finely minced 2 tbsp. oil salt to taste cilantro to taste 1 can refried beans 1/4 teaspoon cumin 1 sm. jalapeno, finely minced 1/2 c. juice 1 teaspoon basil 1 teaspoon vinegar chili and jalapeno to taste
013e7345b5.recipe: 1. mix all ingredients together in a bowl, then knead till well blended. 2. let mix stand for 1/2 hour in refrigerator. 3. transfer mix to container and let chill before serving. 4.

0050ec5fc8.title: crispy and spicy squid with stilton recipe
0050ec5fc8.ingredients: 250 g 8.8oz squid fillets 1 pepper corns 200 g 5.3oz smoked cheese 1 tbsp oil 1 pinch sea salt 1 clove 1 dash butter 1 pinch dried thyme 1 pinch parsley
0050ec5fc8.recipe: to make the squid sauce, boil the squid in warm water. season with the salt and pepper while it is boiling. when it is done, remove and rinse under cold water. place in a pan of water and season with salt. after 5 10 minutes, the squid will have softened. make sure you soak the squid in water so that it doesn t become too soft. when it is soft, remove from the water with a slotted spoon. drain it and place on kitchen paper. sprinkle some smoked cheese, to taste, on top. drizzle oil over the top, and sprinkle with salt and garlic powder. put it in the hot oven at 350f/180c for about 15 20 minutes. cut the squid into 8 pieces. in a frying pan, warm some butter over high heat. cook the squid in batches, stirring the butter so it doesn t burn, until it starts to turn crispy. add thyme and parsley, stir, and season with salt and pepper. serve with a scoop of the squid sauce.

007dad458c.title: jamaican style roast chicken recipe
007dad458c.ingredients: 1 tbsp. pepper 1 2 1/2 pound chicken 2 tbsp. oil 1 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon clove 1/4 teaspoon garlic pwdr 1/2 c. juice 1 med. onion 3 tbsp. butter
007dad458c.recipe: cut off all fat. rub pepper and all but 2 tbsp. of chicken pcs inside and out. combine next 6 ingredients and marinate chicken in this for 1 hour. put 1 tbsp. butter on chicken and put onion in cavity. roast at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 15 min. serve chicken pcs topped with onion and butter sauce. if gravy is desired, add in a dash of tabasco sauce.

0143a6cbe3.title: cheese fried chicken
0143a6cbe3.ingredients: 1/4 cup cheese grated 1 egg 1/4 onion 1 chicken breast 1/2 cup cream 2 tablespoons oil
0143a6cbe3.recipe: heat the oil and add the onion and chicken. when the chicken is brown, add the cream and half the egg. once the egg is cooked, turn the heat off. toss the other half of the egg in the chicken and cream mixture, and stir. add the grated cheese. once mixed, remove from the heat and serve.

01bf3922ac.title: annie s sugar cookies
01bf3922ac.ingredients: 1 1/4 c. sugar 1 egg 3 c. flour 1 c. butter 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. milk 2 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla
01bf3922ac.recipe: cream sugar, butter, egg and salt. add baking powder, cinnamon and vanilla. add dry ingredients alternately with milk. put tablespoon size pieces of dough on lightly greased cookie sheet and flatten slightly. bake at 375 for 6 to 8 minutes. when cool, cut into squares. fill with icing.

01490665bd.title: spaghetti squash frittata
01490665bd.ingredients: 1 small spaghetti squash 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/4 c. cheese, grated 1 tsp. salt 1 egg, beaten 2 tbsp. oil 1 tbsp. parsley 2 tbsp. juice 1 small onion, minced
01490665bd.recipe: cook squash in boiling water and 1/2 teaspoon salt until tender, about 15 minutes. drain and cool. cut in half lengthwise, remove seeds and slice into thin pieces. place squash in a well greased dish and sprinkle with salt and pepper. combine remaining ingredients and stir into squash. bake for 30 minutes at 350.

014fab6abe.title: homemade stuffed scallops
014fab6abe.ingredients: 300 grams scallops 15 grams pepper cheese 1 tbsp oil 1 small tomato 1 clove 1 salt and pepper 1 juice 1 dash dried basil 1 lemon 1 parsley to garnish
014fab6abe.recipe: use the reconstituted white wine and pepper from the grapes for the shellfish. add the ingredients into a pot and simmer on low for 1 hour. when the timer goes off, the slits will be red and the juices will run out. let the steam fall to the bottom, then remove the mushrooms. pour the ingredients in a plastic bag and mix well. cut the surface of the scallops lengthwise and remove the veins. place the olive oil and some salt in a pan and cook the scallops on both sides. let them rest for 10 minutes. place the cheese in a heat resistant container, lay the scallops from step 3, top with some of the cream sauce and sprinkle with basil. garnish with parsley.

01de421339.title: baked custard
01de421339.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg, well beaten 1 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 2 1/2 c. milk
01de421339.recipe: mix thoroughly. pour into 9 inch pie pan which has been well buttered. bake at 350 for about 45 minutes or until done. serves 6.

018f84b586.title: salsa puerto rican style
018f84b586.ingredients: 1 large pepper, chopped 1 medium onion, chopped 1 tablespoon oil 1 tomato, chopped 1/2 teaspoon clove 1 teaspoon salt 1 tablespoon vinegar 1/2 juice 1/4 teaspoon basil 1/4 cup cilantro 1/4 cup parsley 1/4 teaspoon cumin
018f84b586.recipe: heat oil, saute peppers, onions and tomato. combine the rest and add to vegetables. simmer 30 minutes. serve as a marinade.

008a20a6dc.title: crepe
008a20a6dc.ingredients: 2 tbsp. sugar 3 slices cheese i prefer to use cheddar 1 egg 1/2 c. flour pinch of salt 1 c. milk 3 tbsp. oil butter or margarine
008a20a6dc.recipe: melt the butter and add in the batter. blend the cheese, sugar and egg together. add the dry ingredients and alternating with milk. cook on a flat griddle.

0169eb583d.title: cinnamon frosting
0169eb583d.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/4 c. evaporated milk 2 tbsp. butter 1/4 tsp. cinnamon
0169eb583d.recipe: mix sugar, milk and butter and bring to a boil. cook for 3 minutes. cool to lukewarm, adding cinnamon. beat until stiff enough to spread.

020e871100.title: spritz cookies
020e871100.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 3/4 c. flour pinch of salt 1/2 c. butter 1 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. cinnamon
020e871100.recipe: mix flour, baking powder and salt. add butter to the dry ingredients. cut in the sugar and egg. mix thoroughly. put in plastic bag. freeze. bake at 400 for 5 minutes, then at 350 for 7 minutes. do not overbake. let cool and take out of bag and cut into squares.

0015f3dbc0.title: cinnamon teacake cookies
0015f3dbc0.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 egg 2 cups flour 1/2 tsp salt 1 cup butter softened 1 tbsp baking_powder 3 tsp cinnamon
0015f3dbc0.recipe: beat butter and sugar until fluffy and fluffy. add beaten egg. mix in baking powder and salt, then add flour until well blended. mix in cinnamon. roll dough out on lightly floured board or plastic wrap. cut into desired shapes and bake for 10 15 minutes at 375 degrees. note don t go to waste it it makes this so delicious

013ee8ae95.title: tomato and pasta casserole
013ee8ae95.ingredients: 75 grams cheese 1/2 onion 200 grams pasta 1 tomato 1 basil leaves 1 clove 100 ml heavy cream 10 grams veg. oil 1 egg 1 salt and pepper
013ee8ae95.recipe: put oil in a pan and saute the onion, chopped tomato, and garlic. season with salt and pepper. add the cream and simmer. add the cheese to melt. add the pasta and eggs. stir until it cooks. season with salt and pepper. it s ready to serve.

0199637966.title: stuffed peppers
0199637966.ingredients: 15 pepper tops 1 slice cheese 1 onion 1 potato 1 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 1 tbsp. milk 1 clove 1 egg 1 tbsp. oil 1 tbsp. cream 1 tbsp. broth
0199637966.recipe: remove the tops of the pepper tops and leave some seeds. chop the cheese. peel and grate the potatoes. melt the butter in the pan. add the grated potato, garlic, onion and 1/2 teaspoon salt, cover and cook over low heat for 10 minutes. season with salt and pepper. remove from the heat and add the milk and egg. pour the mixture into the stuffed peppers and sprinkle with peppers if desired. return to the heat and cook briefly until hot.

014f82ddee.title: coffee cake
014f82ddee.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 1 1/4 cup flour 3 tbsp butter 1 tsp vanilla extract 1/2 cup milk 1 tsp baking_powder 1 pinch salt 1 cup cream, whipped
014f82ddee.recipe: mix butter and sugar. add eggs, vanilla, flour and milk. combine all ingredients except cream until well blended. pour half of batter into greased and floured baking pan. pour on half of the cream. add remaining batter. bake at 350f for 30 35 minutes.

0081b94f5a.title: stewed pork loin
0081b94f5a.ingredients: 2 1/2 lbs pork loin 1 teaspoon pepper 1 large onion 1 tablespoon salt 1 clove 2 garlic cloves 2 cups broth 1 large carrot, peeled and sliced 1 bunch parsley 2 teaspoons thyme 2 teaspoons oil 1 teaspoon flour 1 cup celery 3 tablespoons butter 1 teaspoon paprika
0081b94f5a.recipe: chop or grind the pork and place in the slow cooker. add pepper, onion, salt, garlic clove, broth, carrot, parsley and thyme. cover and cook on low for 10 hours. remove the pork and reserve the liquid. drain the vegetables and discard. return the liquid to the slow cooker and set the pot on the stove, heat. add the flour to the reserved liquid and stir till blended. bring the mixture to a boil, stirring until thickened. add the vegetables and simmer on low, uncovered, for another 1/2 hour. if desired, thicken the gravy with cornstarch, then add the butter and paprika. serve on roasted potatoes.

01a876370d.title: steak and carrots recipe
01a876370d.ingredients: 1 x steak 1/2 tsp pepper 1/4 tsp onion 1 tbsp. oil 1/8 tsp salt 1/8 tsp clove 2 tsp soy_sauce 1/4 tsp ginger 2 tbsp. butter or possibly oil 1 sm carrot
01a876370d.recipe: slice onion and cook in oil. add in steak and brown. add in other ingredients. cover and let cook on medium low heat about 15 min.

00685bf079.title: homemade egg salad
00685bf079.ingredients: 1 tsp pepper 2 tbsp mayonnaise 1 dash salt 1 tbsp oil 1/2 finely chopped onion 2 egg white 1 tbsp dashi soup stock in juice 1 bunch parsley 1 whole clove
00685bf079.recipe: boil 4 eggs in salted water. boil for about 20 minutes. once they have boiled, peel off the shells and chop the eggs. add all ingredients except the oil into a bowl. mix thoroughly and chill. add the oil to a frying pan and cook the eggs over medium heat for 2 minutes. once the eggs are done, add the salt to the bowl to cook them. once you remove them from the heat, cover the bowl to cool them down. cut the garlic clove in half lengthwise. wrap them in plastic wrap and then crush it with a rolling pin. take off the plastic wrap and add the garlic clove. chop the parsley. chop it up and add it to the bowl with the mayonnaise, along with the dashi stock. mix to combine. serve it on plates and top with the egg salad mixture from step 2.

00b3622437.title: lu s spicy fried eggplant
00b3622437.ingredients: 125 g eggplants pepper 1 slice cheese 2 tablespoons oil salt 1 clove 12 small onion 1 egg
00b3622437.recipe: cut eggplants in strips, and place on an ungreased dish. salt and pepper. slice onion and saute in oil and then add to eggplant. drain eggplant and sprinkle with salt and pepper. cover with sliced cheese. brown the cheese and then place on top of the eggplant. scramble egg and cover with a lid. bake uncovered in a 350 oven for about 30 minutes.

017f21404c.title: squash patties
017f21404c.ingredients: 1 qt. cooked mashed squash 1 small pepper, chopped 1 c. cheese, grated 1 egg, beaten 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. breadcrumbs 1/2 c. oil 1 tbsp. flour 1 small onion, chopped 1 c. milk
017f21404c.recipe: combine squash, pepper, salt, breadcrumbs and egg mix well. shape into patties. coat with flour. saute onions in oil until tender and brown. add milk, stirring until smooth. add the cheese and bring to a boil. pour over patties. makes 8 servings.

010b29967c.title: squash patties
010b29967c.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups cooked yellow squash pepper cheese 1 egg salt milk flour 1 onion, diced 1 tablespoon butter 1 tablespoon oil breadcrumbs
010b29967c.recipe: slice squash into rounds and cook until tender, drain. mash squash, add salt, pepper, and flour. blend together with potato masher. shape into patties. dip into beaten egg, then into flour. fry in hot greased pan. drain on paper towel. melt butter and oil in skillet, add onion and stir until translucent. combine all ingredients, mix well. make sure all the squash is covered with mixture. cook over medium heat until thoroughly heated. place in baking dish and sprinkle with breadcrumbs. bake 20 minutes at 350 f.

01a4e9a11b.title: gnocchi with marinara sauce
01a4e9a11b.ingredients: 250 grams gnocchi or more if you want a smooth, thick sauce 1 pepper to taste 50 grams pizza cheese 3 tbsp oil 1 tomato 1 clove 1/2 medium onion 100 grams pasta 1 tsp salt 1 oregano 1 parsley 1 tbsp marinara juice 1 dried basil
01a4e9a11b.recipe: cut the tomato into wedges. crush the garlic and finely chop the onion. heat oil in a frying pan and add the garlic. stir fry. when browned, add the tomatoes, and bring to a boil. cook until the sauce becomes thick. boil the gnocchi. boil some water for the pasta. remove the skin from the gnocchi and fry the pasta until browned on both sides. drain. add the pasta and the sauce to the frying pan with the cooked gnocchi from step 1. season with salt and pepper, oregano, and parsley. add the marinara sauce, and use half a cup from the sauce to make the sauce. add the dried basil and it s done.

01fe94b80f.title: strawberry preserves
01fe94b80f.ingredients: 3 c. sugar 1 qt. strawberries 1 can frozen pink lemonade juice
01fe94b80f.recipe: mix all ingredients. cook and pour into jars. seal. refrigerate. serves 10 to 12 people. this makes a large batch and makes a large amount of preserves.

01e7b0522b.title: easy scallops in a hurry with roquefort cheese
01e7b0522b.ingredients: 1 large scallops 1 as needed pepper 1 as needed panko 1 panko 2 slice roquefort cheese 1 as needed oil 1 as needed salt and pepper 1 sliced clove 1 tbsp butter 1 tsp roquefort infused juice 1 parsley
01e7b0522b.recipe: remove any stones from the scallops, cut into quarters, and slice into thin strips. season with salt and pepper. mix the roquefort cheese, panko and oil. form the patties. coat lightly with the panko mixture. pan fry over medium heat in 1 tablespoon of oil, until golden brown. coat the scallops in more oil and pan fry until golden brown. add the butter and roquefort. when the scallops start to brown, add the roquefort cheese mix, followed by the scallops. season with salt and pepper, and add the roquefort flavored juice and sprinkle on parsley. mix. serve immediately.

00d5a21ab9.title: peach and potato icing
00d5a21ab9.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. mashed potato 1/8 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
00d5a21ab9.recipe: combine all ingredients in a saucepan. cook until thick. put on top of cooled, sliced peaches or cake.

020ff7c9cc.title: easy apple pie
020ff7c9cc.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1 10 inch unbaked pie shell 1 1/2 c. chopped apple
020ff7c9cc.recipe: mix together the sugar, egg, margarine, cinnamon and salt. stir in the apple pieces. pour into unbaked pie shell. bake at 350 for 50 to 60 minutes, until knife comes out clean.

00d573e8fe.title: mama s milk pie
00d573e8fe.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 1 tbsp. butter 2 tbsp. flour 1/8 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. extract 1 c. milk pinch of salt 1 tsp. vanilla
00d573e8fe.recipe: beat egg lightly. add sugar and butter. stir until blended, then add flour and mix well. add milk, cinnamon, salt and vanilla. cook in oven at 300 for 10 minutes, then at 325 for 30 minutes, until firm. pie will cling to edge, if you try it. it will be like a pie crust.

020aa88369.title: cinnamon pie
020aa88369.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 1/4 c. flour 2 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. salt 2 c. milk 1 tsp. cinnamon
020aa88369.recipe: mix all dry ingredients. add beaten egg, milk and butter. blend well. pour into unbaked 9 inch pie shell. sprinkle cinnamon over top. bake at 400 for 35 minutes.

01741e4ae0.title: sauce chile rojo chile verde
01741e4ae0.ingredients: 5 cups pepper, chopped 2 tablespoons onion, chopped 1 tablespoon oil 1 teaspoon salt 14 teaspoon clove 12 cup tomato, chopped 1 cup juice, fresh 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 tablespoon vinegar 1 tablespoon cumin
01741e4ae0.recipe: saute peppers, garlic and onion in oil until vegetables are transparent. add remaining ingredients. simmer on low heat 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.

018833a444.title: meat and potatoes
018833a444.ingredients: 1 each poblano pepper 1 pound cheese 1 large onion 2 each potato 1 can tomato 1 clove 1 pound beef ground 1 x salt and black pepper 1 tablespoon butter 1 cup broth 1 tablespoon oil 1 each garlic clove 2 can mushroom 1/2 cup milk
018833a444.recipe: cook pepepro pepper for 15 minutes in boiling water. remove skin. slice meat, then melt butter in skillet. stir fry meat for 5 minutes. add the onion, garlic and salt and pepper. remove from heat. skin and slice onion. quarter each potato. boil tomato and potato. cut tomatoes and remove seeds. put potato and tomato in skillet with meat and tomato. add onion, tomatoes, garlic, pepper and meat. cover and cook over medium heat for 15 to 20 minutes, then add milk. bake at 375f 190c for 40 minutes. remove and add cheese. put back in oven until cheese melts.

01d321552a.title: citrus slushie
01d321552a.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 4 cups juice your choice lime, orange, or grapefruit 1 cup ice 1 lime, sliced into coins or wedges 1 lemon, sliced into coins or wedges 1 orange, sliced into coins or wedges
01d321552a.recipe: pour the sugar into the bottom of a blender. add the juice of the orange, orange, and lemon. mix well to blend. add the ice cubes. cover with the lid and blend well until smooth. pour the mixture into a tall glass and garnish with the lime, lemon and orange slices. store in the freezer and enjoy

01859e9d99.title: barbecue sauce
01859e9d99.ingredients: 1 tsp. pepper 1 c. mayonnaise 3 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 3 tbsp. vinegar 3 tbsp. juice
01859e9d99.recipe: dissolve pepper in hot water. blend and add rest of ingredients. if too thick, add more mayonnaise. pour over hamburgers, vegetables or fish.

007975513a.title: cheese puffs
007975513a.ingredients: 1 c. pepper jack cheese, grated 1 c. cheese, grated 1 egg 3/4 tsp. salt 1 onion 2 c. milk oil 1 c. flour 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
007975513a.recipe: mix cheese, onion, pepper, milk and egg together. make holes in cheese mixture. pour oil in skillet over medium high heat and heat. pour in batter and dip into oil. drop into hot oil and cook until golden brown. drain.

01d2fe3a01.title: quick coffee cake
01d2fe3a01.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/4 c. butter 1 tsp. extract 1 c. milk 1/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
01d2fe3a01.recipe: cream butter, sugar and egg together. add milk. add flour and salt, then add vanilla and baking powder. bake in 10 x 13 inch pan or muffin tins at 375 for 20 minutes or until done.

018157e69c.title: green pepper steak
018157e69c.ingredients: 1 to 2 lb. round steak pepper monterey jack cheese 1 egg salt and pepper 1 chopped onion milk flour garlic salt oil butter
018157e69c.recipe: cut steak into serving size pieces. sprinkle with pepper and garlic salt. cover meat with flour and salt. dip steak pieces in milk. dip in egg and then in flour again. fry steak pieces in small amount of oil.

022d48256e.title: super sandwich
022d48256e.ingredients: 1 slice cheese 1/2 c. lettuce 2 tsp. mayonnaise 1 tortilla 1 slice tomato 1/4 c. onion 4 slices sandwich bread
022d48256e.recipe: put a layer of cheese on one piece of bread. put another piece of cheese on top. put lettuce over that. put on the mayonnaise and put on the tomato, onion, salt and pepper.

00a6b116d6.title: apple bars
00a6b116d6.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1/2 c. butter 3/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. flour 1 c. oats 1 tsp. extract 1 c. peeled, chopped apple 1 tsp. nutmeg 1/2 c. raisins optional 1/2 c. chopped pecans optional
00a6b116d6.recipe: cream sugar and egg until light and fluffy. stir in butter. mix all remaining ingredients into creamed mixture. press into 9 x 13 inch greased pan. bake at 350 for 30 minutes. cool and cut into squares.

012b0e3a87.title: spicy lamb with a kick
012b0e3a87.ingredients: 2 1/2 pounds leg of lamb, cleaned and cut into 2 to 3 pieces pepper, to taste onion, minced 2 tablespoons oil salt and pepper 1 teaspoon clove 1 cup chopped tomato 1 cup broth, or as needed 1 carrot, shredded 2 cloves garlic, minced 2 teaspoons cumin 1 teaspoon chili, or to taste optional 1/4 teaspoons turmeric
012b0e3a87.recipe: heat oil in a pan and brown the lamb pieces. add all of the ingredients for the sauce and cook until the meat is brown. serve the lamb with rice and garnish with fresh cilantro leaves.

02154fb6b3.title: chocolate raspberry cupcakes
02154fb6b3.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 egg 1/2 cup flour 1/2 cup butter 1/2 tsp salt 1/4 cup cocoa 2 tsp almond extract 1/2 tsp vanilla 1 tsp baking_powder 1 tsp baking_soda
02154fb6b3.recipe: 1. preheat oven to 350 degrees 2. cream butter and sugar in bowl add egg and mix until mixture is smooth 3. in separate bowl combine flour and salt then add to mixture with remaining ingredients

0030906c4c.title: cheese and asparagus pancake
0030906c4c.ingredients: cheese, 1/4 c. grated 1 lb. asparagus, cooked and drained 1 egg salt and pepper 1 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. oil 1/2 c. butter or margarine
0030906c4c.recipe: cut cheese and asparagus into 1 inch lengths. in a bowl, beat egg with salt and pepper. add milk and stir. heat skillet with oil and butter or margarine over medium high heat. pour in egg mixture. when mixture begins to set, spread cheese and asparagus over top of mixture. turn over, then cook a few minutes more. it is ready when center is firm.

009a6b771a.title: green chile salad dressing
009a6b771a.ingredients: 1 small jar chile pepper hot 2 c. mayonnaise 1 tbsp. salt 1/4 c. vinegar 1/4 c. juice 1/2 large onion, minced 1/2 c. oil
009a6b771a.recipe: mix together first 6 ingredients. slowly pour in oil while constantly mixing. let stand for 2 weeks.

003f212b7c.title: yeast rolls
003f212b7c.ingredients: 1 tbsp. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 pkg. dry yeast, dissolved in 1/3 c. warm water 1 tbsp. oil 2/3 c. milk
003f212b7c.recipe: beat egg. add salt and sugar add water, oil and milk. add flour gradually. stir until blended. set on floured board for 1 hour. shape into biscuits and place on greased pan. brush tops with melted butter. let rise 20 minutes. bake at 425 for 12 minutes or until golden brown.

012d98d43f.title: dulce de leche fudge
012d98d43f.ingredients: 3 c. sugar 3/4 c. evaporated milk 1/4 c. butter 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 tsp. extract 1 c. cream 1/4 tsp. salt
012d98d43f.recipe: cook over low heat for 1 hour. remove from heat and beat for 10 minutes. pour into buttered 9 x 9 inch pan. do not ice. this is an old recipe a must.

00853db1b4.title: meat soup
00853db1b4.ingredients: 1/2 lb boneless, skinless pork 1/2 tsp pepper 1/4 tsp onion powder 2 tbsp oil 1/2 cup soy_sauce 1/2 tsp clove 1/2 tsp salt 1 dash ginger 1/2 tsp garlic powder 1/2 tsp carrot powder
00853db1b4.recipe: chop all vegetables. put pork into pot. add 2 tbls oil and ginger, garlic and carrot powder. cover and bring to a boil. skim off foam. add garlic powder, ginger, soysauce and carrot powder. cook for about 10 min, stiring frequently. add more water until meat is very tender. serve hot with rice.

019d521bfa.title: cheese puffs with pepper
019d521bfa.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper 100 grams cheese 1 egg 1 salt 200 ml milk 1 tbsp oil 30 grams butter or margarine 1 clove 1 cake flour
019d521bfa.recipe: cut the jalapeno pepper in half horizontally, and remove the seeds. chop the cheese into small squares. chop the jalapeno pepper roughly. put the cooled jalapeno pepper into a plastic bag and knead it together with the salt, egg, milk, oil, and butter until it s soft. wrap the dough with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for about 30 minutes. remove the dough from the refrigerator, and remove the plastic wrap, cut into 12 equal pieces. put into the frying pan with the oil from step 1 and lightly coat each cube in flour. fry the rolled out dough from step 3 over medium heat for about 30 seconds. flip over with a spatula, and fry for another 30 seconds. take the sheet out of the frying pan, and turn over onto another sheet of aluminum foil, and cut into 12 equal pieces. sprinkle cheese on the squares, and then roll them up into balls. when you press a cheese ball into the dough, it will slip out in the pan. it will be a little harder to roll, but when you press the balls on the surface, they are done. roll the puffs in the cheese to coat and coat. please refer tofor the instructions for using the cheese balls. use a bit of flour. if you don t have a silicone steamer, coat the rolled dumplings with flour and steam for 20 minutes. while they re still hot, turn them over and steam the other side for 5 minutes. transfer to a plate and it s done. the cheese puffs are delicious when served with tomato sauce. i usually make these using shishito peppers.

01de82be1c.title: chicken breasts with lemon butter
01de82be1c.ingredients: pepper chicken breast oil salt pinch clove butter lemon juice garlic
01de82be1c.recipe: brush the chicken breasts with oil. sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper and the clove. melt butter in a skillet. place chicken breasts in skillet and cook over medium heat until golden brown. drain on paper towels. serve chicken breasts with lemon butter, fried carrots, onion, tarragon and apricots on top.

007fd6e91f.title: cheeseburger loaf
007fd6e91f.ingredients: 1 teaspoon pepper 1 cup cheese, grated 1 small onion 1 egg 1 small tomato, finely chopped 1 teaspoon salt 1 lb cooked beef 2 tablespoons oil 1/2 cup breadcrumbs 1 pinch clove 1/4 cup cream
007fd6e91f.recipe: chop beef finely. fry the onion until golden brown, add the bread crumbs and fry for 1 minute. add the grated cheese, salt, pepper, tomato and egg. mix well and add the cream. spoon the mixture into a pan and brown. cut the egg in half horizontally and place the halves on top of the cheese, place the cream on the top and place into a 350 degree oven for 30 minutes.

017a0ff3c2.title: irish potato soup
017a0ff3c2.ingredients: 1 tsp. pepper 1 potato 1 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 1 onion milk 1/4 c. oil 3 tbsp. flour 1 clove parsley
017a0ff3c2.recipe: peel potato, onion and clove. cut in small pieces. boil until soft in enough water to cover. mix oil and butter into flour and salt. add potato and onion mixture to thicken soup. cook a little more and serve with parsley.

005f5336e6.title: cinnamon coffee cake
005f5336e6.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. sifted flour 1 tsp. salt 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 3/4 c. oil 1/4 c. melted butter
005f5336e6.recipe: mix the first 3 ingredients together and add the next 3 ingredients alternately with oil and melted butter. pour into greased bundt pan. sprinkle with 1 tablespoon of sugar and cinnamon. bake at 375 for 30 minutes.

0189a3665e.title: easy irish stew
0189a3665e.ingredients: 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 lb. potato, cut in 1/2 inch cubes 1 small onion, chopped 2 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 2 1/2 c. broth 1 whole clove 1 tbsp. flour 1/4 tsp. thyme 2 tbsp. chopped parsley 1 carrot, sliced 1/2 c. cream or milk
0189a3665e.recipe: saute onion in butter. add remaining ingredients except cream and heat until boiling. add carrot and stir thoroughly. cover and simmer for about 20 minutes or until carrot is tender. stir in cream or milk. do not boil after adding cream. sprinkle with parsley. serves 4.

00183acce9.title: oatmeal chocolate chip cookies recipe
00183acce9.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 1/2 c. butter, melted 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 teaspoon extract 1 c. chips 1 c. oats 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon vanilla 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon 1/4 teaspoon baking_soda
00183acce9.recipe: blend all ingredients. drop by spoonfuls on cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 15 to 18 min.

00baf5904b.title: sweet and sour pork patties
00baf5904b.ingredients: 100 grams sugar 1/2 tsp sake 1/2 tsp soy_sauce 1 tbsp oil 350 grams pork 1 tsp minced ginger 1 onion 1 clove grated garlic 1 clove 1 egg 1 tsp cornstarch 1 dash shredded carrot
00baf5904b.recipe: finely chop the garlic and the ginger. mix the garlic with the chopped pork and mix with the seasonings. mix the ingredients. heat the oil in a pan, and cook the drained pork. when browned, add the seasoning and the soy sauce. mix well, and turn off the heat. mix the cornstarch and the egg. stir it into the pork mixture. when it thickens, add the shredded carrot. make the patties and fry in a frying pan for about 5 minutes until browned and crispy.

002dd9056e.title: escargots recipe
002dd9056e.ingredients: 4 escargots or possibly 6 pepper stuffed escargots 1 med. onion salt 1 clove 1 stick butter 1 teaspoon thyme 1 teaspoon garlic pwdr 2 tbsp. oil flour paprika
002dd9056e.recipe: place escargots in baking dish. grind onion, garlic pwdr, salt, pepper and clove. add in to butter, oil and thyme. cut butter into 8 10 pcs and place in frying pan with flour. cook til thickened. add in to escargots. bake at 300 degrees for 1 1/2 hrs or possibly just til done.

00eeeed3c5.title: quick cinnamon coffee cake
00eeeed3c5.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. butter or oleo 2 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1 c. milk
00eeeed3c5.recipe: cream the sugar and butter. beat in egg and vanilla. add dry ingredients alternately with the milk. grease and flour pan. bake at 350 for 45 minutes to 1 hour or until toothpick comes out clean.

0024f517bc.title: cheese patty patties with ham and potatoes
0024f517bc.ingredients: 500 g ground beef 1 teaspoon pepper 100 g cheese feta or cheese of your choice 14 onion, grated 1 potato, grated 1 egg 1 teaspoon salt 14 cup milk 3 tablespoons plain flour 1 tablespoon butter 1 tablespoon oil 1 cup cream or 1 cup whipping cream 1 clove
0024f517bc.recipe: in a bowl, combine the beef, pepper, cheese, grated onion, grated potato, egg, salt and milk. add the flour, mixing with a wooden spoon. form into small patties, about 3 mm thick. place patties in the fridge to chill for 10 15 minutes. heat butter and oil in a large frying pan and fry the patties for 4 5 minutes on each side, until golden. cover and cook for a further 5 minutes. meanwhile, heat the cream and the clove in a small saucepan until just boiling and serve with the patties.

0110f86737.title: jam bars
0110f86737.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. butter, melted 1 tsp. baking_powder 1 8 oz. jar jam 1 tsp. cinnamon
0110f86737.recipe: combine first 5 ingredients. combine jam, cinnamon and soda. stir into first mixture. spread in a 9 x 12 inch greased pan. bake at 350 for 20 minutes. cut while warm.

01b80bf3a5.title: pasta carbonara
01b80bf3a5.ingredients: 500 g dried pasta, of your choice 1 tablespoon pepper, finely chopped 1 cup cheese, grated 1 egg 12 teaspoon salt 3 teaspoons butter 1 teaspoon oil 1 teaspoon parsley, finely chopped 1 clove, finely chopped 1 small onion, finely chopped 1 cup milk, room temperature
01b80bf3a5.recipe: cook pasta in a large pan of boiling salted water according to package directions. meanwhile, mix all other ingredients and salt to taste and set aside. after pasta is cooked drain and add to creamed mixture, mix together. this can also be served hot or cold.

00439a5d01.title: potato carrot pie
00439a5d01.ingredients: 1 unbaked 9 inch pie shells 1/4 tsp. pepper 2 c. sliced potato 3 tbsp. butter or margarine 1 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 2 tbsp. chopped onion 1/4 c. cream 1/2 c. sliced carrot 1 tbsp. flour
00439a5d01.recipe: cut up potatoes into strips. place in boiling water. cook until tender drain and mash. melt butter in skillet saute onion. add to potato and onion mixture. stir in cream, seasonings and cheese. place in pie shell. dot with butter. bake at 350 for about 45 minutes.

022318dd52.title: cream of cauliflower soup
022318dd52.ingredients: 1 pepper 4 slices cheese, cut into squares 1/2 c. chopped onion 1 c. diced potato 4 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 4 c. milk 2 c. broth 2 c. diced celery 2 tbsp. flour 1 clove 1 c. cream 1 carrot, diced 1 tbsp. chopped parsley
022318dd52.recipe: make roux of butter, onion and celery. add flour and milk stir and continue stirring. cook until thick and bubbly. add cream, broth, potato and carrots. season to taste. fold in cheese. serve in warm soup bowls. makes 6 servings.

019210eadb.title: mexican red beans
019210eadb.ingredients: 1 large, sliced, seeded green or yellow pepper 1 medium onion, finely chopped 1 large tomato, chopped 1 clove 1 tbsp. oil salt and pepper 1/8 tsp. oregano 2 15 oz. cans white or kidney beans 1 1/2 c. broth 1/8 tsp. cumin 1/8 tsp. thyme 1/4 c. chopped parsley 2 1/2 tbsp. chili or chili powder
019210eadb.recipe: cook the pepper, onion and tomato in the oil until slightly browned. drain. add the beans and the broth. season with salt, pepper, oregano, cumin and thyme. cover and simmer for 1 hour. remove the clove. add the parsley and chili powder. serves 4 to 6.

023298d8e7.title: dried fig preserves
023298d8e7.ingredients: 6 lb. sugar 1 qt. honey 3/4 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tbsp. cinnamon 6 lb. figs, sliced juice of 2 limes 1 lb. butter
023298d8e7.recipe: boil the first 5 ingredients for 1 minute. add figs and butter. cook 15 to 20 minutes, stirring often. pour into sterilized jars. seal.

0250d1013a.title: jalapeno jack cheese balls
0250d1013a.ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon pepper 8 slices monterey jack cheese 1 egg, beaten salt and pepper 1/4 cup milk flour, for dredging oil for frying 1 1/2 cups breadcrumbs
0250d1013a.recipe: slice cheese into thin strips about 1/4 to 1/2 inch wide. set aside. in another dish, mix egg, salt and pepper, then add milk. coat cheese with flour and dip into milk mixture, then into egg mixture and again into flour. fry cheese in hot oil until brown and crispy. drain on paper towel.

019ed13b40.title: apple pancake
019ed13b40.ingredients: 1 1/4 c. sugar 1 egg, well beaten 2 tbsp. flour 1 tbsp. melted butter dash of salt 1 1/4 c. milk cinnamon
019ed13b40.recipe: beat egg add to sugar, flour, butter, salt and milk. mix thoroughly. drop by teaspoons on hot greased skillet or griddle. sprinkle with cinnamon. turn when brown on both sides. serve with warm syrup. serves 8.

01a542f033.title: sandwhich
01a542f033.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper 1/2 onion 1 slice cheese 1/2 lb beef 1 salt and pepper 1 egg 1/4 tomato 1 chili u can use green chili u may want to try it 1 tbsp worcestershire_sauce 1 bun 1 dash garlic powder
01a542f033.recipe: mince jalapeno pepper and onion. crumble beef and add salt and pepper. mix everything well and form patties. let it sit for 5 minutes and roll over. cook in skillet over medium high heat on top of stove for about 20 minutes. turn over and cook for 15 more minutes. drain grease. put patties on bun and spread tomato and onions on top. eat it up

01f4ca221a.title: old fashion tea cakes
01f4ca221a.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1 egg 6 c. flour 1/2 c. butter or margarine 2 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. extract whipped cream 1 tbsp. cinnamon
01f4ca221a.recipe: mix the above ingredients together and divide it into 4 sections. add the cinnamon and roll the four sections of dough into rolls 1 1/2 inch in diameter. sprinkle with a mixture of sugar and cinnamon. roll each roll in butter. place on a cookie sheet with an inch around each side and bake in a moderate oven. makes 6 dozen.

01cfb5de57.title: cinnamon swirl pound cake
01cfb5de57.ingredients: 1 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 2 1/4 cup flour 1/3 cup butter, softened 2 tsp baking powder 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 cup milk 1/2 tsp extract 1 whip cream 2 tbsp cinnamon
01cfb5de57.recipe: cream the butter and sugar together. add egg and beat until smooth. in another bowl mix the flour, baking powder and salt. stir the flour into the creamed butter mixture. alternate flour, milk and extract in 2 additions. combine cream and cinnamon mix into flour mixture. beat at low speed just till blended after each addition. pour into greased and floured 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. bake 350 for 40 50 minutes or till wooden toothpick comes out clean. cool for 10 minutes, loosen sides of cake from pan and turn out onto wire rack. whip cream to soft peaks. spread whipped cream over top of cake sprinkle with a little sugar and cinnamon.

0076b485f9.title: irish potato soup
0076b485f9.ingredients: 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 c. diced potato 3 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 c. chopped onion 1 1/2 c. milk 1 1/2 c. broth 1/2 c. chopped carrot 1/3 c. flour 1/2 c. celery, diced 1 c. cream 1 clove chopped parsley
0076b485f9.recipe: mix flour, butter, salt and pepper. saute onions and carrots for about 5 minutes in a little broth. add flour mixture and stir over low heat until mixture is bubbly. add celery, broth and potatoes. add cream and simmer on low heat until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes. add milk and cook 5 minutes.

01a074d435.title: sugar cookies
01a074d435.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1 stick butter, softened 1 tsp. baking_soda 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 c. oil 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. extract 1/4 c. milk dash of nutmeg
01a074d435.recipe: mix together all ingredients. drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet. bake at 400 for about 10 minutes.

0202ae6e81.title: squash croquettes
0202ae6e81.ingredients: 2 3 squash, washed, stems and seeds removed pepper 1 egg salt 1 cup breadcrumbs 2 tablespoons oil 1 tablespoon flour 1 onion 1/4 cup milk paprika optional
0202ae6e81.recipe: fry squash, onion and salt till tender. peel and chop coarsely. mix all other ingredients with squash and onion mixture. form into balls. fry in hot oil till golden brown. drain on paper towels. you can serve with curry or hot sauce.

0027c75380.title: pepper blue cheese dressing
0027c75380.ingredients: 2 tbsp. jalapeno pepper 2 tbsp. crumbled blue cheese 1/4 c. oil dash of salt 1/4 c. vinegar 1/2 c. juice
0027c75380.recipe: put all ingredients in blender. blend well. keep refrigerated.

00c3c131bb.title: pepper and mayonnaise rolled eggs
00c3c131bb.ingredients: 1 dash pepper 1 tbsp mayonnaise 1 egg 1 salt and pepper
00c3c131bb.recipe: heat a frying pan or wok over high heat and cook the egg. once the egg is just about done, remove from heat. let it sit for 5 to 10 minutes to cool, and remove the yolk. mix the beaten egg with the mayonnaise and mix well. add salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. then it s done. it s best if you let it sit for 5 minutes to allow the oil to drain. here s another variation this one was made in the microwave. i cooked the egg in the microwave as well for 8 minutes. i also tried combining it in the frying pan when serving this with a sweet and spicy chili sauce. this is also delicious for making flavored burgers

00c42ee4a3.title: cinnamon muffins
00c42ee4a3.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 4 tbsp. melted butter 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. milk 1 tbsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking_powder
00c42ee4a3.recipe: beat egg add sugar and butter and add milk and flour. beat until well blended. place in muffin pans. sprinkle tops with cinnamon and sugar mixture. bake for 15 minutes at 400.

0022b163f8.title: cheese potato stew
0022b163f8.ingredients: 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 slices cheese 1 onion 1 potato 1 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1 clove 1 tsp. parsley 1 c. broth 1 can mushroom pieces and stems 1 tbsp. cream 2 tbsp. oil 1 tbsp. flour
0022b163f8.recipe: dice onion and potato and brown in butter with the onion. blend flour and salt into the butter and onion. cook until the flour is browned. add the milk and parsley. add the mushroom pieces and stock and cook until the potatoes are tender. add the cheese and cook until melted. makes 4 to 6 servings.

0117d552e9.title: cheese sausages
0117d552e9.ingredients: 6 mild pepper and sausage patties 100 g cheese, grated 1 small onion, chopped finely 1 egg salt 1 garlic clove 2 tablespoons oil 12 cup breadcrumbs 1 clove 1 teaspoon parsley
0117d552e9.recipe: mix all ingredients well and form into patties. fry in oil until they are golden brown.

00c072ac56.title: scones
00c072ac56.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 2 cups all purpose flour 1 stick butter or margarine 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 cup milk 1 tsp baking_powder
00c072ac56.recipe: combine sugar and egg and mix well. add flour, butter, salt and milk and mix well. stir in the baking powder. drop by spoonfuls onto a lightly greased or non stick baking sheet. i used an ice cream scoop for ease of handling to scoop. bake at 400 f for 10 15 minutes.

0229c2a2a1.title: chrysanthemum turnip
0229c2a2a1.ingredients: 1 krysanthemum pop in the pod 8 turnips 1 pepper boiled, chopped 1 cheese or cucumber 1 tbsp oil 1 salt 1 clove 1 butter or margarine 1 dash paprika
0229c2a2a1.recipe: peel the krysanthemum pop in the pod, chop, and soak in water for 10 minutes. chop and boil. place the turnip in a large pan with water, and add the clove. add salt and krysanthemum pop in. boil for 20 minutes until tender. make the sauce. remove the stem of the turnip. cut off the roots and wash the leaves. remove the root and roots. mix all the sauce ingredients. put a little butter or margarine on each skordalia, place the chrysanthemum pop in the pan. then add the chopped chrysanthemum pop in. add the pan juices and some salt. cover with a lid. turn the heat to low, and let it cook for 30 minutes. once it has become hot, it s done. i use the pan juices to make the sauce for a dish.

0206429ec1.title: beef roulade
0206429ec1.ingredients: 2 lbs round steaks, sliced thin pepper 1 large onion, chopped 1 teaspoon oil 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 pinch clove 1 garlic clove 1/4 teaspoon thyme 1/4 cup melted butter 1 dash paprika
0206429ec1.recipe: cut beef into strips. place in large bowl. add salt, pepper, onion, garlic, thyme and oil to beef. place roulades on rack in baking pan. brush with butter. sprinkle with paprika. bake at 350 for 45 minutes. turn once. bake 10 more minutes. serve with barbecue sauce and rice.

0028f57fc0.title: crock pot cheese soup
0028f57fc0.ingredients: 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 c. cheese, grated 2 tbsp. chopped onion 1/2 c. milk 1/4 c. butter 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1 1/2 c. half and half cream 2 c. broth 1/3 c. celery 2 tbsp. flour 1/4 c. carrot, chopped
0028f57fc0.recipe: mix all the ingredients in order given. cook on low 3 hours. serve with hot bread.

0204238f85.title: cheese and egg roll
0204238f85.ingredients: 2 slice sliced cheese 1 egg 1 dash salt and pepper 1 tbsp mayonnaise 1 tbsp oil
0204238f85.recipe: add ingredients to a bowl and mix until blended. put a paper towel on a plate and put the sliced cheese on top of it. put the egg and roll up the cut edges. repeat with step 6 and it s done.

024ad1d04e.title: cinnamon swirl muffins
024ad1d04e.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 egg 2 1/2 cups flour 1 tsp. salt 6 tbs. softened butter 1 tbs. baking_soda 1 tbs. baking powder 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 cup oil 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. extract 1 cup buttermilk 1/2 cup milk
024ad1d04e.recipe: preheat oven to 375 f. line 12 muffin tins with paper liners or grease. in a large mixing bowl, cream sugar and butter. add egg and beat until fluffy. add flour, baking soda, baking powder and cinnamon to the bowl of sugar and butter mixture and mix well. add oil and vanilla to mixture and beat. combine buttermilk and milk, then stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. divide batter evenly among prepared muffin cups, filling each to the top. bake for 15 20 minutes or until tops of muffins are lightly browned. remove muffins from muffin tins to cool on wire racks. to unmold, cut muffins in half. place bottom half on a muffin pan and top with the top of muffin. fill each muffin tin half with one quarter of vanilla buttermilk and half of cinnamon buttermilk mixture. cover with top half of muffin. repeat with remaining muffins.

000bba053c.title: donuts
000bba053c.ingredients: 1 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 3 1/2 cup flour 1/2 tsp salt 1 tbsp butter 2 tsp baking_powder 2 tsp baking_soda 1/2 tsp cinnamon 1 dash extract 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 1 oil for frying 1 1/2 cup milk
000bba053c.recipe: mix sugar, egg, and butter. add dry ingredients and milk. in pan heat oil and add dough. take out and roll in sugar, cinnamon, and sugar. deep fry until golden brown. when they are done take out and let cool. sprinkle with powdered sugar and enjoy

01b2594801.title: gf beef stew
01b2594801.ingredients: 1 red hot pepper 1 medium onion 1 cup chopped tomato 1 clove salt pepper to taste 1 cup broth 1 carrot 1/2 cup beef, diced thyme 2 garlic cloves 2 tbsp oil parsley 1 bunch celery flour oregano
01b2594801.recipe: put oil, onion, garlic, salt and pepper in casserole dish with the onion, carrot and garlic. cover and cook on high for 5 minutes. remove vegetables from pan. add beef and stir fry 2 3 minutes. return vegetables to pot. add water to cover and cook on high for 20 minutes. add vegetables and beef broth. boil for an hour.

019e80ffd0.title: pepper soup
019e80ffd0.ingredients: 3 large pepper or 4 tbsp. pepper 1 large onion 1 tomato 1 clove salt 5 to 6 c. broth 1 large carrot 1 tbsp. oil 1 garlic clove 1 tbsp. cumin 1/2 c. celery 2 c. beef 1 tbsp. thyme parsley chili powder to taste
019e80ffd0.recipe: skin peppers. chop onion, celery, tomato and carrot. saute onion in oil. add remaining ingredients, except beef. cook, covered, until vegetables are done. cook about 2 hours. add beef and cook 30 minutes more.

026fb4f6b4.title: thai style fried squash recipe
026fb4f6b4.ingredients: 1 pound yellow squash 1/8 teaspoon pepper 1 med. onion, sliced 2 tbsp. oil 2 tbsp. soy_sauce 1/8 teaspoon clove 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon ginger 1/4 teaspoon garlic pwdr cornstarch 1 carrot, sliced
026fb4f6b4.recipe: slice squash into 1/2 slices. boil squash till soft 5 min. stir fry green onion and pepper in hot oil till tender. stir in squash and soy sauce. heat thoroughly. add in cloves, salt, ginger, garlic pwdr, and mix well. combine cornstarch with a little water, then stir into squash mix. heat through and serve warm over rice. serves 6.

0210f3eba7.title: old fashioned tea cakes
0210f3eba7.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 4 c. flour 2 sticks butter 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tbsp. milk 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 tsp. baking_powder 1 tbsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
0210f3eba7.recipe: in a large bowl, mix egg and sugar. mix all dry ingredients. in a smaller bowl, cream the butter and sugar. add all dry ingredients and milk alternately to the first mixture. mix well. mix all extracts with the last mixture. spoon onto a greased pan or stone. sprinkle generously with sugar and cinnamon. bake at 350 for 12 minutes.

006d77955c.title: swiss cheese stew recipe
006d77955c.ingredients: 1/8 teaspoon pepper 1/2 pound swiss cheese 2 c. minced onion 2 c. sliced potato 3 tbsp. butter 2 teaspoon salt 3 c. lowfat milk 2 tbsp. flour 1 clove 1 c. cream 1 c. broth
006d77955c.recipe: cut cheese into pcs. cover bottom of 1 1/2 qt casserole with sliced potatoes. sprinkle with pepper, onion and 2 tbsp. butter. salt. pour lowfat milk into dish. cover and microwave about 8 min. turn potato pcs and microwave another 8 min. combine 2 tbsp. butter, flour and clove. stir in lowfat milk and broth. cook and stir till mix thickens. add in cream and stir till thick. pour over potatoes. cover and microwave on full power till potatoes are done. sprinkle with cheese. microwave 2 min longer. makes 4 6 servings.

00ace27e0f.title: cheese souffle
00ace27e0f.ingredients: pepper 2 cups grated sharp cheese salt 1/4 cup oil 1/4 cup finely chopped onion 1 hard boiled egg, minced 1 clove, crushed fresh parsley paprika
00ace27e0f.recipe: combine the flour, the cheese, salt, the oil, and the onion. season with pepper. add the egg, the clove, and the parsley, reserving a little of the parsley for garnishing. turn into a greased souffle dish. sprinkle the remaining parsley with the paprika, and bake at 375f for 25 minutes. serve hot.

017fe379f7.title: caesar salad dressing recipe
017fe379f7.ingredients: 1/4 tsp pepper 1 c. mayonnaise 1 tsp salt 2 tsp vinegar 2 tsp dill weed juice 1/2 tsp onion pwdr 1/2 c. oil
017fe379f7.recipe: combine ingredients, mixing well. chill for several hrs. yield 1 c.. notes 1 c. caesar salad dressing 1/2 c. garlic salad dressing 1/2 c. lime juice mix well and refrigeratefor at least 3 hrs before serving. note 2 may use no mayo if you like.

00d4126739.title: stuffed peppers
00d4126739.ingredients: pepper cheese swiss, monterey jack, etc. oil salt 1/4 tsp. clove butter broth 1/2 tsp. thyme 1/4 c. onion, chopped 1 tbsp. parsley, chopped 1/4 c. mushroom, finely chopped 1/4 c. cream or milk
00d4126739.recipe: make 2 slits in each pepper. stuff with cheese and wrap tightly with foil. bake at 350 for 30 minutes. remove foil. brush with a little oil. salt and pepper to taste. brown in butter.

025ead3cb3.title: steamed vegetable and cheese mayonnaise
025ead3cb3.ingredients: 1 serving pepper flavored rice 2 slice sliced cheese 1 egg 1 pinch salt 1 onion 1 mayonnaise 1 oil 1 parsley 1 clove if you like
025ead3cb3.recipe: cut the onion into thin slices. put in the microwave for 30 seconds to rehydrate. mince. take the cheese and mix with the ingredients. wrap the meat in the cheese and onion, wrap with the cheese and onion mixture and secure with toothpicks. make the mayonnaise. add the minced boiled egg and the parsley to a small bowl and mix. microwave on full power for 3 minutes, then close the lid. when it s cooked through, it is done.

0163bc20a0.title: gnitzle cookies
0163bc20a0.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 1 cup flour 1/4 tsp salt 1/2 cup butter 1/4 tsp baking_soda 1 tsp vanilla extract 1/2 cup chips 1/4 tsp baking powder 1/4 tsp cinnamon 3/4 cup oats
0163bc20a0.recipe: in a large bowl mix butter and sugar add egg and vanilla extract combine dry ingredients add dry to the wet mixture add chips preheat oven to 375 drop by spoonful onto cookie sheet bake 8 10 minutes

0238c8d173.title: manhattan mint tea
0238c8d173.ingredients: 2 cups ice 1 tea bag 1 1/2 cup lime and mint tea 1/2 cup lychee juice 4 cups ice 1/2 cup vodka 1/2 lime 1/4 cup mint 1/2 lemon 1/2 orange
0238c8d173.recipe: in blender blend tea, juice, and ice until frothy. add vodka and the rest of the ingredients and blend on high speed. pour and enjoy.

006021270a.title: barbecued beef sandwiches
006021270a.ingredients: 1 pepper green, red and green, etc. 1/2 onion 1 large hamburger bun 1/2 large tomato 1 salt and pepper 1 tbsp oil 100 grams minced beef 1/2 clove grated garlic 4 tbsp ketchup 2 tbsp a.1. in the jar 1 tsp b.2 in the jar juice 1 garlic powder, salt and pepper
006021270a.recipe: prepare the vegetables slice and de seed the onions, cut into thin slices and cut into halves. mince the beef. place the oil and garlic in a frying pan over high heat. when it starts smoking, add the beef and fry until browned. add the onion, stir. season with salt and pepper and continue to stir fry. add the ingredients. when the sauce has come to a boil, lower the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. serve on the buns, add the vegetables and serve. add more sauce to taste.

0107de3fd8.title: cinnamon milk shakes
0107de3fd8.ingredients: 3 tablespoons sugar 1 cup milk 6 ounces ice 2 tablespoons cream, optional 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, optional
0107de3fd8.recipe: add milk to food processor or blender and process until smooth. add remaining ingredients and pulse or blend till smooth. serve.

00749f46c0.title: baked feta cheese pate
00749f46c0.ingredients: 1 c. shredded pepper jack cheese 4 tbsp. cheese spread 3 tbsp. oil 1/4 c. minced onion 1 egg, slightly beaten 1/4 tsp. salt 1 clove 2 tbsp. chopped parsley
00749f46c0.recipe: lightly oil 6 1/2 cup ramekins. sprinkle 1 tablespoon cheese on each. combine remaining ingredients. spoon into ramekins. cover with aluminum foil and bake in 350 oven for 35 to 45 minutes. serve immediately. serves 6.

007803192a.title: venison stew
007803192a.ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. venison stewing, round or bottom round 1/4 tsp. pepper 2 tbsp. onion, chopped 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. clove 2 tbsp. butter 1/4 tsp. thyme 4 tbsp. flour 1 1/2 c. broth 1 medium carrot, chopped 2 tbsp. parsley
007803192a.recipe: cut meat into chunks. melt butter in dutch oven. add meat, onions, thyme, salt and pepper. cook slowly covered until meat is tender, approximately 30 minutes. remove meat and set aside. add flour to fat in pan and blend. add broth gradually, stirring with wire whisk. cook over moderate heat until thickened, then add meat. stir constantly until meat is very tender. remove meat and place in serving dish. cover with carrots and parsley. heat 1 minute. spoon over meat and garnish with parsley sprigs.

025503bf6a.title: salsa
025503bf6a.ingredients: 1 pepper, preferably chile de arbol 1 medium onion 1 tbsp. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 1 clove 1 tomato 1 c. broth
025503bf6a.recipe: in a 1 1/2 quart casserole with cover, place oil, onion, clove, salt, tomato and broth. cover casserole tightly with lid or glass lid. microwave at full power for 10 to 15 minutes. stir halfway through cooking. add pepper and cook at full power for an additional 3 minutes. pour through fine sieve. cover tightly and refrigerate until needed. stir often.

0225e9968a.title: mother s potato soup recipe
0225e9968a.ingredients: 1/8 teaspoon pepper 1 1/4 c. diced potato 2 tbsp. minced onion 2 tbsp. butter 1/2 teaspoon salt 3 c. broth 1 c. diced carrot 1 1/4 c. lowfat milk 1 whole clove 3 tbsp. flour 1 1/2 c. diced celery 1/2 c. cream 1/4 teaspoon thyme 2 tbsp. parsley 3 c. broth
0225e9968a.recipe: add in pepper, carrots and onions to pot with butter, saute/fry till tender, but not browned. sprinkle flour, add in salt and cook 5 min. add in rest of ingredients and simmer 30 min.

01af2c53ca.title: easy baked custard
01af2c53ca.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3 tbsp. melted butter 2 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/8 tsp. salt 1 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla
01af2c53ca.recipe: beat sugar and egg together. stir in butter. add flour, cinnamon and salt mix well. gradually stir in milk. add extracts. pour into a greased 1 quart casserole. bake at 350 for 40 to 45 minutes. serves 6.

021f7cc45b.title: aebleskiver liqia
021f7cc45b.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1/2 cup milk 1/2 cup cream or 1/2 cup evaporated milk 1/2 cup juice tidbits or 1/2 cup fruit juice 1/2 cup ice
021f7cc45b.recipe: mix all ingredients together. pour into martini glasses and garnish with a cherry, if desired. enjoy.

01f3b555ec.title: grandma s waffles
01f3b555ec.ingredients: 3 tbsp sugar 1 large egg 1 1/2 cup flour 1/4 tsp salt 1 cup milk 4 tsp baking_powder 1/4 cup oil 1/4 cup butter 1 dash cinnamon
01f3b555ec.recipe: in a medium sized bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until smooth. combine the flour, salt and baking powder and add to the egg mixture alternately with the milk until well mixed. lightly oil the waffle iron and pour in 1/2 cup of batter. cook until the steam has cooked off and the waffle is golden. add your favorite topping and finish cooking

00c47ba96a.title: cinnamon cookies
00c47ba96a.ingredients: 3/4 cup sugar 1 egg 2 1/2 cups flour 1/4 cup butter 1 teaspoon cinnamon 1 dash salt 1/4 cup milk 1 teaspoon baking_powder 1/2 teaspoon extract 1/2 teaspoon vanilla
00c47ba96a.recipe: preheat oven to 350 degrees. mix all ingredients together until well blended. put on lightly greased cookie sheet. bake for 10 12 minutes.

01c4a77ccd.title: quick cinnamon bread
01c4a77ccd.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. sifted flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 3 tsp. baking_powder 1/4 c. oil 3 tbsp. melted butter 1 tbsp. cinnamon
01c4a77ccd.recipe: beat butter, sugar and egg. add dry ingredients, alternating with milk mix well. add oil and mix well. pour into greased loaf pan. bake at 350 for 40 to 45 minutes.

017f7d257a.title: banana muffins
017f7d257a.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 egg 2 cup flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. baking_soda 1 tsp. baking powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 cup oil 4 tbsp. butter 2 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1 banana, mashed pinch of nutmeg
017f7d257a.recipe: in a large bowl beat egg, sugar and oil together add mashed banana, extract, dry ingredients, nutmeg and baking powder, stir well pour into greased muffin pans 375 degrees for 20 minutes great for the microwave enjoy

01eaff34d9.title: banana ice cream
01eaff34d9.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 can eagle brand milk 1 can cream 3 c. mashed bananas
01eaff34d9.recipe: mix sugar and milk in bowl and let stand a few minutes to dissolve. mix with dry ingredients. beat until fluffy. add cream and beat in. add mashed bananas. pour into ice cream freezer and process until just hard.

005ad8ac22.title: my mummy s dressing
005ad8ac22.ingredients: 1 pinch pepper 1 mayonnaise 1 onion 1 slice sliced cheese 1 hard boiled egg 1 salt and pepper 2 slice bacon 1 oil 1 parsley 1 vinegar
005ad8ac22.recipe: finely chop the onion and bacon and marinate in vinegar. chop the eggs, parsley, and cheddar cheese. mix together and enjoy. the recipe for the onion and bacon has been adapted from my personal kitchen cookbook.

0066b24913.title: potato soup
0066b24913.ingredients: 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/3 lb. cheese 1 onion 1 potato 1 qt. milk salt to taste 2 tbsp. butter 1 qt. broth clove 1/2 pt. cream
0066b24913.recipe: put all the ingredients into pot except cheese. cook slowly until vegetables are tender. cut cheese into cubes. cook over low heat until cheese melts. pour in the cream before serving.

00003a70b1.title: cheese soup with cream
00003a70b1.ingredients: pepper 2/3 lb. cheese 1 small onion 1 potato 3 tbsp. butter 1/4 tsp. salt 2 1/2 c. milk 1 tbsp. flour 2 1/2 c. broth clove 1/2 c. cream
00003a70b1.recipe: melt butter in pan and brown flour, salt and pepper. add milk and broth cook until very thick. slice potatoes and onion. mix flour with 1 1/2 cups broth and add to soup. pour in cheese, cream and pepper.

010f2ea032.title: steak and spaghetti
010f2ea032.ingredients: 1 round steak, cut into serving size pieces 1/4 tsp. pepper 3 oz. cheese 1 tbsp. butter salt and pepper 1 large onion milk mushroom, chicken, celery and tomato cream
010f2ea032.recipe: season steak with salt and pepper. in a large skillet, brown meat in 1 tablespoon butter. add 1 tablespoon butter and onions, simmer for 3 minutes. add mushroom, chicken and celery. cook 5 minutes. add mushroom mixture and cream. place in covered casserole and bake at 375 for 1 hour.

01215a2dde.title: chicken breasts french style
01215a2dde.ingredients: pepper to taste 6 chicken breast halves, skinned salt to taste 1 pinch clove 2 tbsp. butter 2 tbsp. oil 2 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. thyme 1/2 onion 2 cloves garlic
01215a2dde.recipe: season chicken with salt, pepper, thyme and clove. roll in flour. brown in skillet with fat and oil. add onions and garlic. cook 10 minutes, turning occasionally. add water, about 1 teaspoon at a time. simmer about 30 minutes or until tender. serve over rice.

02176bcd9f.title: mrs. bebk s coffee cake
02176bcd9f.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 egg 2 cup flour 1/2 tsp salt 3/4 cup butter or margarine 1 tsp baking_powder 1 tsp cinnamon
02176bcd9f.recipe: combine dry ingredients and cut butter into it until mixture is like crumbs. press half the mixture into 9x13 pan. add nutmeg or other topping. spread remaining mixture over this. bake at 350f for 30 40 min.

00a2dbf7a0.title: quick easy microwave cheese soup
00a2dbf7a0.ingredients: 5 tsp sugar 4 tbsp grated cheese 2 tbsp butter 1 dash salt 750 ml hot milk
00a2dbf7a0.recipe: make a little dip with the sugar and milk. combine the cheese with the butter and salt in a bowl. add the milk to step 1 in a heatproof container and heat at 500 w for 1 minute. microwave for 30 seconds and mix with a rubber spatula. add the ingredients from step 2. microwave for 15 seconds and mix with the rubber spatula again. be careful not to microwave it too much, or it may clump up. it will clump together when cooked. be careful not to microwave it too long, but it s okay to have chunks of cheese stuck to the bottom of the bowl. i used a 5 g bowl. enjoy in bento s, risotto, nanas, or mashed potatoes. this makes a nice size.

003ef1cc1e.title: beef and beans
003ef1cc1e.ingredients: 1 large pepper 1 large onion 1 can chopped tomato 1 clove 1 tsp. salt 2 to 3 tsp. chili 1/2 tsp. cumin 1 medium carrot 1 1/2 lb. beef 1 stalk celery 3 cloves garlic 1/8 tsp. thyme 2 tbsp. oil 1 can lima beans 1/4 tsp. paprika 1/8 tsp. oregano
003ef1cc1e.recipe: take meat, put into pan of water with oil, salt and pepper and celery. cook 5 minutes. add carrot, cumin, paprika, thyme and beans. cook 20 minutes.

0013592bfb.title: tamale pie
0013592bfb.ingredients: 1/2 tsp. adobo 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. onion 1/2 c. tomato 1 whole clove 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. chili 1 tsp. cumin 1/2 carrot 2 c. beef 1/4 c. chopped celery 2 cloves minced garlic 1/2 tsp. thyme 2 tbsp. oil 1 c. beans optional 1 tsp. paprika dash of oregano
0013592bfb.recipe: saute onion, celery and carrot in oil in large, heavy skillet. add garlic and stir. add beans or lima beans and beef, seasonings, salt, chili and cumin. simmer 2 hours on low, stirring occasionally. serve with toast or chapati

01291e33de.title: butterscotch cookies
01291e33de.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 cup flour 1/2 tsp salt 2/3 cup butter 1 tsp baking_soda 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 1/2 cup hershey s mini chips 1/2 tsp baking powder 1/8 tsp cinnamon 2/3 cup quick oats
01291e33de.recipe: mix all ingredients together. drop onto cookie sheet about 1 apart. bake at 350 for 12 15 minutes.

01d232b07d.title: swedish fig bars
01d232b07d.ingredients: 1 cup figs cut into chunks 3/4 cup sugar 1 egg 1 tablespoon butter 2 cups flour 1 teaspoon cinnamon 1/2 teaspoon baking_powder 1 pinch salt 3/4 cup milk 1/2 teaspoon extract whipped cream
01d232b07d.recipe: preheat oven to 350 degrees melt butter, add sugar and figs, stir over low heat until figs are dissolved. remove from heat. in a small bowl, mix flour, cinnamon, baking powder and salt. add milk, fig mixture to flour mixture. add vanilla. pour into an 8 inch x 11 inch dish sprayed with a non stick cooking spray. bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown. ice with whipped cream.

021ab581db.title: cinnamon cinnamon rolls
021ab581db.ingredients: 2 tbsp sugar 2 egg 2 1/4 cup all purpose flour 3/4 tsp salt 1/2 tsp yeast 1/3 cup butter 1 tsp baking_powder 1 tbsp cinnamon 1/4 cup oil 1 1/4 cup milk
021ab581db.recipe: in a bowl mix the flour, salt, baking powder and yeast. make a well in the center of the flour and put in the egg, butter, milk, and baking powder mixture. knead for about 2 minutes until a soft dough is formed. roll dough out onto a floured surface and divide in half. roll each half out, and cut them into triangles place in greased muffin pan. let rise until about double in size. bake for 15 minutes at 350f.

01189b462f.title: chocolate fudge
01189b462f.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 2/3 c. milk 1/3 c. cream 2/3 c. butter or margarine 2/3 c. cocoa 1 tsp. extract 3 sq. chocolate
01189b462f.recipe: combine first 6 ingredients in a 2 quart casserole. cook, uncovered, at high 2 minutes. cook 1 minute longer. stir in chocolate until melted. pour in buttered dish. let cool. cut into squares.

01b7ba02ae.title: apple pie
01b7ba02ae.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1 c. peeled, grated apple 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tbsp. milk
01b7ba02ae.recipe: mix all ingredients except for apple, pour into pie pan. place apple on top of mixture in pie pan. bake at 375 for 30 minutes.

0213dcf418.title: granny s baked apple pie
0213dcf418.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 3 tbsp. melted butter 1/4 c. flour 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 2 c. milk
0213dcf418.recipe: mix dry ingredients. add eggs and milk. mix well. add melted butter and mix. pour into unbaked pie shell. bake for 1 hour at 375.

01d97057f7.title: oaxacan style pepper rellenos with beans
01d97057f7.ingredients: 1 poblano pepper or 1 jalapeno pepper 1/2 cup monterey jack cheese 1 large tomato 2 tablespoons oil 1/4 cup onion 1 teaspoon salt 1 clove, garlic 1 teaspoon basil 1 teaspoon oregano 1 teaspoon parsley juice of 1 lemon 1/4 cup olive 1 tablespoon cilantro 1 cup beans 1/4 teaspoon cumin
01d97057f7.recipe: pre heat oven to 400 f. clean, remove the seeds and membrane from the pepper, roast on grill for 20 minutes. in a bowl, mix the oil, salt, onion, garlic, basil, oregano and parsley. in another bowl, mix the lemon juice, olives, cilantro and beans. toss well. put the roasted pepper in a baking pan, skin side up. stuff with bean mixture, and then cover with cheese. bake for 20 minutes.

01d66616b3.title: easy quiche
01d66616b3.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 tbsp. butter 1 c. milk 1 tsp. cinnamon dash of salt 2 c. cream
01d66616b3.recipe: mix sugar, butter and egg. beat in milk, cinnamon and salt. pour into crust and bake at 375 for 15 minutes. turn down to 350 for 30 to 35 minutes. serve plain or with a scoop of cream. serves 6.

01ce9145a2.title: grandma s favorite pancakes
01ce9145a2.ingredients: 1/4 cup sugar 1 egg 1/2 cup flour 1/4 tsp salt 1 cup milk 1 1/2 tsp baking_powder 1 tbsp oil 1 tbsp butter 1/4 tsp baking_soda
01ce9145a2.recipe: beat egg and oil and add sugar. add flour and baking powder and salt. beat. add milk and beat again. fry in butter and serve.

01f6e92023.title: hot pepper avocado salad
01f6e92023.ingredients: 1 hot pepper 1 cheese 1 tomato 3 tbsp oil 1/2 onion 1/4 lettuce 1 dash salt and pepper 1 tsp vinegar 1 juice 1 tbsp olive, finely chopped 1/2 cucumber, sliced 1 avocado 3 leaves basil 1/2 clove
01f6e92023.recipe: chop the hot pepper, cheese, tomato and onion very finely. drain the oil from the hot pepper and mash with a fork to make the dressing. chop the lettuce very finely. put salt and pepper into a cup and add the vinegar to it. stir to dissolve the salt, then add juice and olive oil and mix. slice the cucumber thinly and mix. you can also use the skin of the avocado to cut it into thin slices. it s easier to peel the avocado. dice the tomato, avocado, basil and onion, and season with minced garlic and a little salt and pepper. mix the dressing until smooth. sprinkle dressing onto the salad and serve.

0260c6346b.title: citrus mojito
0260c6346b.ingredients: 2 1/2 cups grapefruit juice 1 cup ice 1/3 cup vodka 1/2 lime, sliced 4 6 mint leaves, for garnish 1 orange, sliced optional
0260c6346b.recipe: in a pitcher combine grapefruit juice, lime and vodka. pour over ice and garnish with mint leaves. serve in glasses.

001528065f.title: egg custard
001528065f.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 tbsp. butter or margarine 3 tbsp. cream or evaporated milk 1/4 tsp. extract 3/4 c. evaporated milk
001528065f.recipe: cook until thick on top of double boiler. add 1 tablespoon vanilla. pour into baked pie shells. top with meringue.

000d94f80b.title: butterscotch fudge
000d94f80b.ingredients: 1 box 10x sugar 1 egg 1/2 stick butter 1/2 c. cream 1 tsp. extract 1/2 c. milk
000d94f80b.recipe: mix all of the ingredients together. cook over medium heat until it reaches 240 on candy thermometer. it is ready when a little of the mixture sticks to the spoon, not burned. pour into waxed paper, cut into squares.

01e30e2388.title: beef stew
01e30e2388.ingredients: 3 slices pepper steak or meat of your choice 1/2 onion 2 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. soy_sauce 1/4 tsp. clove 1 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. ginger dash of garlic powder 2 c. broth 1/2 c. carrot 1 c. diced tomato 1 tbsp. cornstarch
01e30e2388.recipe: brown steak. season meat with garlic powder, salt and pepper. add ginger and soy sauce and pour in broth and vegetables. simmer slowly until tender. thicken with cornstarch and a little water, if desired.

016c1f6d8c.title: cinnamon sponge cake
016c1f6d8c.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1/2 c. butter 1 1/2 c. sifted flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1 1/2 tsp. extract whipped cream
016c1f6d8c.recipe: cream together sugar, egg and butter. sift together flour, cinnamon and salt. mix dry ingredients and milk with creamed mixture. add vanilla and mix thoroughly. bake in an 8 x 8 inch pan at 350 for 25 to 30 minutes. serve with whipped cream. serves 8 to 10.

018f7a643f.title: chocolate chip cookies
018f7a643f.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 3/4 c. flour 1/2 c. butter 1 tsp. salt 1/3 c. cocoa 1 tsp. extract 1 c. chips, walnuts or any kind of nuts 1 tsp. baking_soda 1 tsp. baking_powder
018f7a643f.recipe: mix all ingredients. drop by spoonful on ungreased cookie sheet. bake at 400 for 10 to 12 minutes or until set.

0203800a8d.title: sourdough pancakes
