0203800a8d.ingredients: 1 tsp sugar 1 egg 1 cup flour 1 pinch salt 1 1/2 cup milk 1/2 tsp oil or shortening 1 tbsp butter or oil
0203800a8d.recipe: preheat your griddle or iron skillet to 375f. mix the sugar and egg together in a bowl. add in the rest of the ingredients to the bowl of sugar and egg and mix. pour the mixture onto your griddle or iron skillet, using 1 1/2 tablespoons of butter to coat the pan. flip when you see a nice golden brown brown around the edges. when the other side has browned, cover with some paper towels to absorb excess grease and serve. you can cook in a griddle over medium heat for approximatley 2 minutes and they are ready to eat delicious with syrup. enjoy

0265488cfa.title: braised duck recipe
0265488cfa.ingredients: 1 lb duck 1/4 tsp pepper 1 lrg onion sliced 1 tsp salt 1/2 c. oil 1 lrg garlic clove crushed 1/2 x clove crushed 1 tbsp. minced fresh parsley 1 tbsp. paprika
0265488cfa.recipe: preheat oven to 400 degrees. rinse duck and dry thoroughly. place pepper and onion slices in cavity. sprinkle salt over skin. drizzle with the oil. place fat side up in shallow roasting pan. place garlic and clove in cavity. roast for 1 1/2 hrs, basting frequently. combine remaining ingredients in small bowl. add in to pan and turn breast side up. continue roasting for 1 to 1 1/2 hrs or possibly till tender. carve into 1/2 inch slices. yield 6 servings. note this dish can be prepared a day ahead and chilled, covered. it is great on burgers, or possibly served with gravy.

00cb6adae1.title: grilled chicken and cheese salad
00cb6adae1.ingredients: 1 chicken breasts 1 pepper yellow or green 1 slice sliced cheese 1/2 tomato 2 tbsp oil 1 japanese leek 1 tbsp onion 1 tbsp mayonnaise 1 pinch salt 1 tbsp vinegar 1 clove grated garlic 1 tbsp parsley 2 tbsp juice from soaking chicken
00cb6adae1.recipe: cut up the chicken breasts into bite sized pieces. place the chicken pieces, pepper and cheese into a bowl. chop the onion. slice the tomato. put the tomatoes in a bowl with the soaking water from soaking chicken. squeeze the water from the chicken into the bowl. squeeze the lemon juice in a strainer over the bowl. mix the ingredients well and season with salt. pour the dressing over the shredded chicken in step 5. mix. chill for about 30 minutes. serve as you prefer.

01b37ab932.title: romaine lettuce and tomato salad
01b37ab932.ingredients: 1 bunch romaine lettuce 1/4 cup pepper 2 ounces cheese, sliced 1 tablespoon oil 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 tablespoon vinegar 1 dash juice 2 tablespoons onion, chopped 1 tomato, cut into wedges 1 clove 1 dash parsley
01b37ab932.recipe: place lettuce leaves in a salad bowl and sprinkle with pepper and cheese. mix the rest of the ingredients in a cup and stir until well blended. pour over lettuce leaves and toss lightly.

013a91cfae.title: chocolate drops
013a91cfae.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 3/4 c. all purpose flour 1/4 c. butter 1 tsp. extract 6 tbsp. cocoa 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 c. milk 1 tbsp. baking_powder
013a91cfae.recipe: cream together butter and sugar. add egg. mix together the cocoa, salt, milk and baking powder. mix dry ingredients with the milk mixture. add extract, stir to blend. drop by teaspoons onto a lightly greased baking pan. bake at 350 until lightly brown. makes about 7 dozen.

005852c271.title: easy, fresh and delicious cheesy fritters
005852c271.ingredients: 1 1/2 kg fresh or frozen asparagus 1 pepper 4 slice cheese 1 salt and pepper 1 dash butter 1 dash oil 1 egg 1 clove 2 tbsp finely chopped parsley or fresh green onions
005852c271.recipe: cut the asparagus into 8 pieces. heat some butter and oil in a frying pan, add the asparagus and garlic. add pepper to taste and fry until the asparagus are cooked. add salt and pepper, to taste, and mix well. when everything is coated, turn off the heat, add the egg and cheese to the pan, stir quickly, then mix. add the parsley and stir again to evenly coat the surface. transfer to a plate and serve.

0029fb3ebf.title: vanilla buttercream
0029fb3ebf.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1/2 c. butter 1/3 c. cream 1 tsp. extract 1 c. evaporated milk
0029fb3ebf.recipe: cream together sugar and butter. add egg and cream to sugar and butter. mix well. add remaining ingredients and beat until creamy. makes 1 1/4 cups.

00a7b36a48.title: hot fish with cheese
00a7b36a48.ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. fish fillets 1 1/2 c. chopped, seeded jalapeno pepper 2 c. cheese cheddar, jack or colby 1/2 c. chopped onion 2/3 c. mayonnaise 1/2 tsp. salt 1 large tomato 1/4 c. oil
00a7b36a48.recipe: combine first five ingredients mix well. brush each piece of fish with oil. place fish in greased shallow baking pan and bake at 425 for 20 to 25 minutes. if desired, garnish with tomato and additional chopped green pepper.

0229f33f43.title: healthy refried beans with fresh greens
0229f33f43.ingredients: 1 block cheese 1 medium tomato 1/2 lettuce 1/4 onion 1 avocado 1 tortilla 1 dash pepper 1 mayonnaise 4 to 6 tablespoons refried beans 1 clove
0229f33f43.recipe: chop the onion, tomato, and lettuce into thin pieces. chop the avocado into small pieces. sprinkle the onions over the lettuce. heat the refried beans with mayonnaise and hot pepper to heat through. place a tortilla on a plate. place the lettuce, tomato, pepper and onion mixture on the tortilla. top with avocado and lettuce, then the seasoned mayonnaise. add the refried beans, then the cheese slices, and finish with a touch of mayonnaise and hot pepper.

023d9bfa34.title: pigs in a blanket
023d9bfa34.ingredients: 1 pkg. pepper roll crackers 1 c. cheese, grated 1 egg, beaten 1 onion, grated 1 lb. cooked beef or pork, shredded or finely chopped 1/4 tsp. salt
023d9bfa34.recipe: spread crackers on a 9 inch square pan. combine remaining ingredients and spread on crackers. bake at 400 for 20 minutes. cut into 2 inch squares and serve warm.

002fd94c16.title: fried apples
002fd94c16.ingredients: 2 c. sliced apples 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 3/4 c. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 2 tbsp. oil 2 tbsp. melted butter
002fd94c16.recipe: mix fruit and sugar. let sit for 1 hour. mix egg, flour, salt, milk, baking powder and oil together. fold this mixture into fruit mixture. pour off as much liquid as you can from the fruit. fry in hot fat at 375 until golden brown. drain on paper towels. roll in melted butter to serve.

00a16b3741.title: vegetable bisque
00a16b3741.ingredients: 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 medium size potato 3 tbsp. butter salt to taste 1/4 c. chopped onion 3 c. milk 1 c. broth 1 carrot, grated 4 tbsp. flour 1/2 c. chopped celery 1 c. cream pinch of clove parsley thyme
00a16b3741.recipe: heat milk with broth. make a roux by melting butter and adding flour. after browning, add chopped carrot, pepper, celery, potato, salt, garlic and parsley. let cook for 3 or 4 minutes. add cream, stirring constantly until slightly thickened. add vegetables and cook until tender. add pepper to taste.

01e57fdacf.title: fudge topping
01e57fdacf.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1 4 oz. bar unsweetened chocolate 1 6 oz. bag nestle toll house chocolate mini chips 1 stick butter 4 tbsp. cocoa 1 tsp. extract 1 can evaporated milk
01e57fdacf.recipe: melt butter and chocolate over very low heat. add melted chocolate mixture and all the remaining ingredients. bring to a boil boil for 1 1/2 minutes. use on cake or in a brownie, etc.

0064541c94.title: baked apple
0064541c94.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg, slightly beaten 2 tbsp. melted butter 1/2 tsp. cinnamon dash of salt 1 c. diced apple
0064541c94.recipe: place apple in ungreased 1 1/2 quart casserole. mix sugar, egg, butter, cinnamon and salt. pour over apples. bake at 350 for about 30 minutes.

016f1a1ecc.title: soy sauce salad dressing
016f1a1ecc.ingredients: 5 tbsp hot pepper 1 medium chopped onion 1/2 tbsp salt 1 1/2 tbsp cider vinegar 1/2 tbsp mustard seeds 1/4 tbsp ajobushi 1 juice 2 tbsp oil 1/2 tbsp chopped garlic 1 clove 2 tbsp soy_sauce
016f1a1ecc.recipe: add all spices to a bowl, stir and set aside. in a bowl, pour oil and mix all other ingredients, add the dry mix and mix well. i usually add extra dressing mixture to make the dressing hotter. you can always adjust the amount of chili powder to your taste or spice level. if you put it into a bottle, you can just fill it with the sour sauce and it s ready to go. this recipe is easy to make and everyone raves over

00a6454e9c.title: savory chicken pie
00a6454e9c.ingredients: 6 slices cheese 1 egg 1 slice onion 1 chicken pc. 1/4 c. cream salt and pepper 1/2 c. milk 1 sliced tomato 1 tbsp. oil
00a6454e9c.recipe: slice and fry onion in oil. add chicken and fry. remove from heat and place in bowl. beat eggs, milk, cream and cheese. add chicken mixture. pour into a pie plate. place tomato slices on top and bake at 375 for 20 minutes.

0169c3423c.title: chicken soup recipe
0169c3423c.ingredients: 1 whole pepper, minced 1/4 c. minced onion 1 tbsp. oil 2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon clove 1 c. tomato, peeled and minced 2 c. juice from chicken 1 teaspoon basil 1 tbsp. vinegar 1 tbsp. cilantro 1 tbsp. parsley 1/8 teaspoon cumin
0169c3423c.recipe: saute/fry pepper, onion, in warm oil in a saucepan. stir in remaining ingredients, bring to a boil. lower heat and simmer 20 min. serves 6.

013243d0c6.title: funnel cakes
013243d0c6.ingredients: 1 tsp. sugar 1 egg 1 3/4 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 3/4 c. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. oil butter
013243d0c6.recipe: put butter in iron skillet. heat until brown. sift flour, baking powder and salt together. mix milk, sugar, egg and oil. beat together. pour a tsp. of the mixture in each pan of hot butter. fry batter for a few seconds on each side.

003e231a46.title: butterscotch pie
003e231a46.ingredients: 2/3 c. sugar 1 egg, separated 1/4 c. butter 3 tbsp. flour 1/4 tsp. extract 2 c. milk dash of salt 3 or 4 tbsp. cream or half and half cinnamon to taste
003e231a46.recipe: blend 1 1/2 cups sugar, egg yolk, flour and salt. add milk and butter. cook and stir over medium heat until thick. cool. pour into baked pie crust.

01d611184d.title: cheesy squash pancakes
01d611184d.ingredients: 10 squash 1 pinch pepper 1 swiss or mozzarella cheese 1 egg, beaten 1 pinch salt 1 onion, grated 1/2 cup milk 1/2 tbsp oil 1 tbsp butter 1/2 clove 1 1/2 tbsp flour
01d611184d.recipe: grate cheese and squash. place all ingredients except butter and flour in blender. process just until well mixed. melt butter and oil in a pan on medium high heat. add flour until golden brown and smooth. add squash and cook until the squash starts to separate. add the cheese and cook until the cheese melts. serve on pancakes and garnish with parsley or tomato. or, make a cheesy breakfast sandwich using the ingredients and toppings.

00ed414a87.title: cheese balls
00ed414a87.ingredients: 1/2 cup pepper, grated 1/2 cup cheese, grated 1 egg 1 teaspoon salt 4 tablespoons milk 1 tablespoon oil 1/2 onion, finely chopped 1/2 cup breadcrumbs
00ed414a87.recipe: beat egg, add milk, salt, pepper and cheese. add onion and bread crumbs. mix well and roll into balls. drop into hot grease and fry until brown.

0229335db9.title: swedish tea cakes
0229335db9.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 tbsp. melted butter 1 tbsp. milk 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. extract 1 c. cream pinch of salt 1 tsp. vanilla
0229335db9.recipe: mix all ingredients together. drop by tablespoon into deep fat. cook to light brown.

00d3303e76.title: agua fresca recipe
00d3303e76.ingredients: 1 c. granulated sugar 2 c. sm. ice cubes 1 quart. chilled fresh lemon or possibly lime juice 1 quart. chilled orange or possibly lemonade
00d3303e76.recipe: in a 10 inch dutch oven, heat 1 c. water with sugar to boiling. boil 1 minute or possibly till mix is syrupy. add in sm. ice cubes and stir till sugar dissolves. remove from heat. add in lime or possibly orange juice and lemon and orange cubes stir till mix is thoroughly combined. cover and refrigerateovernight. serve over ice.

00d62b35e6.title: cheese pancakes
00d62b35e6.ingredients: 1 tablespoon sugar 1 cheese 1 egg 2 tablespoons flour 1 pinch salt 250 ml milk 1 tablespoon oil 1 butter
00d62b35e6.recipe: combine milk and oil. mix well. add sugar, flour, eggs, salt and cheese and mix well. heat a skillet and lightly butter and pour in the mix. cook until the surface is golden. flip and cook on the other side.

0018949bd3.title: shakshuka
0018949bd3.ingredients: 1 lb cheese, of your choice sliced 2 tablespoons mayonnaise 14 cup onion, diced 8 slices bread 2 sliced tomato salt and pepper 1 egg 1 tablespoon oil 2 tablespoons cream
0018949bd3.recipe: mix the mayonnaise and onions together. place 3 slices of bread on a platter. spread the above mixture over the bread in layers. place the tomato slices on top of the cheese. place the remaining slices of bread on top and brush the egg and oil on the insides. place sandwiches in oven and broil for 5 minutes. remove and serve with cream.

014a14fe8f.title: chili cheese quesadilla
014a14fe8f.ingredients: 1 slice cheese 12 onion, sliced 1 tortilla 12 ounce chili garlic powder 1 fresh tomato 12 cup beef, shredded salt and pepper 1 egg
014a14fe8f.recipe: grease a non stick skillet with butter and saute the onion until soft and lightly browned. add garlic powder and stir well for 30 seconds. add the tortilla and let it cook in your skillet over medium heat, about 2 3 minutes. you might want to add more oil or butter if you don t have a non stick pan, just make sure it has a generous amount of oil in it. when the tortilla is crisp and browned, flip it and cook on the other side for another minute or until the bottom is just crisp and browned. remove the tortilla and drain the excess oil. place the cooked tortilla on a small plate and then, put a slice of cheese on it to melt a bit. after you ve melted the cheese spread it to cover the bottom half of the tortilla. then place the onion, chopped tomato, and shredded meat on top of that. put another layer of tortilla on top and melt the cheese again. slice it in half and serve

012c33dff8.title: quick rolls
012c33dff8.ingredients: 3 tbsp. sugar 1 beaten egg 3 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1 pkg. dry yeast 1 tbsp. oil 1 c. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder
012c33dff8.recipe: combine all ingredients. mix well. dough will be dry and stiff. make into rolls and let rise 1 hour. bake at 400 for about 25 minutes.

008ba877fa.title: oatmeal chip cookies
008ba877fa.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 c. butter or margarine 1 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. miniature m m s or mini chips 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 1/2 c. oats
008ba877fa.recipe: preheat oven to 375. beat sugar and egg together. cream in butter. add flour, extracts, salt, cinnamon and oats mix well. stir in m m s. bake 10 to 12 minutes. do not overbake.

01d2d1166d.title: lace cookies
01d2d1166d.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3/4 c. butter 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 2/3 c. flour 1 c. oats 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
01d2d1166d.recipe: beat egg. cream sugar, butter and egg. sift flour, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt. add alternately with oats to creamed mixture. drop on greased cookie sheet. bake at 350 for 8 minutes or until brown.

024cc0365f.title: roast duck with mashed potatoes
024cc0365f.ingredients: 1 4 to 5 pound roasting duck pepper 1 large potato, sliced salt oil 1 large onion, sliced 4 tablespoons butter 1 small whole clove 2 tablespoons flour 1/4 teaspoon thyme garlic powder paprika
024cc0365f.recipe: sprinkle duck with salt and pepper. in roasting pan, arrange onion. pierce duck with clove. arrange duck on onions. place potatoes in roasting pan with water to cover and roast at 425 f for 1 1/2 hours, or until potatoes are tender. let duck rest before carving. sauce saute potatoes and onion in butter until soft. stir in flour and spices. add water and milk and mash with a potato masher.

00fd08e37d.title: hot n sour soup
00fd08e37d.ingredients: 1 hot red pepper 1/2 large onion, minced 1/4 c. oil 1 tbsp. salt 1/4 tsp. clove 1/4 tsp. garlic, crushed 1/2 c. vinegar 1/2 tsp. ginger 1 c. soy_sauce
00fd08e37d.recipe: cut up the hot peppers. combine with the rest of the ingredients. heat on medium and let simmer for 30 minutes.

0270326ef9.title: chalupa
0270326ef9.ingredients: 1 pepper 1 onion 1 tomato 1 clove 3 tbsp oil salt 1 bunch cilantro 225 grams beans 1 cumin 1 juice 1 garlic 1/2 tbsp vinegar 1/2 jalapeno chili
0270326ef9.recipe: cut the onion and peppers into big pieces. add the oil in a pan, and fry the onion, peppers, tomato and garlic. add the saffron, cumin and vinegar. saute well. add the beans and salt. boil for 15 minutes. add the jalapeno and cilantro.

00c593abea.title: agua fresca
00c593abea.ingredients: 1 lb. cooked ground meat and pepper to taste 1 lb. cheese, cubed 2 medium diced onion 1 egg 1 tbsp. salt 1 c. breadcrumbs 1 c. oil 1/2 stick butter 2 clove s worth green olives parsley to garnish
00c593abea.recipe: heat oil and butter. add a few pieces of onion. when onion is tender, add meat, cheese and spices. saute for 3 to 4 minutes. cool to room temperature. add egg and breadcrumbs. form into patties and roll in flour. brown lightly on both sides. garnish with olives and parsley.

01308dfc5c.title: venison or lamb stew
01308dfc5c.ingredients: 2 lb. venison, cut in serving pieces pepper onion salt 1 clove oil garlic paprika 1 carrot, sliced 2 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. thyme
01308dfc5c.recipe: cut meat into bite size pieces. add pepper, salt, onion, garlic and paprika to meat. coat meat with thyme and flour. brown meat in hot oil, then add carrot and cover. cook slowly 30 to 40 minutes until meat is tender. serve with rice or mashed potatoes.

01b0722ab2.title: frosted coffee cake
01b0722ab2.ingredients: 2 1/2 cups sugar 1 egg 3 cups flour 2/3 cup butter or margarine 2 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. salt 3/4 cup milk 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract whipped cream
01b0722ab2.recipe: cream sugar, butter and egg. add dry ingredients alternately with milk. pour half into two greased and floured 9 inch layer pans. add cinnamon, then pour remaining batter over cinnamon and bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 40 minutes. remove from oven and pour over the whipped cream topped with sugar and cinnamon.

0084a23f67.title: sandwich ad
0084a23f67.ingredients: 2 slice processed cheese 1 lettuce 1 tbsp mayonnaise 1 small onion 1 slice bread 1 small tomato 1 salt and pepper 1 hamburger bun
0084a23f67.recipe: cut the cheese to bite size pieces and slice up the lettuce to make hamburger rolls. sprinkle salt and pepper on the meat. spread mayonnaise on the bread. slice the onion thinly and saute in oil until the garlic becomes translucent. saute the onion. season the lettuce with salt and pepper. mix it with mayonnaise. lay the other ingredients on the bread. cut the tomato and put it in the sandwich rolls. wrap it up in aluminum foil and it s complete

01e5bded68.title: hot fish skewers
01e5bded68.ingredients: 500 grams squid 1 pepper 1/2 onion 1 dash salt and pepper 1 dash oil 1 tbsp tomato paste 1 tsp vinegar 1 clove 1/2 tsp garlic 1 dash rum 1 juice
01e5bded68.recipe: marinate the squid with the marinade for about 15 minutes. peel the onion and remove the stem of the tomato. cut the onion into small wedges. using aluminum foil, make a sheet of aluminium foil and cut each squid into 4 pieces. cut the pepper into 8 pieces. place the cut onion in a bowl and sprinkle with salt and pepper. add oil and mix together. using the aluminium foil, make 4 portions of the squid and add to the bowl. place a slice of tomato on each piece of squid. combine the vinegar and the garlic and pour it into the bowl. mix together and add the rum and juice. pour it over the ingredients from step 1. mix together well and marinate in the refrigerator for several hours. grill the squid with the tomato slices. grill in the oven for 15 to 20 minutes. turn over carefully when the squid is cooked. serve with the grilled onion slices.

0065c9574d.title: asparagus with sharp cheese
0065c9574d.ingredients: asparagus spears sugar cheese salt butter juice
0065c9574d.recipe: trim the sugar to 1/4 inch. remove any white ends from the asparagus. bring a small amount of water to a boil. add asparagus and blanch briefly, about 1 minute. remove with a slotted spoon and drain, keeping warm. cut the cheese into 1/4 inch chunks and crumble over the asparagus. season with salt and butter, and top with lemon juice.

005a7aa8db.title: dilled ricotta cheese
005a7aa8db.ingredients: 3 ounces ricotta cheese 1 ounce sugar 1 tablespoon crumbled cheese salt and black pepper, to taste 1 ounce butter, melted 1 tablespoon juice
005a7aa8db.recipe: melt the cheese in a small pot over low heat, stirring constantly. sprinkle the cheese with a bit of salt and pepper, and add butter. gradually add the ricotta to the cheese mixture. mash the ricotta down well while stirring with a wooden spoon, and continue to stir until it has a smooth consistency. add the juice, and mix well.

013b8fdf18.title: creamy peppercorn pasta
013b8fdf18.ingredients: 1 tsp pepper 1 pasta 1 cheese 1 oil for deep frying 1 tsp butter 1 salt to taste 1/2 clove 1 tsp cream 1 tsp juice
013b8fdf18.recipe: first, make the pasta. if you don t have a pasta maker, you can just make it as usual. slice the cheese into little pieces. melt the butter and oil in a pot. add the spices and peppercorns. bring to a boil. add the pasta and cook until al dente. once the pasta has cooked through, add the cream and juice. pour the sauce over the pasta and enjoy. also, you can omit the cheese and garlic clove.

01baf1585b.title: chiles rellenos with tomato sauce
01baf1585b.ingredients: 4 chiles rellenos del monte pepper 4 slices cheese 1 tbsp. oil 1/2 tomato 1 clove 1 tsp. salt juice 1 onion
01baf1585b.recipe: wash and dry chiles. slice them into rounds and place them in a bowl. grate onion and place it in the bowl. add salt, pepper, olive oil, juice, garlic and tomato. let stand at room temperature for at least 1 hour. heat olive oil in a skillet and add slices of cheese and chiles. saute and turn until cheese is melted. serve hot.

026eaebcf3.title: annie lily s flank steak
026eaebcf3.ingredients: 1 slice pepper steak about 1/4 inch thick 1 small onion 2 tbsp. oil 2 tbsp. salt 1/2 tsp. clove 4 cloves garlic, chopped 1 c. juice 2 tbsp. butter 1/4 tsp. thyme 2 tbsp. flour
026eaebcf3.recipe: make the sauce from the butter, flour, salt and pepper and thyme. saute the onion in the oil until tender. add the meat and brown on both sides. add the garlic, cloves and juice. cook slowly for about 1 hour. place in casserole. bake until meat is tender, approximately 40 minutes at 375. remove meat to a warm platter. reduce liquid in skillet until thickens. pour over meat.

01670c5a68.title: best ever mushroom stock
01670c5a68.ingredients: pepper 1 cup onion, diced 2 teaspoons salt broth 12 cup carrot, diced 4 tablespoons butter 1 clove 14 cup parsley, diced 2 tablespoons celery, diced 3 tablespoons flour 12 teaspoon thyme 1 garlic clove, minced 4 cups stock 12 lb mushroom
01670c5a68.recipe: make a roux of the butter, flour, salt, pepper, clove, parsley, onion, and celery. add the stock. bring to a boil. add mushrooms and simmer.

01a168b238.title: apricot pie
01a168b238.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 2 tbsp. butter 3 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. cinnamon pinch of salt 1/2 c. milk 1/2 tsp. extract
01a168b238.recipe: mix all ingredients and pour into unbaked pie shell. cook at 350 for 30 minutes. add apricots and serve warm or cold.

011be2c74d.title: simple sauce
011be2c74d.ingredients: 1 poblano pepper 1 onion 1 tablespoon oil 1 cup chopped tomato 1 clove 12 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon oregano 1 minced garlic clove 12 teaspoon cumin 12 cup broth
011be2c74d.recipe: roast the poblano. use 2 or 3 in a frying pan, and turn until the black all over. add 2 chopped onions to the frying pan and saute in the oil for a minute or two. add the tomatoes, cloves, oregano, salt, cumin and garlic. saute for five minutes, and then add the broth and simmer to blend the flavors. allow to cool to room temperature before covering and refrigerating. it will be served warm or cold.

013f1a6407.title: easy summer salad
013f1a6407.ingredients: 3 slices cheese 1 tomato 1 tbsp oil 1/8 onion 1 lettuce 1 dash basil 1 clove 1 olive 1 salt and pepper 1/2 tsp juice if needed
013f1a6407.recipe: peel the tomato, then cut into slices. slice the onion thinly. cut the lettuce in half and mix with the olives. sprinkle on some salt and pepper if needed. slice the cheese thinly. heat oil in a frying pan and saute the onion and basil until the onion is wilted. when the onion is golden brown, add the tomato, sliced cheese, and the olives. when the cheese has melted, season with salt and pepper to taste. i added the tomato slices last after finishing sauteing. arrange the mixture on a plate, and arrange the lettuce on top.

01929f3065.title: iced tea
01929f3065.ingredients: 4 tea bags 1/2 c. water 1 c. juice 1/4 c. ice 1 lemon, peeled and sliced 1 orange, peeled and sliced mint leaves
01929f3065.recipe: steep tea bags in water for 15 minutes. drain. add juice and ice. serve over ice garnish with lemon and orange slices and mint leaves.

016c472a21.title: crock pot roast stuffed steak
016c472a21.ingredients: 1 whole pepper 1 lb. round steak, 1 inch thick 1 large potato 1 tsp. salt 1 whole clove 1 tbsp. butter 3/4 c. broth or 1 bouillon cube and 3/4 c. water 1/2 tsp. thyme 1 small onion, chopped 2 tbsp. chopped parsley 1 tbsp. oil flour
016c472a21.recipe: score fat side of steak. put on paper towel. rub with salt and pepper. halve potato lengthwise. cut quarters in half again, then into 4 pieces each. place in crock pot and place onion, potato, parsley, clove, salt and thyme on top. cook on high setting for 2 hours.

023b3432ce.title: easy homemade ziti casserole
023b3432ce.ingredients: 1 pepper green or red 1 cheese 1 tomato 1 oil 1 onion 1 box ziti pasta 1 clove 1 egg 1 pinch salt 1 pinch basil 1 pinch oregano 1 pinch parsley
023b3432ce.recipe: slice peppers and onions thinly, slice tomatoes and put them in a bowl. boil pasta. in the meantime, in a medium bowl, combine oil, egg, basil, oregano, parsley and salt. put pasta in the bowl with the egg mixture. add garlic and stir well. add the tomato sauce and mix well. pour it into a oven proof dish. add the peppers and onions, sprinkle with cheese. bake in oven for 45 minutes. the cheese, onions, and tomatoes and the pasta may be added later. it will melt into the sauce from the oven.

006d7af895.title: amarula daiquiri
006d7af895.ingredients: 1 package of amarula sugar disolved in 2 tablespoons water 1 cup pure orange juice 2 cups ice
006d7af895.recipe: combine amarula powder and juice together. chill. fill glasses with ice and then pour over mixture. enjoy

002cc78992.title: berry berry ice cream
002cc78992.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1 cup chopped strawberries or raspberries 1 cup heavy whipping cream 1/2 cup juice 2 cups milk cool_whip
002cc78992.recipe: add all ingredients except coolwhip to blender blend at high speed for 1 minute. add coolwhip and blend until smooth churn in the ice cream maker according to manufacturer s instructions makes about 2 quarts

01c4825598.title: pork yukon or shimeji recipe
01c4825598.ingredients: 1 c. kimchi 2 tsp pepper 2 tsp onion pwdr 1 c. soy_sauce 1 tbsp. vinegar 1 tsp ginger 1/2 c. oil 1 tsp salt 1/2 tsp clove 1 lb pork 1 x carrot 1 x garlic pwdr 1 tbsp. mustard seeds
01c4825598.recipe: cut the carrots and garlic into matchsticks and set aside. slice the meat and set aside. mix the ingredients from the pepper to the vinegar in a jar. add in the meat. shake until the meat is well coated. marinate in the refrigerator for at least 8 hrs. if you are using meat with bones in it, soak overnight in cool water, wash off the scum, and rub with salt. put the oil in a large frying pan. bring to a temperature which will not touch the bottom of the pan. reduce the heat. add in the carrots. fry for about 2 minutes. reduce the heat to a low temperature. add in the seasonings. stir in the pork. cover the pan and cook over low heat for about 1 hour, till tender.

008f1825b2.title: honey pepper sauce
008f1825b2.ingredients: 3 tbsp pepper 2/3 cup honey 1 tbsp salt 2/3 cup vinegar 2 tbsp lemon juice 1 tbsp oil 3 clove chopped garlic 1 clove 1 clove chopped onion 4 tbsp butter
008f1825b2.recipe: sautee onion and garlic add the olive oil add all the rest of the ingredients mix and cook on medium heat until sauce is thick. pour over chicken or seafood. or add sauce to rice or chicken.

021a623f81.title: dumplings
021a623f81.ingredients: 3 tbsp. sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. milk 1 tbsp. baking_powder 1 tbsp. oil 1 stick butter or oleo
021a623f81.recipe: mix all ingredients. drop by spoonful into hot cooking pot. add a cup of water and bring to a boil. cook for 15 minutes.

01aaab3f36.title: sweet bread
01aaab3f36.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 5 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 2 pkg. yeast 1/4 c. oil 2 c. milk
01aaab3f36.recipe: mix together until creamy all ingredients except milk. mix in milk and 1 egg. mix in last of flour. let rise about 40 minutes. pat in pans bake at 350 for 25 minutes.

018eb4743e.title: potato torte
018eb4743e.ingredients: 1 3 ounce package pepper jack cheese, cubed 14 cup monterey jack cheese, grated 12 medium onion, chopped fine 1 medium potato, grated 1 egg 14 teaspoon salt flour 14 teaspoon garlic powder oil, for frying butter
018eb4743e.recipe: heat oil in a large skillet or frying pan. add onion and garlic and cook until translucent. add grated potato, salt, flour and shredded cheese, stirring well. add egg and mix well. spread mixture into a 9 inch round cake pan, pressing down so that layer is even in the bottom. heat 1/4 c of butter and 1/4 c oil in a skillet over medium high heat. pour pan with potato and onion mixture into the hot skillet. flatten mixture by turning the pan and swirling it around the pan until the bottom is covered with potato. reduce heat to low. cook 10 to 15 minutes. flip and cook another 10 to 15 minutes until crust forms on top and edges are golden. remove from skillet and place on serving plate. cover and refrigerate or freeze. thaw 30 minutes to an hour before removing from pan.

00a17f6ae9.title: lemon chicken
00a17f6ae9.ingredients: 1 teaspoon pepper 1 4 lb chicken 1 teaspoon salt 1 clove, minced 1 tablespoon butter, melted 2 tablespoons juice 3 tablespoons oil 2 tablespoons flour
00a17f6ae9.recipe: preheat oven to 350. trim the chicken, and remove any visible fat. sprinkle the pepper on both sides and season with the salt. in a bowl, combine the clove, butter, and lemon juice. coat chicken pieces with the mixture, and place in a greased pan. bake 40 to 50 minutes or until a meat thermometer registers 175. meanwhile, heat the oil in a skillet, and stir in the flour. cook, stirring, for 3 minutes. remove the chicken from the pan, and pour in the lemon juice mixture. let mixture thicken slightly. serve with rice or veg. sauce.

0091e5b086.title: french crepes
0091e5b086.ingredients: sugar 1 egg flour salt milk baking_powder oil butter baking_soda
0091e5b086.recipe: in a bowl mix sugar, egg and milk put flour, salt, and baking powder in a cup and add milk and egg mixture if necessary put enough oil into a pan to cover pan well. add a tablespoon of batter each time you turn it over. keep cooking until brown flip it and fry the other side. slice butter on each side of the crepe. eat

0039542254.title: chili stir fry
0039542254.ingredients: 1 pepper 1 onion 1 tbsp oil 1 tbsp soy_sauce 1 tsp ginger 1 dash salt and pepper 1 clove 2 garlic cloves 1/2 carrot 150 grams pork 1/2 tbsp cornstarch 1 cup broth 1 chili 1 turmeric
0039542254.recipe: chop ginger, garlic, onion, carrot, pepper, pork and garlic into bite sizes. heat wok. add oil and put in the vegetables. once they start to get tender add the pork. add soy sauce, chili and turmeric for flavor. mix up. stir until mixture starts to stick to the wok. put in the cornstarch, and add broth until you get the soup consistency you like. it is finished add salt and pepper to taste, and then stir fry for 5 minutes. serve over rice. to eat add any other veggies you like. i used 1 red bell pepper, 1 red bell pepper, 1 jalapeno, green onion, 1 tbsp soy sauce, and boiled for 5 minutes.

003c17c817.title: peach custard pie
003c17c817.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 3 tbsp. butter or margarine, softened 2 tbsp. flour 1 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 2 c. milk
003c17c817.recipe: add sugar and egg to butter. blend well. add milk, flour, cinnamon and salt. pour into pie pan. bake in 375 oven for 30 minutes.

018ce92262.title: apple dumplings
018ce92262.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. honey 1/2 c. butter, melted 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. salt 1 apple
018ce92262.recipe: combine ingredients and mix well. place apple in center of greased baking dish. place a spoonful of filling on each one. bake 1 hour at 350. serve hot or cold.

012f5d12fc.title: naranja cheese kassi
012f5d12fc.ingredients: pepper cheese oil salt pinch of clove 1 egg paprika
012f5d12fc.recipe: make small burgers with the cheese, season with salt and pepper. roll burgers in egg and season. bake at 350 until well cooked.

0101c3fc13.title: chicken and cheese croquettes
0101c3fc13.ingredients: 1 cup cheese, grated 1 onion, chopped 1 cup cooked chicken, diced 1 egg, beaten salt and pepper milk 1 teaspoon garlic, minced
0101c3fc13.recipe: combine cheese, chicken, onion, garlic and salt and pepper in a bowl. form into small balls. fry in oil until brown. mix egg with a little milk. dip croquettes into egg and milk mixture then dredge in flour. drop into hot oil and fry until golden brown.

018485b27b.title: french onion soup
018485b27b.ingredients: 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 potato 4 tbsp. butter 1 c. sliced onion 2 c. milk 1 tsp. salt 1 c. cream 1/2 c. broth 1/4 c. diced carrot 2 tbsp. flour 1/2 c. diced celery 2 tbsp. chopped parsley pinch of clove
018485b27b.recipe: add 1/2 cup broth, potatoes, carrots, celery, onion, parsley, clove and pepper. cook until vegetables are tender. add butter and flour, stirring until smooth. add remaining broth and milk. heat to boiling. add cream and salt and beat well. makes 4 servings.

006e97259c.title: tuna salad with cheese
006e97259c.ingredients: 1 large tuna steak 2 slice cheese 1 lettuce 1 tbsp oil 2 tbsp mayonnaise 1 tbsp vinegar 2 tbsp juice 1 tbsp japanese leek powder optional
006e97259c.recipe: use a block of cheese for the cheese. cut the tuna into thin strips. i used cucumber for the lettuce. shred the lettuce and place in a bowl. mix all ingredients together. add the tuna and mix well. there s no need to put salt in it in step 2.

0264063b7a.title: sugar cookies
0264063b7a.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 4 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tbsp. melted butter 1 tsp. baking_soda 1 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 c. oil 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. extract 3/4 c. buttermilk
0264063b7a.recipe: mix dry ingredients together. beat egg. add oil, buttermilk and egg. mix well. blend in flour. drop teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. sprinkle with sugar. bake at 400 for about 10 minutes, until lightly browned on bottom. makes 4 dozen.

01f62002ef.title: momma s cinnamon cake
01f62002ef.ingredients: 3/4 cup sugar 1 egg 2 cup flour 1/4 tsp salt 1/2 cup butter melted 1 tsp baking_soda 1 1/2 tsp baking powder 1 tsp cinnamon 1/3 cup oil 1 tsp vanilla 1 tsp extract 1 cup buttermilk
01f62002ef.recipe: preheat oven to 350f. mix flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda. sift sugar and cinnamon together. add to dry ingredients. add in melted butter, egg, oil, vanilla and extract. mix well. mix in buttermilk. pour into 9 x 9 inch pan. bake 30 to 35 minutes. frost with sugar, milk, or vanilla icing or a powder sugar frosting. the icing works well with the cake or cakes.

00627a94f7.title: cheese and beef sandwich sandwiches
00627a94f7.ingredients: 2 slice pizza cheese 1/2 onion 2 tbsp mayonnaise 1 egg 1 slice tomato 1 salt and pepper 3 slice beef 1 frying oil 2 tbsp cream
00627a94f7.recipe: cut onion into 8 slices and microwave for 30 seconds or microwave for 1 minute. in a bowl, add the onion, mayonnaise, and salt and pepper to taste and mix well. add the cheese and mix well. break one egg into a cup, add to the mixture and mix well. remove the inner skin from the tomato and cut into 10 thin slices. add the slices of beef to the mixture from step 2 and mix well. season the mixture with salt and pepper to taste. spread the hamburger mixture from step 4 on top of bread, and top with cheese, tomato slices and eggs. close the sandwiches and serve.

020c1c7487.title: chinese maple syrup
020c1c7487.ingredients: 1 cup sugar 1/4 cup honey 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
020c1c7487.recipe: place the sugar in a heavy bottomed medium pot over medium heat. add the honey and salt. stir constantly until the sugar dissolves and the syrup has an emulsion like consistency. continue cooking, stirring often to keep the syrup from sticking, until the sugar turns a light caramel color and the mixture is thickened. remove from the heat and stir in the cinnamon. cool completely, then store in an airtight container in the refrigerator up to 3 days.

0226b5df5f.title: cinnamon swirl coffee cake
0226b5df5f.ingredients: 1/4 cup sugar 1 egg 2 1/2 cup all purpose flour 1 pinch of salt 2 tbsp butter or margarine 3 1/2 tsp baking_powder 2 tsp baking_soda 2 tbsp cinnamon 1/4 cup oil 1/2 cup milk
0226b5df5f.recipe: preheat oven to 375 grease and flour an 8x8 pan mix all dry ingredients together mix in wet ingredients until just mixed pour into pan i sprinkled some cinnamon over the top bake 25 minutes

00b79c8c51.title: burger cheese
00b79c8c51.ingredients: 14 cup pepper 13 cup cheese, shredded 1 egg 4 tablespoons oil 1 tablespoon onion, minced 12 cup milk 14 teaspoon salt 1 pinch clove 1 tablespoon breadcrumbs
00b79c8c51.recipe: place all ingredients except bread crumbs into bowl. blend well and stuff into patties. coat with bread crumbs. heat oil in fry pan and fry until golden brown.

0191794dec.title: marinated pork or venison
0191794dec.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1/2 cup honey 1/4 cup soy_sauce 1/2 cup vinegar 2 tablespoons oil 1 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon ginger 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder 1/8 teaspoon clove 2 lbs venison or 2 lbs venison or 2 lbs pork
0191794dec.recipe: mix the first 7 ingredients and add the venison or meat of your choice. marinate for 2 hours or more. broil or cook until tender. serves 6 8.

00a85dec95.title: brie with sugar, cheese and citrus
00a85dec95.ingredients: 50 grams sugar 100 grams brie cheese 1 dash salt 20 grams butter 1 juice
00a85dec95.recipe: soak the sugar with a small amount of water and drain. cut into 2 3 cm cubes and dissolve the butter. put the brie in a heatproof container, and microwave on high for 2 minutes. add salt, cheese, and juice. pour the mixture over top of the brie. cover with plastic wrap. let it sit for 1 hour and it s done. it s delicious in a bento or with ice cream. use to make it more appealing.

01eb818f49.title: greek kale salad
01eb818f49.ingredients: 1 head kale 12 teaspoon pepper 4 slices cheese any type 12 cup oil 12 teaspoon salt 14 teaspoon clove 14 cup onion, chopped 1 tablespoon parsley 2 tablespoons juice 1 garlic clove, minced
01eb818f49.recipe: wash kale and remove tough stems. place in bowl, sprinkle with pepper and toss well. put oil, salt, garlic and clove in a pot and cook until it simmers. add all other ingredients and let it simmer until kale is tender. this will take about one hour. remove clove and serve

009c4057dc.title: granny s doughnuts
009c4057dc.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 tbsp. butter 3 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 2 tsp. extract 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. baking_powder pinch of nutmeg
009c4057dc.recipe: combine sugar, egg and butter. add flour, salt, cinnamon and baking powder. mix until dough forms. turn onto floured board and roll out. cut with doughnut cutter. fry in hot crisco or shortening until lightly browned.

0219560f5f.title: cinnamon muffins
0219560f5f.ingredients: 1/3 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. all purpose flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 3 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/3 c. oil 1/3 c. butter, softened
0219560f5f.recipe: combine sugar and egg. add flour, baking powder and salt. add oil and milk. add butter. blend until moistened. fill lightly greased muffin tins two thirds full. sprinkle with cinnamon and sugar. bake in 425 oven for about 15 minutes.

022c5ac97c.title: cheesecake
022c5ac97c.ingredients: 1 cup of sugar 2 cup of brie cheese 1/2 cup of whole milk 1/2 cup cream 2 tbsp of butter 1/2 cup cool_whip 1 tsp vanilla extract 1 tsp of almond extract 1 egg
022c5ac97c.recipe: preheat oven to 350 melt butter and sugar put 1/2 cup of sugar in a 2 cup bowl melt brie cheese and butter together add cheese mixture and whisk until smooth gradually add milk and cream and whisk for 3 minutes add all ingredients together except for the egg whisk egg until all is mixed into the whipped cream pour into a 13 x 9 greased dish and bake for 45 minutes or until done in middle refrigerate for 1 hour

0151dda521.title: scalloped potatoes
0151dda521.ingredients: 2 c. cooked, cubed potatoes 1 c. grated sharp cheese 1 egg 1 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1 medium onion, diced
0151dda521.recipe: preheat oven to 350. mix all ingredients, except potatoes. pour into a casserole dish. sprinkle potatoes on top. bake 30 minutes.

008c589858.title: adobo soup
008c589858.ingredients: 1 small dried chili pepper, smoked, mashed and seeded 1 medium onion, finely diced 1 tomato, chopped 1/2 whole clove salt and pepper 2 qt. broth beef or chicken 1 carrot, diced 2 tbsp. oil 2 to 3 lb. chuck beef, chopped 2 tbsp. cumin 1 c. celery, diced 2 c. beans 1 chili to taste or more 1 tbsp. thyme 1 tbsp. garlic, minced
008c589858.recipe: saute chopped onion and celery. add cumin. when the onions are translucent, add cooked beef. continue cooking until all pink is gone and beef is golden brown. add tomato, diced chili, minced garlic, chopped tomato and cumin. season with salt and pepper. cook until the flavors have blended. reduce the heat add broth and beans. add thyme and cloves. simmer until the beans are done. if it is too thick, add water. this soup may be frozen.

0168b409d1.title: pasta gratin
0168b409d1.ingredients: 2 slices pepper bread 300 grams cheese swiss or mozzarella 1 onion 350 grams pasta 1 tsp salt 50 ml milk 1/4 mushroom 50 grams butter 150 ml broth chicken, beef or vegetable 1 clove 1 cream
0168b409d1.recipe: slice the onion and mushrooms. preheat the oven to 200c. cut the bread into 5mm cubes and toast for 10 minutes. add the meat to boiling water and cook for 5 minutes. when cool, add the milk and broth to a hot pot, add the pasta and garlic, and cook until done. add the remaining ingredients from step 2 and stir. pour the mixture from step 3 into a casserole dish and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes. it is good warm topped with cheese.

00ed280786.title: grandma s sugar cookies
00ed280786.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 2 1/2 c. flour 2/3 c. melted butter 1/4 tsp. salt 1 1/2 tbsp. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking_soda
00ed280786.recipe: mix sugar, egg, butter, salt, milk and baking powder. add extracts and cinnamon. drop by spoonfuls on greased baking sheet. bake at 375 for 12 to 14 minutes.

0040c511dd.title: stuffed peppers
0040c511dd.ingredients: 4 large pepper 1 slice cheese 1 large tomato 1 medium onion, sliced seasoning salt and pepper oil for frying 1 lb. minced beef 1 clove, minced 1 egg 1/2 tsp. oregano 2 to 3 cloves garlic
0040c511dd.recipe: add meat and spices to mix with egg. make 4 slices and stuff with mixture. bake in oven for 25 minutes at 350.

0068cbc4b7.title: old fashion egg custard
0068cbc4b7.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 2 tbsp. flour 1 tbsp. butter pinch of salt 2 c. milk 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
0068cbc4b7.recipe: cream together butter and sugar. add egg, flour, salt, cinnamon, vanilla, nutmeg, and milk. beat well and pour in unbaked pie shell. bake until done.

00650c46d5.title: black bean dip
00650c46d5.ingredients: 1 cup black beans soaked overnight 1/2 tsp hot pepper flakes 1 cup mayonnaise 1/2 cup oil 1 tsp salt 1/4 cup vinegar 1/3 cup juice onion powder to taste
00650c46d5.recipe: drain, rinse, and drain black beans. put all ingredients together and refrigerate. serve with crackers, chips, or chips.

00d291fc18.title: cappuccino frappuccino
00d291fc18.ingredients: 3/4 cup sugar 1 cup milk 1 cup cream 2 1/2 cups brewed coffee hot
00d291fc18.recipe: combine sugar, milk, cream and coffee. pour into tall glasses. top with whipped cream, fresh berries, strawberries, and chocolate. you can add chocolate syrup to taste. can also add other fruit or omit.

020df32943.title: chocolate cookie
020df32943.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour 3/4 c. butter pinch of salt 1/4 c. cocoa 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. baking_soda 1 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
020df32943.recipe: mix sugar, butter and egg until creamy. sift dry ingredients together add to sugar mixture. add vanilla, cinnamon, baking powder and extracts. drop by spoon on cookie sheet. bake at 350 for 8 to 10 minutes.

01f71db94a.title: asparagus, stuffed with cheese recipe
01f71db94a.ingredients: 1 lb asparagus 1 sm pepper 2 ounce cheese 1 tbsp. oil 1 tsp salt 1 x clove 1 x onion 1 x egg 1/2 tsp lemon juice 1 tbsp. parsley or possibly chives
01f71db94a.recipe: cut asparagus into 6 inch pcs, and cut cheese in small pcs. in skillet, saute/fry onion, garlic, salt and pepper till tender, but not browned. beat egg with lemon juice, and blend in warm onions. boil a pan of salted water, and blanch asparagus till tender. place asparagus in serving bowl and fill with the warm sauteed mix. sprinkle with parsley and serve. this is a delicious way to use asparagus, but if you don t have the time to make this dish, use the asparagus that is not blanched first. just thaw asparagus and serve with the remaining sauce. this makes 1 lb. of asparagus.

00707f2955.title: cheese baked potatoes
00707f2955.ingredients: 1 medium sized potato 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese 1/2 c. milk 1 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 c. cream 2 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. grated onion 1 slightly beaten egg
00707f2955.recipe: peel potato and quarter lengthwise. place in buttered baking dish. add pepper and cheese and blend. mix milk, butter, salt, cream and flour until smooth. pour over potato and bake for 30 minutes at 350. may be served over toast or mashed potatoes.

0148bc234c.title: grilled cheese rangoon
0148bc234c.ingredients: 1 to 2 rangoon pepper rangoon 4 to 6 slices cheese 1 egg 1 salt and pepper to taste 1 tbsp butter 1 tsp oil 1 plain flour
0148bc234c.recipe: chop the rangoon peppers into rings and slice the cheese in half. put some butter in a saucepan, and let it melt. add the rangoon peppers and saute on one side until golden brown. remove the peppers and place them on a plate. beat the egg in a shallow bowl, and season with salt and pepper. add the flour to the egg. dredge each piece of rangoon pepper ring in the beaten egg, then in the flour. heat a griddle or skillet, add a small amount of butter and the rangoon. cook the rangoon until golden brown on both sides. serve with tomato or celery soup or any fried vegetable.

024ad30520.title: santa fe egg
024ad30520.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, sliced 2 slices cheese, sliced 1 egg, beaten salt and pepper to taste
024ad30520.recipe: lightly brown the pepper slices on both sides in an oiled frying pan. add sliced cheese slices on top, then crack the egg on top, keeping the yolk moist and the white runny. season with salt and pepper.

00adfa0382.title: chicken diane
00adfa0382.ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon pepper 1 large chicken, cut in quarters 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon clove 1 teaspoon oil 1/4 cup butter 1/3 cup juice 1 tablespoon garlic, chopped
00adfa0382.recipe: sprinkle pepper over chicken pieces. in a bowl combine salt, garlic, garlic and oil. coat chicken pieces evenly. place in a baking dish. drizzle butter over chicken. pour juice over. cover and bake at 350 for 1 hour.

00a598ec99.title: chocolate cinnamon fudge
00a598ec99.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1 12 oz. bag hershey s chocolate chips 1/2 c. butter 1/2 tsp. extract 1 5 oz. can evaporated milk 1 tsp. cinnamon
00a598ec99.recipe: mix all ingredients except fudge. bring to boil. cook until soft ball stage 236. stir in cinnamon. pour into buttered 9 x 9 inch pan. cool and cut into squares.

017dac8453.title: kabayaki with sardine mushrooms
017dac8453.ingredients: 6 to 8 sardines mushroom 6 to 8 pepper rings 1 slice cheese 1 tbsp. oil 1/2 tomato 1 clove 1 1/2 tsp. salt 2 tbsp. juice 1/2 sliced onion
017dac8453.recipe: sliced sardine cut up tomato. brown all ingredients together. add a small amount of oil to fry. season to taste.

021e79d99d.title: corned beef biscuits recipe
021e79d99d.ingredients: 2 c. prepared corned beef mix 6 slices cheese, cut in strips 1 egg 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 pound corned beef, minced 1/4 c. finely minced onion 1/4 c. lowfat milk
021e79d99d.recipe: stir all ingredients together. spoon into greased muffin c.. bake at 375 degrees for 20 min. makes 16 c..

0192788e7c.title: nashville cafe mocha
0192788e7c.ingredients: 1 1/2 tbsp granulated sugar 1/2 cup milk 1/4 cup cream 6 oz instant coffee
0192788e7c.recipe: pour sugar into a cup and mix until the sugar has dissolved add milk and cream to the cup microwave at 500 watts until steaming and hot and then set to the side to cool for 5 mins pour coffee into the cup and add hot milk mixture garnish with vanilla ice cream

0152b94339.title: emerald martini
0152b94339.ingredients: 3 oz chilled orange flavored juice 2 ice cubes 1/2 oz vodka 1 slice of lime 1 pinch mint 1 orange
0152b94339.recipe: combine juice, ice and vodka in cocktail shaker filled with ice. shake and strain into martini glass. garnish with lime slice, mint and orange slice.

01846feff0.title: harold s scalloped potatoes
01846feff0.ingredients: 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 large potato 1 small onion, chopped fine 2 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 1/2 c. broth or use 1/2 c. water 1/2 medium carrot, grated 3 tbsp. flour 1/2 tsp. celery seed 1/2 c. milk 1 clove 1/2 c. cream 1/4 tsp. thyme 2 tbsp. minced parsley 1/2 c. stock
01846feff0.recipe: melt butter and blend in flour. add water a little at a time to make paste. cook until thickened. stir in vegetables, cream, thyme, salt, pepper and parsley. pour in 2 cups broth or water. bake, covered, at 350 for 1 hour.

025602d74a.title: fried cheese scotch eggs
025602d74a.ingredients: 6 scotch eggs 1/4 teaspoon pepper 3 ounces monterey jack cheese, cubed 1 egg 1/2 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons milk 2 tablespoons flour oil for frying 1/2 cup dry breadcrumbs
025602d74a.recipe: sprinkle eggs with salt and pepper. coat with flour, then dip in egg mixture and roll in bread crumbs. chill for 30 minutes. heat oil to 350. fry egg in hot oil until golden brown. serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

00efeff6ed.title: sugar cookies
00efeff6ed.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/3 c. milk 1 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 2 tbsp. oil 2 tbsp. butter 1 tbsp. cinnamon
00efeff6ed.recipe: mix dry ingredients. mix oil, egg, dry ingredients and milk. pour onto greased cookie sheet. dot with butter and add a little cinnamon. bake 10 minutes or until golden brown.

022c5a7a90.title: victorian roast chicken
022c5a7a90.ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon pepper 1 3 1/2 4 lb chicken, cut into serving pieces 2 tablespoons oil 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/8 teaspoon clove 1 teaspoon butter 2 cups juice 1 medium onion, cut into 8 wedges
022c5a7a90.recipe: wash chicken and pat dry. sprinkle with pepper. heat oil in large heavy skillet. brown chicken on all sides. add salt and clove, cover and simmer 20 minutes. in small saucepan, combine butter, juice, and onion. cover and simmer 30 minutes, basting occasionally.

000d5e4996.title: seared scallops
000d5e4996.ingredients: 1 to 2 scallops, preferably gray or sea 1 pepper 1 cheese, grated 2 tbsp oil 1 salt and pepper 2 tsp juice
000d5e4996.recipe: salt and pepper the scallops and let them sit for a while. remove the excess juice if there are any. heat some oil in a frying pan and fry the scallops. once they are cooked, place on plates. cut the pepper, cheese, salt, and juice. mix well and add to the scallops. serve. in australia a small amount is enough for five, depending on the size of the scallops.

01d9e8c573.title: osso bucco
01d9e8c573.ingredients: 1 12 lbs round steaks, about 1/2 inch thick 14 teaspoon pepper 1 onion, sliced 2 tablespoons oil 1 teaspoon salt 1 whole clove 1 tablespoon parsley, chopped 3 tablespoons juice 1 garlic clove
01d9e8c573.recipe: cut steak into serving size pieces, removing all excess fat. place meat in a heavy skillet, add seasonings and onion, cook for a few minutes, stirring constantly. combine juice with the garlic and pour over meat. cover, cook for 45 minutes or until meat is tender.

0214450cc9.title: moist chocolate cookies
0214450cc9.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 1/2 cup flour 1/2 cup butter, melted 1 tsp salt 1/4 cup cocoa 1/2 tsp extract 1 tsp vanilla 1/4 tsp baking_powder 1 tsp baking_soda
0214450cc9.recipe: preheat oven to 375f mix melted butter, sugar, egg, extracts, cocoa and baking powder add flour, salt and baking soda mix for 2 minutes with an electric hand mixer drop tablespoon size balls of cookie dough onto a greased cookie sheet bake for 13 15 minutes cool 2 minutes on pan before removing.

00268650f0.title: icebox cinnamon bread
00268650f0.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3 c. flour 4 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking_powder
00268650f0.recipe: mix all ingredients together. put into well greased loaf pan. bake at 350 for 40 to 50 minutes.

0215b9100c.title: old fashioned tea cakes
0215b9100c.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3 1/2 c. flour 1/4 c. butter or crisco 1 tsp. extract 1/4 c. milk 1/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 4 tsp. baking_powder
0215b9100c.recipe: beat together sugar and egg. sift flour and measure. add the dry ingredients to the sugar and egg. add the butter or crisco and the salt alternately with the milk. add the vanilla and the cinnamon. make into walnut size balls and then roll into sugar. bake at 375 for 10 minutes.

003642bf69.title: kremsa cheese balls
003642bf69.ingredients: 150 g kremsa pepper 50 g cheese 1 tablespoon butter or 1 tablespoon margarine 1 pinch salt 1 egg oil for frying 2 tablespoons flour
003642bf69.recipe: mix all ingredients except oil. if mixture is very crumbly and not firm enough to shape, add some of the flour. form small balls, place on a lightly floured paper. heat oil in a pan. dip in beaten egg. lower into hot oil and cook until golden brown. remove and drain on paper towels.

0120981e5a.title: roast pork with pepper sauce
0120981e5a.ingredients: 3 lbs pork shoulder roast 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1 tablespoon minced onion 1 tablespoon oil 1 teaspoon salt 1/8 teaspoon clove 1 clove garlic, minced 2 cups juice 2 tablespoons chopped parsley 1 teaspoon thyme
0120981e5a.recipe: heat oven to 400 f. place roast, fat side up, in a shallow roasting pan. roast about 45 minutes or until meat thermometer registers 140f, basting often with juice from roast. meanwhile, in small saucepan, saute onion in oil for 5 minutes or until tender. add all remaining ingredients. cook and stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil. reduce heat. pour sauce over roast. bake 10 minutes longer or until meat thermometer registers 140f.

013b262afd.title: muffins
013b262afd.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 2 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. baking_soda 1 1/2 tsp. oil 2 tbsp. melted butter 1 tsp. cinnamon
013b262afd.recipe: add sugar and eggs together and then add the rest of the dry ingredients. stir in milk. fill well greased or paper lined muffin pan 2/3 full. bake at 400 for 30 to 40 minutes. while still warm, spread the top with butter and sprinkle with cinnamon.

0102abf23a.title: armenian pepper soup
0102abf23a.ingredients: 1 lb whole pepper 1 cup onion 3 tablespoons oil 1 teaspoon salt 12 teaspoon clove 1 cup chopped tomato 2 cups broth 1 cup carrot, finely diced 12 teaspoon garlic powder 12 teaspoon cumin 12 teaspoon thyme 1 sprig parsley 1 stalk celery 2 tablespoons flour 1 tablespoon chili or 1 tablespoon chili sauce
0102abf23a.recipe: wash peppers and remove seeds. chop peppers fine. saute peppers and onions in oil for 5 minutes. add all remaining ingredients and simmer for 40 minutes. blend flour with 1/2 cup of cold water add to soup and simmer for 10 minutes.

00d544295b.title: chili con carne
00d544295b.ingredients: 12 jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped 1 onion, chopped 1 tomato, peeled and chopped 1 whole clove 2 tbsp. oil salt and pepper to taste 1/4 tsp. cumin 1 chili, seeded and chopped 1 carrot, diced 1 can beans, rinsed and drained 2 c. broth or water 1 stalk celery, diced 2 c. cooked, cubed beef or ham, chopped
00d544295b.recipe: in a pot, lightly saute the chopped pepper, onion, tomato, clove, salt, pepper, cumin and chili in the oil for 5 minutes. add the carrot, beans, broth or water, celery and beef. simmer for 30 minutes. add water, if needed, for desired consistency.

01e1d89174.title: egg pepper stuffed with feta cheese
01e1d89174.ingredients: 2 jalapeno pepper 1 cheese 1 fresh tomato 1 tbsp oil 1/3 medium onion 4 egg 1 dash salt and pepper 1 clove 1 dash garlic
01e1d89174.recipe: cut the jalapeno pepper in half and remove the seeds. chop the onion. finely chop the garlic. heat the oil and fry the onion. once browned, add the tomatoes and salt and pepper to taste. simmer until the tomato is cooked. add the garlic, pepper and jalapeno. cook for a while and stir until the peppers are soft. crack the egg into the peppers and stir. cook until the egg is cooked. when the egg is done, remove from the heat and mix with the cheese. serve hot.

0169eba77a.title: ice cream in a bottle
0169eba77a.ingredients: 1 gal. water 1/2 gal. milk 1/2 gal. ice cream 1 qt. ice
0169eba77a.recipe: mix water and milk in large container or punch bowl. add milk and ice cream. stir well. let set for 5 days or more. stir in water and ice cream. makes one gallon.

00ea81d52d.title: velveeta queso dip
00ea81d52d.ingredients: 375g velveeta process cheese product, cut into 1/2 inch cubes 1 onion, finely chopped 1/4 cup kraft mayo real mayonnaise 1 small tomato, seeded, chopped king sooper s 1 lb for 0.99 thru 02/09 1/4 tsp. each salt and black pepper 1 small lettuce, shredded
00ea81d52d.recipe: microwave velveeta and onion in medium microwaveable bowl on high 2 min., stirring after 1 min. stir in remaining ingredients. serve in tortilla chips or as a dip with shredded lettuce.

012a59ba71.title: chicken meatballs
012a59ba71.ingredients: 1 tablespoon pepper 1 cup cheese brie, grated 1 egg, beaten 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 onion, finely chopped 1 cup chicken, cubed 2 garlic cloves, minced 4 tablespoons oil 1 cup breadcrumbs 1 clove, crushed 2 tablespoons parsley, finely chopped
012a59ba71.recipe: mix all ingredients with the exception of the oil and breadcrumbs. shape into 1 inch balls. dip in the oil, and fry in a non stick pan on medium heat until lightly browned. drain on paper towels. add the bread crumbs to the sauce and mix well. add the garlic, salt and parsley. let simmer and mix well until the sauce becomes thin and the bread crumbs become opague.

00047059be.title: scalloped potatoes recipe
00047059be.ingredients: pepper, salt and pepper 1 c. sliced onion 4 tbsp. butter 2 c. broth 1 carrot, sliced 1 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon clove 1/4 c. flour 1 1/2 c. stock 1 c. cream 1/2 teaspoon thyme 1/2 teaspoon parsley 2 c. celery, sliced 1 c. lowfat milk
00047059be.recipe: cook onion in butter till soft add in flour, salt, pepper, stock and blend well. cook over low heat till thickened and smooth. place sliced carrot in bottom of greased 1 1/2 qt casserole dish. pour sauce over carrots. mash potato and add in to casserole, then add in cream and lowfat milk. cover and bake 1 1/2 hrs in 350 degree oven, stirring 2 or possibly 3 times. makes 6 servings.

016328ffaa.title: braised lamb shanks recipe
016328ffaa.ingredients: 1 1/2 lb lamb shanks or possibly leg shanks 1 sm. 1 sm. pepper 1 sm. onion 2 tbsp. veg. oil salt to taste 1/4 teaspoon clove 1/4 teaspoon garlic pwdr 1 c. juice or possibly more lime juice
016328ffaa.recipe: place thighs in shallow pan. cut peppers in half and place on thighs. stud with onion. rub meat with oil and dredge in flour. brown in oil. reduce heat and add in remaining ingredients. cover and simmer 3 to 4 hrs or possibly till tender. add in more lemon juice as needed.

014f20cc8c.title: esquites
014f20cc8c.ingredients: pepper and pepper juice onion oil salt clove garlic broth
014f20cc8c.recipe: use green chili pepper or chili flakes. boil pepper and onion until tender. use oil to fry in frying pan. add salt, cloves, garlic and broth. cook until tender.

0073191039.title: stuffed peppers
0073191039.ingredients: 1 dozen idaho pepper 2 tablespoons grated cheese 1 egg, beaten 1 pinch salt 3 tablespoons butter 1 tablespoon oil 1 cup flour
0073191039.recipe: preheat oven to 350 degrees. make a pocket in peppers with a sharp knife and stuff with grated cheese. beat together egg, salt, butter, oil and flour and fill peppers with mixture. bake for 20 minutes.

001ee1021c.title: potato cakes
001ee1021c.ingredients: 1 lb velveeta, diced pepper 1 lb potato, peeled and grated 1/2 cup onion, chopped 1 egg 1/2 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons butter, melted 1/2 cup celery, chopped 2 tablespoons flour 1 tablespoon oil 1/4 cup parsley, chopped
001ee1021c.recipe: combine all ingredients together except oil and parsley. pour oil into skillet and heat. form mixture into 6 oval cakes, approximately 1 inch thick. saute cakes in hot oil until golden brown, turning once. place on paper towel lined plate to drain excess fat. reheat. garnish with parsley.

01f603e284.title: cinnamon pudding
01f603e284.ingredients: 1/3 c. sugar 1 egg 1 tbsp. butter, melted 3 tbsp. flour 1/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 2 c. milk
01f603e284.recipe: blend sugar, egg and butter. add dry ingredients alternately with milk, mixing thoroughly. bake in greased, 8 inch square pan at 350 for 30 minutes.

0087d4702e.title: buckwheat coffee cake
0087d4702e.ingredients: 1 cup sugar, divided 1 egg, beaten 2 tbsp. butter, softened 1 cup flour 1/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 cup milk 1 tbsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. extract whipped cream
0087d4702e.recipe: preheat oven to 350f. mix 1/2 cup sugar, egg and butter set aside. add flour, cinnamon and salt to the sugar mixture stir. add milk, baking powder and extract. mix well. pour into a greased 9 inch square baking dish. bake for 35 to 40 minutes. top with cream and sprinkle with remaining sugar.

0236be6469.title: ice cream for coffee or tofu recipe
0236be6469.ingredients: 1/4 c. sugar 1 can eagle brand lowfat milk 1/2 pt. ice cream coffee
0236be6469.recipe: mix lowfat milk, cream and sugar in electric mixer. stir in coffee till dissolved. freeze in an ice cream freezer.

02020f41c0.title: mom s potato pancakes
02020f41c0.ingredients: 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 large egg 1/3 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder 1 tbsp. oil 1 tbsp. butter
02020f41c0.recipe: beat egg. add milk, baking powder and pepper. mix well. add flour and mix.

023a1cc677.title: zataran kheer kubeh
023a1cc677.ingredients: 1 lb. pepper 1 medium onion 1 tbsp. oil 1 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. clove 1 tomato 1 1/2 c. juice 1 tbsp. minced parsley 1 tsp. vinegar 1/2 tsp. cumin
023a1cc677.recipe: mince pepper. fry pepper and onion in oil. add salt and clove. add tomato. cook until tender. add juice. add cumin. cook until tomatoes are cooked. add parsley.

00c5bd1784.title: best ever old timey sugar cookies
00c5bd1784.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 c. butter or margarine 3 1/2 c. flour 1 1/2 tsp. extract 1 tbsp. milk 1 tbsp. baking_powder
00c5bd1784.recipe: mix sugar and egg together. mix butter, flour, extract, baking powder and milk together. add dry ingredients. roll out and cut with cutter. bake at 375 for 8 to 10 minutes.

01db494b7f.title: honey mustard seed pickles recipe
01db494b7f.ingredients: 6 c. sugar 1 c. honey 1 tbsp. salt 3 c. vinegar 1 c. mustard seeds 4 x cinnamon sticks
01db494b7f.recipe: combine sugar, honey, salt and vinegar in a large pot. add in mustard seeds and cinnamon sticks. bring to a boil and cook till it turns a light pinkish brown. pour into clean, hot jars and process in a water bath for 5 min.

00deb97e2b.title: doughnuts
00deb97e2b.ingredients: 1/4 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 1/4 c. butter 1/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. salt 3/4 c. milk 1/2 tsp. extract 1/2 tsp. vanilla 4 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. nutmeg
00deb97e2b.recipe: mix sugar and egg. add melted butter and stir in milk. add the dry ingredients. drop teaspoon full into deep fat 350 and fry until browned.

02589745fe.title: roasted ham in honey sauce
02589745fe.ingredients: 1 lb smoked bone in ham, fresh 3 tablespoons sugar 1 tablespoon honey salt pepper oil, as needed butter clove onion, slices to taste
02589745fe.recipe: place ham in baking pan, drizzle with butter and sprinkle with cloves. bake for at least 1 1/2 hours at 350f, basting every 15 minutes to get even browning. in a sauce pan, cook sugar, honey, salt, pepper and onion in about 2 inches of water until mixture has reached a boil. remove from heat and pour over ham. broil ham until brown. makes enough to stuff a turkey. serve on top of your favorite rice.

01ed1d63b8.title: pepper and cheese salad
01ed1d63b8.ingredients: 2 to 3 pieces hot pepper, cut into 4 pieces 4 to 5 slices cheese 1 tomato 2 tbsp. oil 2 slices onion, sliced 2 c. lettuce, chopped 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 c. vinegar 1/2 c. juice
01ed1d63b8.recipe: prepare the salad. pour 1/2 cup of dressing over cheese, tomatoes, peppers and onion. mix well. add the remaining salad dressing and pour over all. chill and serve.

01b32004fb.title: peppered cheese halibut
01b32004fb.ingredients: 2 lbs halibut steaks 1 teaspoon pepper 2 1/2 ounces cheese, cubed 1 egg, slightly beaten salt and pepper breadcrumbs oil for frying 1 small onion, finely sliced 2 cups milk 1 pinch paprika 1 pinch clove 1 tablespoon flour
01b32004fb.recipe: sprinkle the pepper, cubed cheese and egg with salt and pepper. roll each steak in the flour. dip into the egg. roll in the bread crumbs. fry in oil until browned. remove to a plate. reduce the heat and saute the onion until soft. add the milk, paprika, cloves and a pinch of pepper. bring to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. remove from the heat and add the cheese. season. add the fish to the sauce and simmer, uncovered, until tender.

01483cc0de.title: alaskan clam chowder
01483cc0de.ingredients: 3 cans chopped clams and juice 12 teaspoon pepper 12 cup cheese 1 medium onion, grated 1 potato, grated butter salt garlic powder 1 clove parsley, chopped 1 cup broth 3 tablespoons oil 1 cup milk 1 lb mushroom, sliced 12 cup cream 1 teaspoon thyme 4 tablespoons flour
01483cc0de.recipe: fry onion in oil until brown. stir in flour and then broth. bring to a boil and simmer until thickened. add potatoes, broth, thyme, garlic powder, salt and pepper. simmer 5 10 minutes. add flour sauce, mushrooms, clams and parsley. simmer 5 10 minutes longer or until potatoes are cooked. top with cheese and serve. i have also served with sliced black olives.

012ba2195e.title: flank steak
012ba2195e.ingredients: 6 6 ounce beef flank steaks pepper 1 onion, chopped 1/4 cup oil salt 1 clove garlic powder paprika dried thyme parsley
012ba2195e.recipe: saute onions until golden. season steaks with salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, thyme, and parsley. add onions to a large skillet. simmer 4 5 hours. slice steaks and serve.

01dac09429.title: beef swiss style
01dac09429.ingredients: 1 pkg. pepper steaks, cut 1/4 inch thick 1 c. chopped onion 2 tbsp. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 1 large clove 2 tbsp. tomato 2 c. broth 1 carrot, sliced 1 garlic clove, minced 1/4 c. chopped celery 3 tbsp. flour 1 tsp. thyme 1/4 c. parsley 1 bay_leaves 1/4 tsp. cumin 3 to 4 c. stock
01dac09429.recipe: brown pepper steaks in hot oil. drain on paper towel. add onion and saute until tender. add salt, clove, tomato and chicken stock. cover and simmer about 20 minutes.

00c86c8385.title: pepper steak
00c86c8385.ingredients: 2 1/2 inch pepper steaks 1 large onion, sliced 3 tbsp. oil 1/2 c. soy_sauce clove salt 1 piece ginger 2 cloves garlic 1 medium carrot butter broth
00c86c8385.recipe: slice steak and brown on both sides in oil. make sauce by mixing soy, clove, salt, ginger, garlic, salt and pepper pour over steak. in another pan, cook carrot in 2 tablespoons of oil, about 5 minutes. put in meat and cook until medium done. if desired add some butter. put steak in pan with carrots and simmer, basting with sauce, until ready to serve.

001ac13db4.title: baked brie with jam
001ac13db4.ingredients: 1 can pie filling 2 tbsp. sugar 1 round brie cheese 1 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. cinnamon jam or juice ice cream
001ac13db4.recipe: melt butter in small pan. mix and brown in pan. remove from heat. add to brie. sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. cook until bubbles form around edges. add 1 tablespoon juice or 1 tablespoon milk. top with ice cream. place in oven and heat just until hot.

0155631124.title: chicken cacciatore
0155631124.ingredients: 1 teaspoon pepper chicken 2 tablespoons oil 1 tablespoon salt 1 dash clove 1 garlic clove, minced 1 cup juice 1/2 cup onion, sliced 1/4 cup butter 1 dash paprika
0155631124.recipe: preheat oven to 375. trim fat off chicken. rub with oil. rub with paprika and salt. place onion and garlic on each side of chicken. cover with lime juice. pour melted butter on top. bake for 2 1/2 hours, basting every 15 minutes. remove from oven and sprinkle with pepper and paprika.

02756e915b.title: vegetable curry
02756e915b.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, minced 1 onion, minced 4 tablespoons oil salt 1 clove 1 tomato, chopped 1 teaspoon chili, minced 12 teaspoon cumin 1 teaspoon ginger, minced 1 teaspoon garlic, minced 1 carrot, chopped 1 12 cups cooked yellow beans 1 dash turmeric 1 dash coriander 12 cup cilantro
02756e915b.recipe: in a pan on medium high heat, fry the jalapeno pepper and onion for 5 minutes. add garlic, ginger, chili, turmeric and salt. after 3 minutes, add the carrot and cook 1 minute. add the tomato and beans and cook for 3 more minutes. add the cilantro and let it simmer for 3 more minutes. serve with rotis and rice or naan.

006070c2a7.title: cheese soup
006070c2a7.ingredients: 2 cups cubed cheese 1/8 teaspoon pepper 3/4 cup diced onion 1 lb potato, peeled and diced 1 lb diced celery 1 lb diced turnip 1 1/2 cups butter or 1 1/2 cups margarine 1 teaspoon salt 1 quart milk broth 1 cup diced celery 1/2 cup flour 1/2 cup diced carrot 3/4 cup cream clove 1 dash parsley 1 lb mushroom
006070c2a7.recipe: melt butter in a large saucepan, then blend in flour. add onion, potatoes, carrots, garlic and potatoes. saute 2 3 minutes. add broth, milk, salt, pepper and mushroom. cover and bring to boil. when soup comes to boil, cover and let simmer 25 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. stir occasionally. mix in cheese. cook over low heat until cheese is melted. may be used to top mashed potatoes.

01e2f7f12f.title: emu s mayonnaise dressing
01e2f7f12f.ingredients: 3 tbsp. seasoned pepper or to taste 3 tbsp. mayonnaise 1/2 c. oil 1 tsp. salt 1/4 c. vinegar 1/4 c. juice
01e2f7f12f.recipe: mix well. may be stored in the refrigerator for several days. keep in refrigerator. serve with salads or over fresh vegetables or grilled poultry.

00e59921e0.title: beef and onions
00e59921e0.ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. bottom round steak 1 small pepper, sliced thinly 1 large onion 1 tsp. oil 1/2 c. soy_sauce 1 clove salt to taste 1 tsp. ginger 1 tsp. garlic 1 tbsp. cornstarch 1 carrot, sliced thinly
00e59921e0.recipe: brown the meat in oil in skillet. take meat out and drain on paper towels. in the skillet, brown the onion. add meat back to skillet and add the soysauce. add the cloves, salt, ginger, garlic and carrot. let simmer until meat is tender, about 45 minutes to 1 hour.

000a3d10fb.title: poblano chili
000a3d10fb.ingredients: 1 poblano pepper 1 small onion 1 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1 pinch clove 1 small tomato broth 1/4 carrot 1 garlic clove 1/4 tsp. cumin
000a3d10fb.recipe: cook peppers and onion in hot oil over low heat. add tomato, carrot, clove, salt, cumin and garlic. cook for 3 minutes and add 2 cups broth. simmer until carrots are tender.

01dd34166e.title: cinnamon sauce for ice cream
01dd34166e.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1/2 c. milk 1/2 c. cream 1/4 c. butter 1 tsp. extract 1 egg 1 tsp. cinnamon
01dd34166e.recipe: combine all ingredients in saucepan. cook over medium heat to dissolve sugar. remove from heat. add beaten egg and beat in. cool and serve with ice cream.

0239b93e62.title: cafas mexican jerk sauce
0239b93e62.ingredients: 1 poblano pepper 1 onion 2 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. clove 1 c. tomato, chopped 1 tbsp. vinegar 2 tbsp. juice 2 tbsp. minced parsley 2 tbsp. minced cilantro garlic salt
0239b93e62.recipe: sweat poblano pepper in oil. remove from pan and add chopped onion. saute onion and pepper until wilted. add remaining ingredients, except water. bring to a boil. reduce heat. simmer for 5 minutes. add water as needed. sauce will thicken a bit.

00e5bcd63b.title: sammie s fish
00e5bcd63b.ingredients: 500 g fish fillets 1/2 teaspoon pepper 6 ounces cheese, grated 2 tablespoons butter 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 egg oil, for frying flour, for dredging
00e5bcd63b.recipe: heat oil in a pan. add fish and fry over medium heat for about 3 minutes. remove fish and set aside. in a bowl, mix butter, cheese, salt and pepper. add egg and mix until combined. roll fish with flour and fry in oil in the pan for a few minutes. if the mixture doesn t cover the fish, add more flour until it does and form a paste. return fish to the pan, cover, and cook for 2 3 minutes. spoon fried fish in sauce, serve on side.

01076f3b02.title: beef or pork roast with a crisp crust
01076f3b02.ingredients: 1 3 lb. boneless eye round steak 1/2 tsp. pepper 1 c. chopped onion 2 tsp. salt 1 c. sliced carrot 2 tbsp. butter or margarine broth from roast or bouillon cubes 1 c. celery slices 2 tbsp. flour 1 whole clove 1 sprig parsley, chopped 1/4 tsp. thyme or rosemary
01076f3b02.recipe: heat oven to 425. trim fat from meat. cut meat into serving size pieces. put meat and vegetables in a dutch oven, spooning off any liquid that accumulates on top. cover with broth and bake at 425 for 15 minutes. remove roast and vegetables and keep warm. pour broth and vegetables into saucepan.

012dcf0176.title: grandma s m m cookies
012dcf0176.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3/4 c. butter 1 1/2 c. flour 1 tsp. extract 1 6 oz. pkg. m m s plain chocolate chips dash of salt 1 4 oz. pkg. baker s german s sweet chocolate
012dcf0176.recipe: cream sugar and butter until light and fluffy. add egg. beat well. add flour, m m s chips, salt and extract. stir well. drop mixture by teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet. bake at 350 for 8 to 10 minutes. remove from oven and frost with chocolate frosting. let set 10 minutes before serving.

0241719406.title: grannie s cobbler
0241719406.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 3/4 c. flour 1/4 c. butter 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. milk 1/4 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1/4 tsp. extract 1/2 tsp. vanilla
0241719406.recipe: preheat oven to 350. pour batter in 2 quart baking dish. sprinkle with topping.

0142b5497f.title: cherry cake
0142b5497f.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg 1 1/4 c. flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 c. softened butter or margarine 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking_powder
0142b5497f.recipe: in large bowl, beat egg, sugar and butter. mix well and add dry ingredients, mixing well. spread in well greased 10 inch tube pan. mix one can of cherry pie filling and 1 cup of hot water together. pour over crust and bake 40 to 45 minutes at 350.

01a1dc0605.title: tandoori steaks
01a1dc0605.ingredients: 2 lbs steaks 1 teaspoon pepper 1/2 cup cheese 1 egg 1 tablespoon salt 1 cup breadcrumbs oil 1 small onion 2 tablespoons milk
01a1dc0605.recipe: mix the egg, salt and pepper. coat steak with mixture. dip in bread crumbs. heat oil. add steaks and brown on both sides. cook onions in frying pan until soft but not brown. add onions to steaks. add cheese and milk. cook about 10 to 15 minutes. serve with french fries.

008b39d845.title: smothered swiss steak
008b39d845.ingredients: 2 beef round steaks, 1 inch thick 1 large pepper, chopped 1 large onion, sliced 3 tbsp. oil salt and pepper pinch of clove 1 can tomato paste 1 c. broth 1 large carrot, diced 2 cloves garlic, sliced thin 1/2 tsp. cumin seed 2 to 3 ribs celery, sliced thin 2 tbsp. flour pinch of thyme 2 tbsp. parsley, chopped
008b39d845.recipe: slice steak across grain into 1/2 inch strips. heat oil in skillet and cook strips in oil until brown on both sides. remove from skillet. add chopped onion and garlic, then carrot and celery until tender. stir in the tomato paste and cook until onion is transparent, but not brown. stir in flour, salt, pepper, cumin seed, cloves and parsley until incorporated. add broth and stir. add beef strips and stir well. bring to a boil, then reduce heat to simmer. cover and cook for 30 minutes or until meat is tender. serve over rice.

00a189db80.title: asparagus, spinach and cheese frittata
00a189db80.ingredients: 1 bunch asparagus 1/2 cheese, mozzarella or 1 tbsp. parmesan cheese 1 large egg 1 tbsp. oil 3 oz. spinach, chopped and cooked in salted water, squeezed 1/3 c. cream salt and pepper to taste
00a189db80.recipe: make asparagus asparagus soup and set aside. preheat oven to 350. place beaten egg in a small dish. add spinach, cheese, cream and oil. place in oven for 15 to 20 minutes.

00f4df3e5d.title: greek kfc cheese dumplings
00f4df3e5d.ingredients: 1 1/2 cups prepared dough from scratch kfc 2/3 cups fried shishito pepper or dried chiles, chopped 1 cup grated american cheese or any other kind of cheese 1/2 teaspoons salt 2 tablespoons oil 1 tablespoon butter 1 pinch clove 1 cup chopped onion 1 whole egg 4 tablespoons juice 1/2 cups flour
00f4df3e5d.recipe: cut up the shishito pepper i used dried. add salt and cheese. mix well. sift in flour and mix well. roll out on floured surface until about 1/4 inch thick. cut in small squares and add the salt to taste, a little oil, butter, shishito pepper and onions to the dough. roll up into long roll and cut off any excess. drop into the boiling soup, soup or stew and let cook for 20 minutes. stir occasionally to prevent sticking and sticking together. serve with hot, steamed rice.

00bfd797d6.title: pepper cheese appetizer
00bfd797d6.ingredients: 1 pepper 5 to 6 slices pizza cheese 1 tomato 1 medium onion 1 mayonnaise 1 salt and pepper 1/2 tsp oil 1/4 tsp grated garlic 1 clove 1 tbsp chopped parsley 2 to 3 tbsp fish sauce 2 to 3 tbsp juice from the tomato 2 tbsp cream
