00bfd797d6.recipe: finely chop the onion, tomato and pepper. mix the tomato with the pepper, onion, and salt, pepper and mayonnaise and set aside to cool. mix all the ingredients for the sauce, bring them to a boil in a small saucepan, then turn off the heat. put the sauce mixture in a strainer over a bowl. strain over the bowl from step 1 and mix well. cover with plastic wrap and let stand in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours to allow the flavors to marry. heat the oil in a frying pan on high heat. drain the pepper from step 2 well. put the pepper on a flat surface. cut a slit in the top of the pepper to let the steam escape, and carefully slip it out of the bowl. put the pepper upside down on a cooling rack, and let sit. put the tomato and onion into a bowl, sprinkle with parsley, and lightly mix. divide the mayonnaise into 4 portions, and form each portion into a ball. coat the cheese, tomato and onion balls in the sauce, and roll them up tightly from the edge to the center. put the cheese balls on a tray, and add the sauce from step 5. bake in an oven for 10 minutes in a preheated 200c oven, then it s done. the sauce is also good on the tomato.

019a97b553.title: bbq chicken sandwich
019a97b553.ingredients: 4 slice processed cheese 1 lettuce 1 mayonnaise 3 medium tomato 1/4 tsp onion powder 2 slice bread 1 salt and pepper 4 slice chicken 1 can bbq sauce
019a97b553.recipe: chop the lettuce, onion, tomatoes, chicken. shred the cheese. if using chicken breasts, remove any fat. then shred the cheese. toast your bread. next prepare the tomato sauce. take one slice of bread and make a circle by spreading mayonnaise on one side, then forming a circle. make two holes in the bread, then add chicken, then cheese, then the other slice of bread. lastly top it with the top slice of bread. enjoy

01e7fb26c4.title: tomato and olive salad iv
01e7fb26c4.ingredients: 1 pepper 1 slice cheese 1 tomato 1 onion 1 lettuce 2 tbsp oil 1 tbsp olive oil 1 dash salt and pepper 1 pinch clove
01e7fb26c4.recipe: cut the tomato, onion, lettuce into strips and the cheese into strips. cut the pepper and cheese into thin strips. season with salt and pepper. in a bowl, add the chopped ingredients from step 1 and mix well. mix the dressing from step 2 ingredients together. when you eat, cover with lettuce leaves.

0016c315f5.title: white chocolate icing
0016c315f5.ingredients: 3 1/2 cups sugar 1 package white baking chips 1 stick butter 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1 1/2 cup milk
0016c315f5.recipe: bring sugar, baking chips, butter and cinnamon to a rolling boil over medium heat. cook until thick, stirring constantly. cool slightly and stir in extract. pour over hot cake and spread while warm.

01230b9a65.title: cheese waffles
01230b9a65.ingredients: cheese, grated 1 egg 1/2 tsp. salt 2 c. milk 1/4 c. oil 1 c. flour
01230b9a65.recipe: beat egg with fork. add all other ingredients, stirring to smooth batter. pour into skillet and bake.

026ce072e5.title: aabg pepper rice
026ce072e5.ingredients: 1 rice naan 1 poblano pepper cut in chunks 1/2 small onion chopped 1 tbsp oil 1 tsp salt 1 clove 1 small tomato diced 1/2 tsp ginger 1/2 tsp garlic paste 1/2 chili 1 1/2 tsp turmeric 1/2 cup cilantro /dried 2 tsp soy_sauce 1 tsp cumin seeds
026ce072e5.recipe: saute the tumeric, onion, ginger, and ginger until the onion gets slightly soft add the chicken chunks, tomato and salt saute for 5 minutes, then add soy sauce, cumin seeds, turmeric and mix well add the cilantro /dried cilantro then mix well remove from heat and serve hot with rice

012c3b4b1b.title: snickerdoodle cupcakes
012c3b4b1b.ingredients: 3/4 cups sugar 1 whole egg 1 cup flour 1/4 cups butter 1/2 teaspoons baking_powder 1/4 teaspoons salt 3 tablespoons milk 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 1 pinch cinnamon, optional
012c3b4b1b.recipe: preheat oven to 350 degrees. line 12 muffin tins with paper liners. in a bowl, mix together the sugar, egg, flour, and butter. stir in baking powder, salt, and the milk. add vanilla and extract. fill each muffin cup 1/2 full with batter. sprinkle a pinch of cinnamon onto each cupcake. bake for 20 25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

0078549fb4.title: ham, cheese and tomato salad
0078549fb4.ingredients: 1/2 small pepper 1 c. cheese, cut up 1/4 c. oil 1/2 tsp. salt 1 clove 1/2 c. tomato, cut up 3 tbsp. juice 3 c. cooked ham, diced 2 tbsp. chopped onion
0078549fb4.recipe: blend pepper, cheese, oil, salt and cloves. add tomato, juice, ham and onion. chill.

003e8990ab.title: lime cooler
003e8990ab.ingredients: 3/4 cup sugar 1 can 750 ml 6oz limeade concentrate, divided 1/3 cup juice 1 cup ice 1 tbsp grated orange
003e8990ab.recipe: mix sugar and 3/4 cup limeade in small saucepan. bring to boil on medium heat, stirring constantly. reduce heat to low simmer 10 min., stirring frequently. cool. meanwhile, blend 1 cup limeade mixture, ice, orange and remaining limeade mixture in blender until smooth. pour into 6 cocktail glasses. serve immediately.

00fa4313e9.title: chicken french
00fa4313e9.ingredients: 1 chicken 6 to 7 lb. pepper to taste 1 medium onion, chopped salt to taste 1 clove 1/4 c. oil 2 cloves garlic 1 pt. broth 1 carrot, chopped 1/4 c. flour 1/4 tsp. thyme 1/4 c. parsley, chopped 1/2 tsp. celery seed 4 tbsp. butter paprika to taste
00fa4313e9.recipe: stew chicken with chopped onion, garlic, salt, pepper, cloves and carrot until tender. remove chicken from broth. reserve 1/2 cup broth. strain broth through a colander. return broth to pan. blend in flour. cook 3 to 4 minutes. add 1 1/4 cups broth. add seasoning. cook for 10 minutes. add butter and paprika to taste. pour over chicken.

0253fd0a13.title: ostrich steaks
0253fd0a13.ingredients: 3 lb. round steak pepper 1 sliced onion 1/4 c. oil salt dash of clove 2 cloves garlic 1 c. juice parsley pinch of thyme
0253fd0a13.recipe: cut steak into serving portions. salt and pepper both sides. brown on both sides in frying pan. add 2 tablespoons oil. cover and cook over low heat for 45 minutes. add onion slices, minced garlic, cloves, parsley and thyme. simmer 15 minutes. add remaining oil. add juice and cook 5 minutes longer. serve with rice.

0136c0143c.title: cocoa cookies
0136c0143c.ingredients: 1 cup 225 ml sugar 1 egg 2 cups 475 ml flour 1 1/2 sticks butter 1/4 tsp 1 ml salt 1/2 cup 125 ml cocoa 1/2 tsp 2 ml. extract 2 tsp 10 ml. vanilla 1/4 tsp 1 ml. baking_soda 1/4 tsp 1 ml. baking_powder 1 tsp 5 ml. cinnamon
0136c0143c.recipe: combine sugar, butter, egg, cocoa and vanilla. sift flour, salt, baking powder and cinnamon together. add to mixture. chill. roll out on floured board and cut out cookies. bake at 325 degrees 175 c. until light brown.

005698a34d.title: apple dumplings
005698a34d.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 2 c. flour 2 tbsp. butter pinch of salt 1 c. milk 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 2 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. extract 1/2 tsp. vanilla
005698a34d.recipe: cream sugar and butter. beat eggs and add to mixture. sift dry ingredients together and add alternately with milk. add flavorings. drop into boiling water. cover and simmer 1 hour. when cool, roll in powdered sugar.

01398a1d77.title: pumpkin dessert bread
01398a1d77.ingredients: 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 1/2 c. flour 2 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. cinnamon dash of salt 1 c. evaporated milk 1 tsp. extract 1/2 tsp. vanilla 2 tsp. baking_powder 1/2 tsp. nutmeg
01398a1d77.recipe: mix all ingredients thoroughly and put in a greased and floured loaf pan. bake at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes. serve with cool whip or whipped cream.

01b5ff5dcc.title: pepper steak
01b5ff5dcc.ingredients: 1 lb. top round or flank steak pepper onion oil 2 tbsp. soy_sauce clove salt 1 tsp. ginger 1/2 tsp. garlic cornstarch
01b5ff5dcc.recipe: cut steak into thin strips. brown steak in oil on stove. add chopped onion and garlic. add soy sauce. add clove. add salt and ginger. continue to cook on top of stove. when tender, thicken with cornstarch.

00e6c78406.title: nana s corn scallop
00e6c78406.ingredients: 1 large halibut fillet 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 large potato, sliced 1/2 tsp. salt 1 clove 2 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. thyme 1/2 c. onion, chopped 3 tbsp. flour
00e6c78406.recipe: place fish in pan sprinkle with pepper. arrange potato slices on fish. sprinkle with salt, garlic, butter, thyme and onion. cover tightly with foil. bake in a 350 oven for about 45 minutes or until fish flakes with fork.

00e554c740.title: cinnamon rolls
00e554c740.ingredients: 1/2 cup sugar 1 egg 4 tbsp melted butter 1 tsp salt 2 packages dry yeast 2 tbsp cinnamon
00e554c740.recipe: combine in a large mixing bowl all ingredients, except cinnamon and beat together on medium speed until smooth. add the cinnamon and continue to beat until the mixture forms a dough, adding additional sugar if necessary. cover the dough and let it rise until doubled in size, about 1 hour. preheat oven to 350. make your dough into a ball and form into a roll. place into a greased 9 x 13 baking pan and bake for 15 20 minutes.

01df3fb966.title: cheese calamari fritters
01df3fb966.ingredients: 1 lb. fish fillets, cut in strips 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese 1 egg, beaten 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. soft breadcrumbs oil for deep frying 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. milk
01df3fb966.recipe: combine first 6 ingredients. shape into 12 patties. brown in oil on each side. reduce heat. cover with onion and milk. simmer 10 minutes. makes 12 appetizers.

01c2c55b0f.title: pasta acapulco
01c2c55b0f.ingredients: 1 lb pepper steak cheese, grated 12 lb tomato, drained 1 tablespoon oil 12 cup onion, chopped 14 lb pasta, of choice 12 clove 1 teaspoon basil 12 teaspoon salt 12 teaspoon oregano 12 lb olive 12 lb juice 12 cup parsley, chopped 12 cup cilantro, chopped
01c2c55b0f.recipe: cut the meat into 1 inch strips and fry it in the oil with onion until lightly browned. add the tomato and stir fry until it breaks down. add the herbs. when it is almost finished cooking, add the olives and tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes. add salt and simmer until it is almost done. cook the pasta according to the directions. add the tomato juice, parsley and cilantro. mix it well. serve it with grated cheese.

0251f3bc5d.title: oatmeal fudge
0251f3bc5d.ingredients: 3 c. sugar 1 12 oz. bag chocolate chips 1 tbsp. butter 2 1/2 c. quick oats 1 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1/2 tsp. salt 2/3 c. milk
0251f3bc5d.recipe: boil sugar, butter and chocolate chips for 1 minute. then add remaining ingredients. add milk last. pour in square pan. cool and cut into squares.

01a19ce187.title: mayo and mustard sandwiches
01a19ce187.recipe: spread mayonnaise on bread sprinkle mustard over mayonnaise put lettuce on the cheese toast. you can cut the bread with a pizza cutter or use a knife to create the sandwich as a sandwich.

01ec402dad.title: beef and pepper soup
01ec402dad.ingredients: 2 to 3 lb. chuck roast 3 tsp. pepper 1 large onion, diced 3 tbsp. oil 1 tsp. salt dash of clove 2 cloves garlic, minced 2 c. broth 1/2 tsp. thyme chopped parsley
01ec402dad.recipe: slice roast against grain into 1 1/2 inch strips. brown in oil. add rest of ingredients. cover and simmer 20 to 25 minutes. serves 6.

01eeba4af9.title: cheese pie
01eeba4af9.ingredients: 1 10 inch pie crusts dash of pepper 1 1/2 c. shredded sharp cheese 1 egg 1 tsp. salt 1 tbsp. butter 1 tbsp. oil 1 tbsp. flour 1/2 c. chopped onion 1 1/2 c. milk
01eeba4af9.recipe: preheat oven to 350. roll out pie crust. blend all ingredients except milk and pour into crust. bake at 350 for 40 minutes or until knife comes out clean. let set for 15 minutes before serving.

016916aca6.title: deerfleischschnitzel with pepper steaks
016916aca6.ingredients: 1 lb steak, cut in large chunks pepper steak 1 potato, peeled, diced 1 teaspoon salt 1 tablespoon oil 12 cup onion, diced 2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons oil 1 clove, minced 1 tablespoon flour 1 teaspoon paprika 12 teaspoon dried thyme 1 tablespoon parsley, chopped
016916aca6.recipe: salt and pepper steaks. heat oil in fry pan and brown steaks on both sides. add potato and onions. reduce heat to medium low and cook until potatoes are cooked through. meanwhile, make sauce. melt butter in pan and add onion and clove. saute for 3 minutes. add flour, paprika and thyme. whisk till smooth. stir into steak mixture. cook 1 minute, stir. meanwhile, reheat skillet and heat 1 tbsp butter. add 2 tbsp flour and fry for 2 minutes. stir into steak mixture. serve immediately with potatoes.

0234e40eac.title: fried cheese sticks
0234e40eac.ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. monterey jack cheese, cut in strips 1 egg 3 c. flour salt 1 c. milk 1/2 c. oil 1/4 c. butter or margarine
0234e40eac.recipe: mix cheese with egg. add flour and salt. stir well. add milk and oil. mix all ingredients together. let stand about an hour, preferably overnight. melt butter in frying pan, or drop a piece of butter in fryer for about 2 to 3 minutes on each side. good hot or cold. wrap cheese sticks in dough and bake in a 400 oven for 15 minutes.

0101391ba3.title: ham and cheese puffs recipe
0101391ba3.ingredients: 1 pound grnd ham 1 pound monterey jack cheese 1 med. onion, diced 1 egg 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 c. lowfat milk 1 1/2 c. self rising flour garlic pwdr
0101391ba3.recipe: mix all ingredients together. drop by teaspoonfuls into hot oil. brown on both sides. serves 6 to 8.

01336f8a03.title: spicy bean soup
01336f8a03.ingredients: 16 ounces can whole black bean bean soup 1 habanero pepper 1 cup onion, chopped 3 tablespoons oil 1 teaspoon salt 1 pinch clove 1 cup chopped tomato 4 cups broth 1 cup diced carrot 1 minced garlic clove 1 dash cumin 1 dash celery seed 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley 1 dash dried thyme 1/4 cup flour
01336f8a03.recipe: open beans and rinse and drain. place in a large saucepan and cover with water. bring to a boil then lower the heat to simmer. cover and cook for 45 minutes, until beans are soft. drain beans. meanwhile, saute onion in oil for 5 minutes, until soft. stir in tomatoes, broth, garlic, carrot, cumin, celery seed, parsley, thyme and salt. cook for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally. add beans, cover and simmer an additional 15 minutes. remove from heat and blend flour into a smooth paste in a blender or food processor. combine with broth mixture in saucepan and simmer 5 minutes.

00fb1642d3.title: rich chocolate brownies
00fb1642d3.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1/4 lb. butter 1 c. flour 1 tsp. extract 4 tbsp. cocoa pinch of salt 1 pkg. baker s chocolate
00fb1642d3.recipe: beat sugar and egg add rest of ingredients. spread in 9 x 9 inch pan. bake at 350 for 15 minutes.

01ee2f000b.title: potato pancakes
01ee2f000b.ingredients: pepper to taste 1 large potato 2 tbsp. butter or margarine 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. flour
01ee2f000b.recipe: make potatoes and add flour. melt butter or margarine in skillet. heat. drop in pancakes by teaspoon and brown on both sides. remove from pan. serve hot.

01cb7f8423.title: apple dumplings
01cb7f8423.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 1 egg, beaten 1 c. flour 1 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 1/4 c. milk 1 tsp. baking_powder cinnamon 1/2 tsp. extract 2 c. canned cream
01cb7f8423.recipe: combine sugar and flour. add butter, egg, salt, milk and baking powder. cook until done add cinnamon and extract to taste. add canned cream. place in serving dish and pour sauce over the top of this.

004d4dbfb0.title: poblano soup
004d4dbfb0.ingredients: 3 pkgs. dried whole pepper 1 onion 3 tbsp. oil 1 tsp salt 1 tsp clove 1 lb. bag frozen cut green beans 2 tbsp. butter 1 tbsp. thyme 1 head garlic broth or water
004d4dbfb0.recipe: in large kettle saute garlic in oil add onions and thyme. add beans and seasoning. add water and simmer covered over low heat until beans are cooked and tender 20 to 30 minutes. add butter, salt and pepper. blend with hand blender until smooth. serve hot.

016067d95e.title: russian dressing for salad recipe
016067d95e.ingredients: 1/8 teaspoon pepper 1/4 c. cheese, crumbled swiss, cheddar or possibly gorgonzola 1/2 c. oil 1/2 teaspoon salt 2 tbsp. vinegar 1 tbsp. juice 1/2 teaspoon grated onion 1 tbsp. parsley, snipped 1/4 teaspoon clove, crushed
016067d95e.recipe: place all ingredients in jar. shake well. store in refrigerator.

0046365abb.title: cube steaks with gravy
0046365abb.ingredients: 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 onion, chopped 1 tbsp. salt dash of clove 1/4 c. oil 1 garlic clove, chopped 1 tsp. paprika 1/4 tsp. thyme 1 beef cube steak
0046365abb.recipe: coat both sides of steak with flour mixture. brown in hot oil. add remaining ingredients. cover and simmer 30 minutes or until tender.

02211996b6.title: chicken in a can or frying pan
02211996b6.ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1 3 lb chicken, quartered 2 tablespoons oil 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 dash clove 1/4 cup finely chopped onion 3 tablespoons butter 1/2 cup juice 2 garlic cloves, crushed
02211996b6.recipe: in the pan heat 1t. oil. when the oil is hot add chicken. cook over medium heat until browned on all sides. sprinkle with salt and clove. lower heat, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes. add onion and butter. mix the chicken, onions, juice and garlic. simmer until the liquid is reduced by half about 25 minutes. serve. note if there is any liquid left in pan, use about 1/3 cup. for the chicken parts, it may be put in the pan and discarded.

00e09c3152.title: super chili enchiladas
00e09c3152.ingredients: 1 packages cheese i use sharp cheddar 1 small onion 1 packages tortilla 1 roma tomato 1 packages chuck roast beef 1 can chili 1 packages salsa hot 1 salt pepper 1 sour cream 1 can beans refried
00e09c3152.recipe: preheat oven 400 cook roast beef until cooked through. chop onion in a small sized cubes and place in the bottom of a casserole dish. brown hamburg in the skillet add chili and salsa. once heated season to taste. you can add some salsa or guacamole if you like spread refried beans on the bottom of the dish place a little hamburg on each enchilada. put some sauce on top of the sauce and add cheese when cheese is melted place one tortilla on the bottom of your casserole dish. on each tortilla place 1 heaping spoonful of meat mixture. roll into enchiladas and place on the baking dish. repeat until pan is full. you can top each with a spoonful of sour cream if you would like, we like it thick place in oven to heat. once you have rolled up each enchilada, plate and spoon any extra sauce on top of each enchiladas. enjoy

0267e16da5.title: the very best apple cake
0267e16da5.ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 2 1/4 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 c. butter 3 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. extract 3/4 c. milk cinnamon and sugar
0267e16da5.recipe: cream sugar and butter. add egg, salt, baking powder, extract and milk. add flour, 1/2 cup at a time. put in a 9 x 13 inch pan. mix 1 tablespoon sugar and cinnamon sprinkle on top. bake at 350 for 1 hour.

0213976da1.title: onion, bacon, and cheese salad
0213976da1.ingredients: 10 to 12 pepper sticks, about 2 inches long 1 slice sliced cheese or shredded 1/2 small onion 1 to 2 tbsp mayonnaise 1 salt and pepper 1 slice bacon 1 tbsp oil 1 tbsp chopped parsley 1 dash vinegar 1 juice 1 lettuce
0213976da1.recipe: remove the skins from the peppers, cut them in half and cut into strips lengthwise. place in a container, cover with plastic wrap and heat in the microwave for 30 seconds. break up the cheese into small pieces and grate the onion into the container. combine all ingredients and mix well. it s even better if you mix the dressing for less time to the end. this is just my version of this salad. top with bacon and cheese strips and serve. this is a bit too soft for me. you can freeze it if you like. the onion is a bit too salty, so season with salt and pepper. it s really flavorful, so enjoy it for lunch.

021acc78d0.title: sybil s meat pie
021acc78d0.ingredients: 2 pie crusts 1/8 tsp. pepper 3 or 4 slices cheese 3 tbsp. butter 1 tsp. salt 1 medium onion 1/2 c. milk 1 can mushroom pieces or 1 pkg. 1/2 c. cream or evaporated milk 2 c. broth 1 whole clove flour
021acc78d0.recipe: prepare pie crust as you would for pie crust. saute onion in butter. add pepper and salt. add broth simmer 10 minutes. add flour to thicken. add mushroom pieces or 1 package mushroom pieces and cheese. pour into pie crust and top with pastry or graham crackers. bake 15 minutes at 400.

025233dbc7.title: pan fried sashimi with tofu and cheese
025233dbc7.ingredients: 150 grams pan fried sashimi steak 1 pepper 1 panko 1 cheese sliced cheese 1 tbsp oil 1 dash salt 1 tbsp juice 1 parsley for garnish 1 clove peeled and chopped
025233dbc7.recipe: cut the cheese slices into quarters. pour the oil in a frying pan, and fry the panko. sprinkle the chopped parsley, garlic, and pepper. fry both sides until golden brown. set aside on a paper towel. serve with the hot fried squid. if you don t have squid cut into pieces and fry it first. sprinkle the squid from step 1 on top and it s done.

0164d1da2a.title: chewy chocolate cookies
0164d1da2a.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 1 c. butter or margarine 2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. salt 3 tbsp. cocoa 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. baking_powder
0164d1da2a.recipe: mix sugar, butter, egg, flour, salt, cinnamon, vanilla and cocoa together in a large bowl. add baking powder, if you like. form dough into a ball. set dough into the refrigerator for 5 minutes. preheat oven to 375. roll out cookie dough on a floured surface. cut into 3 inch rounds. place on an ungreased cookie sheet. bake for 8 to 10 minutes.

0111bb0061.title: red poblano soup
0111bb0061.ingredients: 1 poblano pepper 1 onion 3 tablespoons oil 1 ripe tomato 1 whole clove 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon cumin 14 lb chili any kind you prefer, chopped 1 14 ounce can broth chicken or ham 1 carrot, sliced 1 small garlic clove
0111bb0061.recipe: sweat the onion, pepper, clove, cumin and chili in the oil until tender. peel the tomato and chop. add the tomato, broth and sliced carrot. simmer 30 minutes. remove the clove before serving.

002bac0f54.title: oatmeal cookies
002bac0f54.ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 3/4 c. all purpose flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 c. butter 1 tsp. baking_soda 3/4 tsp. cinnamon 1/2 tsp. baking_powder 1 tsp. extract 1 tsp. vanilla 1 1/2 c. oats quick or old fashioned 1/4 tsp. nutmeg
002bac0f54.recipe: preheat oven to 350. mix all ingredients. drop by large teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until brown. remove to wire rack to cool. store in airtight container.

0017c79fb6.title: apple kuchen
0017c79fb6.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 egg 3 tbsp. melted butter 1 c. flour 1/2 tsp. cinnamon dash of salt 2 c. milk
0017c79fb6.recipe: mix and add sugar and egg. mix flour, cinnamon and salt together. add melted butter and milk. bake at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes.

004060114d.title: baked fish in tomato cream sauce
004060114d.ingredients: 1 lb. fish fillets 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 c. cheese 3 tbsp. oil 1 can chopped tomato 1/2 clove 1 tsp. salt juice from tomato and pepper 1 tbsp. finely chopped onion 1 tbsp. parsley 1/4 tsp. oregano 1/8 tsp. basil
004060114d.recipe: fry salmon fillets in hot oil about 10 minutes. remove from pan. in pan, combine remaining ingredients, except chicken and cheese. cook until bubbly. place each fillet in baking dish. pour sauce over fish. cover with foil. bake for 25 to 30 minutes. makes 6 servings.

0015a6e965.title: macaroni and cheese supreme
0015a6e965.ingredients: 12 lb macaroni 18 teaspoon pepper 34 cup cheese, grated 1 tablespoon butter 14 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon onion, grated 13 cup milk 12 cup mushroom, sliced optional 13 cup cream or 13 cup half and half 12 clove 1 tablespoon parsley, chopped 14 cup broth optional
0015a6e965.recipe: cook macaroni in 2 quarts boiling water until done, drain. melt butter and saute onion until tender. mix cheese, milk, mushroom, cream, parsley, seasoning and pepper. combine macaroni with cheese sauce and place in a casserole dish. bake in a preheated oven at 350 degrees until cheese is melted and bubbly.

00059477e2.title: cheese steaks
00059477e2.ingredients: 500 g steaks, cut 1 inch thick pepper 1 cheese, cut to match the steaks 1 egg salt 1 cup breadcrumbs oil, for greasing 1 onion 1/4 cup milk 1 clove 2 tablespoons butter
00059477e2.recipe: fry onion in a skillet. add butter, milk and clove. cook over low heat until onion is transparent. remove from heat and add the steaks. cover the pan and cook over low heat for 5 minutes. remove from heat and cover with foil. let stand for 5 minutes. slice the steak and put in a bowl. put the cheese in a bowl and add the egg and salt and pepper. mix. shape the mixture into patties and roll in the breadcrumbs. cook on hot oil until browned. drain on paper towels. serve with onions.

0124c09788.title: tsourdough bread
0124c09788.ingredients: 12 tsp. pepper 1 c. grated sharp cheese 1 egg, beaten 1 tsp. salt 3 tbsp. butter 3 tbsp. flour 2 tbsp. oil 1 small onion, minced fine 2 c. milk
0124c09788.recipe: heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. add flour and stir until mixture has a tastier consistency. remove from heat. stir in the rest of the ingredients. grease 1 quart round casserole dish. spread bread mixture evenly in pan. bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes at 350. serve hot.

0237254f73.title: stuffed scallops with pepper and cheese sauce
0237254f73.ingredients: 1/4 pound scallops, cleaned and seasoned with pepper 1/4 pound cheese, grated 1 large tomato, peeled and chopped 2 tablespoons oil 1/2 cup onion chopped 3/4 cup pasta 1 clove, chopped 1 teaspoon salt 1 cup mushroom 1 tablespoon parsley chopped 3/4 cup broth 1 tablespoon oregano 1 clove garlic chopped
0237254f73.recipe: heat oil in a pan and saute onion, garlic and mushrooms for 2 minutes. add broth, salt, garlic, oregano, pasta and cheese. cook for 10 minutes until cheese is melted and pour over scallops. cook for 5 minutes more. garnish with parsley and pepper.

02037aa51a.title: fried beef adobo
02037aa51a.ingredients: 2 lb beef top sirloin steak cut up in 1 inch squares 1 hot pepper chopped optional 2 onion chopped 2 tbsp oil 1/2 tsp salt 1/2 clove 2 clove minced garlic 1 can of v 8 juice 1 soy_sauce
02037aa51a.recipe: cook meat for 4 minute turn and add sauce. simmer for 3 min. add onion salt and garlic. cook for 5 min. add v 8 juice and let cook for 4 minutes.

01f2a35b3f.title: cinnamon apples
01f2a35b3f.ingredients: 1 1/4 c. sugar 1/4 c. milk 2 tbsp. butter 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 pinch of salt 1 apple
01f2a35b3f.recipe: combine all ingredients except apple in saucepan. bring to a boil over medium heat. peel and slice the apples. when the mixture comes to a boil, turn down to simmer and cook for 15 minutes, uncovered, turning occasionally. serves 8.

00e530bf61.title: pistachio bark
00e530bf61.ingredients: 1 whole pistachio 12 whole macadamias 1 cup powdered sugar 3 1/2 ounces, weight semi sweet chocolate, broken into pieces 2 tablespoons butter 2 teaspoons pistachio chips 1/4 teaspoons almond extract 5 cups cocoa nibs
00e530bf61.recipe: cut the pistachio nuts into half. use a large pot or a very large bowl you will use for this recipe. i usually get 16 pistachios total. if you buy pre made pistachios pistachios in bulk they will keep for up to 6 months. place the crushed pistachio nuts and powdered sugar into a blender and process until crushed. place the pistachios, chocolate, butter, and pistachio chips into a food processor and process until the mixture is like finely ground peanut butter. sprinkle the pistachio mixture and almond extract into a bowl and stir until combined. pour the pistachio mixture onto a sheet tray and press to form a flat layer. sprinkle cocoa nibs over the top. refrigerate until firm. store in the fridge in an airtight container. notes 1. if you are using mini chocolate chips, place pistachios into a bowl. 2. in the microwave, melt chocolate and butter in 30 second increments until smooth. add chocolate, and continue to stir. 3. pour the melted chocolate mixture on top of the crushed pistachios and lightly mix to combine. the mixture will have a creamy consistency. it should resemble a thick frosting. place in the fridge for 30 minutes, and then break it up into chunks. enjoy

022fc32f42.title: banana muffins
022fc32f42.ingredients: 1 cup granulated sugar 1 egg 2 cup flour 1/2 tsp salt 1 1/2 tbsp baking_soda 1 1/2 tsp baking_powder 1 tsp cinnamon 1/4 cup oil 1/4 cup butter, melted 1 banana
022fc32f42.recipe: heat oven to 375 blend sugar and egg in mixer on low in seperate bowl mix dry ingredients add flour mixture to wet, beat on medium for 1 minute, then beat on high for 2 minutes pour into greased muffin pans bake for 20 25 minutes i m using a 12 cup muffin tin. if you prefer a thinner muffin bake for 15 20 minutes.

0105770a10.title: salisbury steaks
0105770a10.ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1 tablespoon minced onion 1 egg, beaten 1 teaspoon salt 1 lb beef or 1 lb pork 1 tablespoon oil 1/4 cup breadcrumbs 1 teaspoon worcestershire_sauce 1/2 cup flour garlic powder to taste
0105770a10.recipe: mix pepper, onion, egg, salt, meat, flour, bread crumbs and worcestershire. form into 6 patties. brown the patties in oil. you can also use oxo.. sprinkle with garlic powder. serves 6 8. you may also add a sprinkle of parmesan cheese on the patties if desired.

021e7897f8.title: tartar sauce
021e7897f8.ingredients: 2 dashes pepper 2 tbsp mayonnaise 1/4 tsp salt 1/2 onion finely chopped 1 large egg 1/2 tbsp vinegar 3 tbsp juice 2 tbsp parsley chopped fine 1 tbsp oil 1/2 tsp garlic powder
021e7897f8.recipe: combine all the ingredients in a pot. put the pot on the heat and bring to a boil. cook until it s a golden brown color. don t let it burn. add salt if needed.

0082a58df7.title: spiced coffee ring
0082a58df7.ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1 c. honey 1/4 c. butter or margarine 1 tsp. cinnamon
0082a58df7.recipe: heat oven to 375. in 1 quart microwave safe bowl, combine all ingredients. microwave on high 2 minutes, or until butter melts. stir until blended. pour into 3 1/2 cup ring mold coated with nonstick spray. bake at 375 for 15 to 18 minutes or until ring springs back when touched lightly. turn out of mold onto serving plate. remove warm pan sides. cool. serve with vanilla ice cream, if desired.

0007a28fe7.title: chili
0007a28fe7.ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper 1 large onion 3 lb. beef or pork salt 3 tomato paste cans 1 clove garlic powder broth 1 carrot parsley 1 celery stalk beans chili
0007a28fe7.recipe: fry beef or pork until browned. cut in cubes, place in large pot. add onion, salt, tomato paste, garlic powder, pepper, beans and parsley and celery. add broth to cover with water, and cook. add vegetables. simmer. add water as needed during cooking. simmer until beans are soft. add more chili as desired. serve with corn bread and green salad.

0237404c42.title: mulligatawny soup
0237404c42.ingredients: 2 tablespoons sugar 1 onion, finely sliced 1 teaspoon salt 1 carrot, peeled and grated 3 tablespoons butter 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon 1/4 teaspoon clove 1 tablespoon flour
0237404c42.recipe: saute onions in the butter until soft. mix the spices and the flour in a small bowl and add to the pan with the onions and cook until thickened. stir constantly while adding water if needed, so that it doesn t stick. add the carrot and sugar and stir for 2 minutes. adjust the seasoning and serve hot.

01ac06be58.title: chicken with garlic sauce
01ac06be58.ingredients: 1/8 teaspoon pepper 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves 2 tablespoons oil 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/8 teaspoon clove 1/4 cup finely chopped onion 2 tablespoons butter or 2 tablespoons margarine 1/2 cup juice 1/2 teaspoon garlic, minced 1/4 teaspoon thyme 1 tablespoon flour
01ac06be58.recipe: sprinkle pepper over chicken cover and chill 30 minutes. heat oil in large skillet over medium high heat. add chicken sprinkle with salt and clove. cook, turning once, 8 to 10 minutes, or until no longer pink in center. transfer chicken to serving plate keep warm. in same skillet, saute onion in butter 3 to 4 minutes or until tender. stir in juice, garlic, thyme, and flour cook, stirring constantly, 5 minutes or until slightly thickened. spoon sauce over chicken.

0245358be2.title: easy sugar snap peas with roquefort and butter
0245358be2.ingredients: 3 tbsp sugar 1 snow peas 1 cheese 1 butter 1 pinch salt 1 egg
0245358be2.recipe: drain the snow peas and blanch in a saucepan. it will be crispy when done. combine everything together and fry it in a pan until the surface turns white. you can use your cooked leftovers from making roquefort, but keep cooking.

01720042d5.title: szechuan chicken
01720042d5.ingredients: 1 1/2 tbsp huang fong 1 tsp pepper 4 chicken pieces 3 tbsp oil 1 tsp salt 1 tsp clove 3 tbsp soy_sauce 1 1/2 tbsp ginger 1 tbsp garlic
01720042d5.recipe: wash chicken pieces well, pat dry. in a bowl add all ingredients except chicken. place chicken pieces on a cookie sheet or tin foil, rub mix over the chicken. bake at 300f for 1 hour. i put a glass bowl over the chicken to prevent the chicken from getting greasy. enjoy

023f30ca39.title: sauerkraut
023f30ca39.ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar 3/4 c. honey 1 tsp. salt 1 c. vinegar 1 tsp. clove 1 small onion, diced 1/2 c. oil 1 garlic clove, slivered
023f30ca39.recipe: heat sugar, vinegar, honey, cloves and onion until sugar is dissolved. add oil and garlic. bring to boil and pour over lettuce, mix well.

00a95b754f.title: cinnamon rolls
00a95b754f.ingredients: 2 c. sugar 1 egg 5 c. flour 1 tsp. salt 1 1/2 yeast cake 3 tbsp. melted butter 2 tsp. baking_powder oil for pan 2/3 c. milk cinnamon
00a95b754f.recipe: mix yeast cake and milk. combine and let stand for 5 minutes. then mix in sugar, egg and 3 cups flour. beat all the time on medium speed with electric beater. in another bowl, mix 1 cup flour with sugar, salt, baking powder and 1 teaspoon cinnamon. add to sugar mixture and add 3 more cups flour with electric mixer. add 2 sticks butter and mix thoroughly. cover and let rise about 1 hour.

019d4f649d.title: chicken piccata
019d4f649d.ingredients: 1 pepper, ground 8 chicken pieces, breasts, etc 3 tbsp oil 1 salt 3 clove 1/2 tbsp minced garlic 1/4 cup juice 1/2 onion, chopped 2 tbsp butter
019d4f649d.recipe: season chicken with salt, pepper, cloves, and minced garlic. heat oil in a pan, cook the chicken until golden brown on all sides. add the onion, butter, and juice. cook until the chicken is done. serve.

00ca015837.title: squid with chesse or poblano pepper and mashed potatoes recipe
00ca015837.ingredients: squid pepper cheese 1 egg salt lowfat milk flour melted butter oil cream
00ca015837.recipe: make squids in a pot of boiling water. when cooked, drain and cut into 1 inch wide pieces. cut cheese in thin slices, separate pieces and dip in mix of milk, beaten egg and seasoning. roll in flour. deep fry in hot oil and butter. serve with mashed potatoes.

00bc1b0001.title: fried meatballs
00bc1b0001.ingredients: 1/8 teaspoon pepper 2 ounces cheese, shredded 1 egg 1 onion, finely chopped 8 ounces minced beef salt and pepper breadcrumbs, to coat 1 tablespoon oil garlic, paste to taste tomato, sliced
00bc1b0001.recipe: combine cheese, egg, onion and minced beef. season with salt, pepper and breadcrumbs. roll into small 1 inch balls. in a large skillet brown meatballs in hot oil. in a medium size saucepan cook garlic paste with a little oil for 10 seconds. place meatballs in sauce and simmer for about 15 minutes. add sliced tomato and simmer 5 minutes. serve over pasta.
